en: He did not speak about the many instances of torture, looting, massacre, disaster and calamity that were caused by America.
ha: Bai fadi irin azabtarwa, satan dukiya, kisan gilla da bala'in da Amurka ta haifar ba.

en: At present, the most significant example of fearing God for the nations that have risen up is to refrain from halting their auspicious movement and avoid being diverted by the achievements of this phase.
ha: Hakika babbar alamar tsoron Allah ga al'ummomi masu yunkuri a wannan lokacin shi ne kada su dakatar da wannan yunkuri na su sannan kuma kada su shagaltar da kansu da irin nasarorin da aka samu din a halin yanzu.

en: As I said, I believe in clarification.
ha: A baya na fadi cewa lalle na yi imani da bayani da karin haske.

en: Today these two paths of deliverance lie open before each of us, individuals belonging to the Muslim Ummah.
ha: A halin yanzu dai dukkanin wadannan hanyoyi guda biyu na samun tsira a bude su ke a gaban dukkanin daidaikunmu al'ummar musulmi.

en: Yes, sometimes there is a wisdom to publicly identifying a convicted criminal by name, in which case nothing is wrong with doing so.
ha: Na'am akwai wani lokacin da akwai wata maslaha cikin shi kansa tona asirin cikin wani lamarin da aka tabbatar da shi, to a nan kan babu matsala cikin hakan.

en: In one of his messages, the Leader pointed out that hajj is a manifestation of the movement of the Islamic Ummah and that it defines the role of political Islam.
ha: A cikin daya daga cikin sakonnin Jagora ya yi ishara da cewa hajji ‘alama ce ta yunkurin al’umma’ sannan kuma ‘mai bayanin irin rawar da Musulunci na siyasa yake takawa’ ne.

en: Then we lost not only our economic privilege and material dignity, but also our morality and ethical principles.
ha: A irin wannan yanayin ba wai ma kawai tattalin arziki da daukakar mu ta duniya ce muka rasa ba, face ma dai kyawawan halayen mu ma mun rasa su.

en: Well, they made efforts and we hope that the Islamic government can carry out its responsibility in this regard.
ha: To sun yi kokarinsu. Don haka ina fatan gwamnatin Musulunci za ta sauke nauyin da ke wuyanta a wannan bangaren.

en: The more progress our nation makes, the more Allah the Exalted will increase his virtues.
ha: Duk irin ci gaban da wannan kasar ta samu, to kuwa Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai kara irin ladan da wannan ma'abocin girma yake da su.

en: The hegemons of the world build their relations with the world on the basis of domination.
ha: Haka 'yan mulkin mallakan duniya suke tsara alakarsu da sauran duniya.

en: Showing the greatness of Islam and its messages is the third theme that is mentioned in these messages.
ha: Batu na uku a cikin wannan sakon shi ne ‘nuna irin girman da Musulunci yake da shi da kuma sakon da ke tattare da shi’.

en: All these things are tangible in the lifestyle of the Lord of the Martyrs (a.s.).
ha: Idan aka dubi rayuwar Shugaban shahidai ana iya ganinsu a fili.

en: This ability to identify the needs quickly and to take action to address them at the right time is the important point that must not be ignored.
ha: Cikin sauri suka fahimci hakan, cikin lokaci suka fahimta kuma suka yi aiki a daidai lokacin da ya dace da kuma biyan bukatar da ake da ita. Wannan wani lamari ne da yake a fili wanda bai kamata a gafala da shi ba.

en: But building such a Quranic society will only be possible in those conditions and I hope the conditions will be created.
ha: Sannan kuma ta hakan ne za a samar da yanayi da al'umma ta Alkur'ani da irin wannan yanayi insha Allahu.

en: Obviously, Imam Sadiq would not have compared the prayers led by an ordinary prayer leader with the prayers led by the Prophet (s.w.a.).
ha: A fili yake cewa Imam Sadik (a.s) ba zai kwatanta sallar wancan limamin da sallar Annabi (s.a.w.a) ba.

en: The second strength is the trust between the people and the Islamic Republic.
ha: Na biyu: shi ne yarda da juna dake tsakanin mutane da gwamnati.

en: The physical presence of the people - this is what happened in the Islamic Revolution.
ha: Kasantuwar mutane a fage; shi ne irin wannan yanayi da ya faru a lokacin juyin juya halin Musulunci na Iran.

en: This is their framework: if somebody wears hijab to university or work, she becomes a criminal.
ha: Wannan shi ne tushensu.

en: Apart from the power of the Iranian people, what other meaning does this have?
ha: Mece ce ma'anar hakan in ba karfin da al'ummar Iran suka yi ba?

en: Our time and share of work is over.
ha: Mun riga da mun cinye lokacin mu.

en: As far as our confrontation with the arrogant powers of the world is concerned, what was obvious about the year 1391 was the harshness of the enemies towards the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic.
ha: Abin da ya fito fili a shekara ta 1391 a fagen fadarmu da duniyar ma'abota girman kai shi ne kara kaimi da matsin lambar makiya a kan al'ummar Iran da kuma tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

en: We should export these garden and farm products so that the world understands what is going on in Iran and we must not import the same products with far worse quality from Latin America or other places.
ha: Mu dinga fitar da wadannan kayayyaki na gona da lambuna don duniya ta dinga ganin abubuwan da ake da su a Iran; ba wai mu dinga shigo da irin wadannan kayayyaki daga a matsayin misali kasashen Latin Amurka da nan da can wadanda kayayyaki ne da ba su kai irin wadanda muke da su a nan ba.

en: If suspicion - which is what enemies desire - is replaced with kindness, trust, and unanimity among Muslim nations and Islamic denominations and ethnicities, a large part of the ill-wishers' plots will be foiled and their evil plot of establishing domination over the Islamic Ummah will be thwarted.
ha: Matukar dai a tsakanin al'ummar musulmi da kuma tsakanin kungiyoyi da mazhabobi na Musulunci da kabilun musulmi suka samar da yanayin kauna da kyakkyawan zato da hadin kai a tsakaninsu da maye gurbin mummunan zato da mugun kallo wanda shi ne abin da makiya suke son gani da wadannan abubuwa, to kuwa za a iya magance wani bangare mai yawa na makirce-makirce da mummunan kulli (na makiya) sannan kuma mummunan makirci da kullinsu na gudanar da mulkin mallaka a kan al'ummar musulmi zai zamanto da mara ido.

en: From a monotheistic point of view, when you engage in a fight, the fight is a holy struggle.
ha: A lokacin da mutum yake gwagwarmaya da irin wannan mahanga, to kuwa wannan gwagwarmaya za ta zamanto mai tsarki; idan har ma ya yi yaki ne, haka lamarin zai kasance.

en: If Allah assists you, then there is none that can overcome you.
ha: Idan Allah Ya taimake ku, to, babu marinjayi a gare ku, idan Allah ya taimake ku, babu wani karfi da zai yi galaba a kanku.

en: But this is something that has already happened, whether they like it or not.
ha: To amma ko suna so ko ba sa so; su yarda ko kuma kada su yarda, hakan ta faru.

en: Has it received any feedback from the prominent figures and politicians of Muslim and Arab countries?
ha: Shin yana da wani matsayi a tsakanin masana da 'yan siyasa na kasashen musulmi ko kuma na larabawa?

en: They have experience in the ways for doing this.
ha: Shekaru aru aru suka yi suna gudanar da ayyukansu a wannan fagen.

en: Because the plots of the enemies to occupy the world of Islam were foiled by the Revolution and Islamic Awakening, they started to divide the Islamic Ummah and spread corruption.
ha: Don kuwa albarkacin juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma farkawa ta Musulunci an sami damar dushe kaifin makircin ma'abota girman kan duniya na mamaye kasashen musulmi; don haka a halin yanzu makiya sun fara wani shiri na kekketa al'ummar musulmi da kuma yada fasadi.

en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad (s.w.a.) and his household, make our dear youth and people steadfast on the straight path.
ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Albarkacin Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu, ka tabbatar da matasanmu masu girma, al'ummarmu masu girma a kan mikakken tafarki.

en: But based on what we have seen and learnt, this is often the case throughout the world: armies are established in the name of national interests, but they are not at the service of national interests, rather they are at the service of political ambitions.
ha: Ana kafa sojoji ne da sunan kare manufofi na kasa, to amma ba haka lamarin ya ke ba, suna hidima ne ga 'yan siyasa masu neman matsayi da iko.

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on July 4, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps.
ha: Shimfida: A ranar litinin 4, Yulin 2011 ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da manyan kwamandojin dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci na kasar Iran don tunawa da ranar haihuwar Imam Husaini (a.s) sannan kuma ranar dakarun kare juyi a kasar Iran.

en: In this divine arena of self-edification you can express your humility before Allah the Merciful, carry out the responsibilities which have fallen on the shoulders of Muslims, show enthusiasm and dynamism in the affairs of the world and in your religious duties, offer mercy and forgiveness when you interact with Muslim brothers, demonstrate your courage and determination in the face of difficult events, become hopeful about divine assistance in all arenas and, finally, build your human character the way Muslims should.
ha: Kaskantar da kai da mika wuya ga Allah Mai rahama; kudurce aniyar sauke nauyin da ke wuyan musulmi; yunkuri da kokari cikin ayyukan duniya da lahira; tausayi da yafuwa cikin mu'amala da ‘yan'uwa; jaruntaka da dogaro da kai wajen tinkarar matsaloli; fata da kuma yarda da samun taimako na Ubangiji a ko ina kuma cikin dukkanin lamurra; takaita magana da nuna kyawawan halaye na Musulunci a wannan fage na koyo da samun tarbiyya ta Ubangiji, dukkanin wadannan abubuwan suna iya zama tanadi kana kuma abin da za ku iya kawa da su, sannan kuma abin guzuri ga kasa da kuma al'ummarku.

en: They say they are concerned that we might go after producing nuclear weapons.
ha: Suna fadin cewa mu dai muna cikin damuwar cewa ku din nan za ku kama hanyar kera makaman nukiliya.

en: They should promise that they will act in a wise and prudent way.
ha: Idan har suna da wani shiri da kuma tsari to su gaya wa mutane, su yi musu alkawurrin yin iyakacin kokarinsu wajen gudanar da wadannan tsare-tsare da kuma yin alkawurrin amfani da dukkanin karfin da doka ta ba su wajen sauke wannan gagarumin nauyin da ke wuyansu.

en: It is possible to introduce such innovations in all areas.
ha: A fagen aikin soji, ana iya kirkirar sabbin abubuwa cikin yadda ake jagorancin yaki, yadda ake yaki, kayayyakin yaki da kuma sabuntawa cikin tsare-tsare; wanan lamari ne da ya shafi dakaru masu makami. Haka nan a wani bangaren da ba bangaren sojin ba. Kirkiro sabbin abubuwa cikin nau'in diplomasiyya.

en: Obscure is one of the words that our magnanimous Imam used: "The school of witnesses and obscure martyrs."
ha: Wadanda ba a san su ba daya ne daga cikin sunan da Imam ya sanya wa Basiji inda ya ke cewa: 'Tafarkin shahidan da ba a san su ba'.

en: For more than three decades, we have seen this in the Islamic Republic with our own eyes and we have experienced it with all our hearts and souls.
ha: Lalle mu mun yi amanna da irin karfin da Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya arzurta al'umma da shi, sannan kuma tsawon shekaru talatin da wani abu mun ga hakan da idanuwanmu a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

en: Now try to combine this beauty with the narration according to which Zeinab al-Kubra (s.a.) did not fail to say her midnight prayers even on the eleventh day of Muharram [the day after Ashura].
ha: Ku hada wannan abu mai kyau da abin da aka nakalto na cewa hatta a daren sha daya ga watan Muharram (wato dare da aka kashe Imam Husaini da mabiyansa a Karbala) ba ta bar sallar dare ba.

en: They used to perform rowza and make the people shed tears.
ha: Su kan zo su rera wakoki na juyayi a zubar da hawaye.

en: On the other hand, our exporters and those in charge of exports have certain duties to fulfill. Wrong actions of our exporters would show their effect in the case the countries that are the major destinations of our exports. It is bad to send low-quality products and products with unfavorable packaging and it is bad to have delays in delivery.
ha: To a wannan bangaren ma su kansu masu fitar da kayan da kuma jami'ansu suna da wani nauyi a wuyansu. Su kansu wadannan kasashen da aka yi ishara da cewa mafi yawa daga cikin kayayyakin da muke fitarwa muna kai su wadancan kasashen ne, to muna samun labaran irin mummunan ayyukan da wasu masu fitar da kayayyakin suke yi. Aikawa da kayayyakin da ba a bukatarsu, munanan kayayyaki, jinkiri wajen aikawa da kayan, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa ne masu muni.

en: I would also like to congratulate all believers on the Eids of the holy month of Rajab which remind us of great achievements and on the holy of month of Sha'ban which is the month of mercy, remembrance of God, dhikr and reliance on God.
ha: Baya ga wannan, ranakun idin da suke cikin wannan wata mai albarka, suna tunatar da mu ababen alfahari da suka faru da kuma shi kansa wannan wata na Sha'aban wanda wata ne na gafara da rahama, wata ne na tuna Allah da neman taimakonsa, don haka shi ma muna taya dukkanin muminai murnar shigowarsa.

en: These goals are being achieved in front of our eyes. Can anybody deny this?
ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da muke ganinsu da idanuwanmu. Shin akwai wanda zai iya inkarin hakan?

en: 5 Aban, 1390
Greeting of Allah and His angels and chosen servants be upon you and your immaculate ancestors.
ha: Amincin Allah da mala'ikunSa da tsarkakan bayinsa a gare ki da tsarkakan iyayenki.

en: But our youth made efforts and foiled the plots of the enemy with their actions.
ha: To amma matasan cikin al'ummarmu sun yi himma, ta hanyar irin wannan aikin na su sun sami nasarar magance makircin makiya.

en: Instead of being tried as the accused, they acted like the plaintiff and with increased malice and vileness, they revealed their long-standing enmity towards the Islamic Republic and towards any flag of Islam raised to confront kufr and arrogance.
ha: Haka nan maimakon su tsaya a matsayin wadanda ake zargi, sai suka zama masu tuhumar wasu ma, inda cikin dukkanin lalacewa da rashin sanin ya kamata suka bayyanar da tsohuwar kiyayyar da suke da ita a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma dukkanin wata tuta da aka daga ta fada da kafirci da girman kai.

en: It is thirty-four years that different American administrations have designed various kinds of hostilities towards us based on a wrong understanding of Iran and the Iranians.
ha: Shekaru talatin da hudu kenan gwamnatocin daban-daban na Amurka, sakamakon mummunar fahimtar Iran da al'ummar kasar da suka yi, suke ta tsara makirce-makircen cutar da al'ummar Iran.

en: Today we can see clearly that the hand of the ill-wishers of the world of Islam is fomenting discord among Muslims more than ever before.
ha: A yau, a fili muke ganin yadda hannuwan masu fatan sharri ga duniyar musulmi, sama da shekarun da suka gabata, suke gudanar da ayyukan haifar da rarrabuwa tsakanin al'ummar musulmi.

en: If we manage to think , decide and act in the right way on the issue of family and women - as mothers and wives - then you should know that the future of the country will be guaranteed.
ha: Idan har muka yi tunani mai kyau dangane da mace da iyali da kuma uwa, sannan kuma muka dau matakan da suka dace, to mu san cewa za a iya lamunce makomar kasar nan.

en: We have no right to publicly identify the accused by name.
ha: Babu wata hujja da muke da ita da za mu fadi hakan.

en: Not even a single moment will go unrewarded.
ha: Babu wata dakika da take wucewa a wajen Allah.

en: Today, you are ahead of others in many arenas.
ha: A yau din kuna a kan gaba a fagage daban-daban.

en: I would like to thank you for coming together to discuss one of the tragic phenomena currently afflicting humanity - namely, terrorism.
ha: Ina mika godiya ta a gare ku da kuka taru a wannan wajen don yin bahasin daya daga cikin babbar annobar da a halin yanzu take ci wa bil'adama tuwo a kwarya wato ta'addanci sannan kuma ina muku barka da zuwa.

en: There were military units stationed in Isfahan, whether the units that belonged to the Army of the Guardians of the Revolution - including the Imam Hussein Army headquartered in Isfahan, the Najaf Army headquartered in Najafabad and the Ghamar-e Bani Hashem Brigade - or the units that belonged to the Army, or the artillery center in Isfahan. If you put all these things together, they will become very significant.
ha: Bataliyoyin soji da suke garin Isfahan, shin wadanda suke da alaka da dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci ne; wato bataliyar Imam Husain da helkwatarta take garin Isfahan ne, bataliyar Najaf da take da helkwata a garin Najaf'abad, sansanin Kamare Bani Hashim, ko kuma wadanda suke da alaka ta sojoji; wato bataliya ta takwas wanda wani gagarumin yunkuri ne wanda ni na kasance a wannan bataliyar da ke Isfahan - Allah ya yi rahama wa shahid Baba'iy - ko kuma bataliyar sojojin Igwa da take Isfahan; dukkanin wadannan abubuwa suna da wata ma'ana.

en: In the meantime, the people can speak to one another, give advice, try to change each other's opinion and help one another to identify the most qualified candidate.
ha: Ala kulli hal mutane suna iya shawara da kuma taimakawa juna wajen gano mutumin da ya fi dacewa.

en: Fortunately, both the Army and the Army of the Guardians of the Islamic Revolution are heading in this direction.
ha: Alhamdu lillahi dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musulunci da kuma na soji duk sun taka wani mataki a wannan fagen, suna nan suna tunani da kuma gudanar da ayyukansu.

en: The city of Kermanshah is an important city.
ha: To garin Kermanshah gari ne mai muhimmanci.

en: I am not claiming that they are afraid of the Islamic Republic, especially as a government or as an army.
ha: Ni dai ba wai ina da'awar cewa su din nan suna tsoron Jamhuriyar Musulunci musamman a matsayinta na wata gwamnati ko wasu sojoji ba ne.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei stated that the powerful presence of the Navy in international waters will increase the power and capability of the country. He said: “The depth of presence in international waters should increase.”
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana kasantuwar sojojin ruwan Iran a ruwaye na kasa da kasa wani lamari ne da zai kara irin karfi da kwarewar Iran, don haka sai ya ce: wajibi ne a ci gaba da karfafa irin wannan kasantuwar a ruwaye na kasa da kasa.

en: You are the sweet fruits of that immaculate tree which was planted in this land by the Imam himself. The tree will continue producing fruits. "Have you not considered how Allah sets forth a parable of a good word (being) like an immaculate tree, whose root is firm and whose branches are in heaven, yielding its fruit in every season by the permission of its Lord?
ha: Ku din nan ku ne 'ya'yan itacen wannan bishiya mai zaki da dadi wadda Imamin mu mai girma ya dasa ta a wannan kasar da hannayensa, kuma har zuwa yanzu aka ci gaba da amfanuwa da abin da take samarwa; kamar yadda Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya fadi: "Shin, ba ka gani ba, yadda Allah Ya buga wani misali, kalma mai kyau kamar itaciya ce mai kyau, asalinta yana tabbatacce, kuma reshenta yana cikin sama?

en: That was why I named this year as "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor ".
ha: Abin da ya sanya na yi maganar ‘rubanya himma' saboda hakan ne.

en: In global propaganda, today all efforts are focused on complete distortion of the realities of your society and your Islamic government. And they have many propaganda facilities to do this.
ha: Manufar farfagandar da ake yadawa a duniya a yau ita ce a sauya da kuma bata yanayi na hakika na kasar ku, yanayin al'ummarku da kuma tsarinku na Musulunci.

en: We should double our effort to strengthen our knowledge and faith.
ha: Wajibi ne mu karfafa fagen ilimi da imani a tsakaninmu.

en: In order to fight such a nation, they will pay attention to the point that you mentioned [refers to a slogan shouted by the audience], which is indicative of the vigilance of you dear people of Isfahan: Creating a rift in the nation, turning the people against one another, creating a gap between the people and government officials, and causing suspicion and disagreement over trivial issues.
ha: Don fada da irin wannan al'umma, su ma suna lura da wannan lamari da kuke lura da shi sannan kuma kuke fadi (a nan Jagora yana ishara ne da taken da mahalarta taron suka ta rerawa na Allah Ya la'anci munafukai masu tayar da fitina) - lalle hakan yana nuni da irin sanin ya kamatan da mutanen Isfahan suke da shi ne -: wato su yi kokarin haifar da sabani tsakanin al'umma, su sanya mutane fada da junansu, haifar da gagarumar tazara tsakanin mutane da jami'an gwamnati, haifar da mummunan zato da haifar da kace-nace kan 'yan wadansu lamurran da ba su taka kara sun karya ba.

en: Muslim brothers and sisters across the world!
ha: Ya 'yan'uwa musulmi maza da mata a duk fadin duniya.

en: National determination is more important. National resistance against these storms is more important than military preparedness. Storms come and go, no matter how strong they are.
ha: Guguwa ta kan zo ta kuma wuce; duk irin karfin da take da shi kuwa, za ta zo ta kuma wuce; abin da yake da muhimmanci shi ne mu sami karfi ko da tsayin dakan fada da wannan guguwa da kuma rashin hakan.

en: The families of some of our dear martyrs are present in today's meeting.
ha: A yau wasu daga cikin iyalan shahidan wannan yankin suna wajen nan.

en: The problem is that many hajj pilgrims travel a long distance and take a lot of trouble, but they fail to understand the message of hajj.
ha: Gazawar ita ce cewa da dama daga cikin alhazai suna zuwa daga wajaje masu nisa, suna shan wahala masu yawa to amma ba sa iya fahimtar sakon da ke cikin hajji.

en: When a person knows that the civilization, progress and wealth of certain countries is the result of a large amount of vandalism, misconduct, brutality and injustice in the past, he will gain a new perspective on what he has to do and on the duties he must fulfill.
ha: A lokacin da mutum ya fahimci cewa an samu irin wannan dukiya da ci gaban da ake ganinsu a wasu irin wadannan kasashe ne sakamakon irin wannan danyen aiki da rashin adalci, to kuwa mutum zai sake dubi cikin ayyukan da ya kamata ya aikata da kuma irin nauyin da ke wuyansa.

en: I pray to Allah the Exalted to bestow success on everyone. I also pray to God to bestow a long life, continued enthusiasm and increasing success on Hojjatoleslam wal Muslemeen Aghaye Qara'ati who is a mujahid and devoted cleric.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya kara wa malami mai jihadi mai kuma yawan hidima mai girma Hujjatul Islami wal Muslimin Sheik Kara'ati yawan rai da kuma dacewa a kowace rana.

en: This is because the issue was big enough, but you should have reflected the importance of the assassinations.
ha: Kamata ya yi ku girmama lamarin - ba wai ku kambama shi ba don kuwa shi kansa lamari ne mai girma - ku bayyanar da shi yadda ya ke.

en: We should not make a mistake.
ha: Bai kamata mu yi kuskure ba.

en: I hope our government officials will manage to do what is necessary in this province.
ha: Abubuwan alfahari na lokacin kallafaffen yaki suna da alaka ne da wannan lardin.

en: You should show unity in practice. For the same reason, our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) advised all of us and all Iranian hajj pilgrims to participate in the congregational prayers held in Masjid al-Haram and Masjid al-Nabawi.
ha: Bisa wannan tunanin ne ya sanya Imaminmu mai girma (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) - wannan mutum masanin ya kamata - ya kasance yana wa dukkaninmu da kuma dukkanin alhazan Iran wasicci da yin sallar jam'i a Masjid al-Haram da masallacin Annabi; ku kasance a irin wadannan wajajen taro, wanda daya daga cikin misdakin hakan shi ne halartar irin wadannan salloli na jam'i.

en: If we ignore the first type of progress, we will fail to have the movement which will bring about progress and transcendence in the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps and the second kind of progress will be thwarted - that is to say, the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps will fail to act as the driving force behind the Revolution.
ha: Idan har muka gafala da abu na farko, wato mu ka yi watsi da wannan yunkuri na ci gaba na cikin dakarun kare juyin ba, to kuwa abu na biyun wato tasirin dakarun kare juyin wajen ciyar da juyi gaba, ba zai yi nasara ba. Idan har muka nade hannaye da kafafunmu, to kuwa ba za mu iya cimma komai ba.

en: As I said yesterday, all I have seen in this province is heroic characteristics among both men and women.

en: Throughout history, chowgan has been a well-known sport in Iran.

en: The surface structure of this civilization can and should be witnessed in popular government, in the laws that have been extracted from the Holy Quran, in identifying and addressing different needs of humanity, in avoidance of rigidity and reactionary attitudes as well as unwarranted innovation and adulteration, in creating public welfare and wealth, in establishing justice, in liberation from an economy that is based on special privileges, usury and taking pride in wealth, in promoting human values, in defending oppressed people in the world, and in hard work and innovation.

en: Did he manage to change the situation?
ha: Shin ya sami damar sauya wannan mummunan yanayin?

en: I used to visit Isfahan a lot at that time. I was witness to the religious situation of the people and their commitment to religious matters.
ha: A wadancan lokuta na kasance ina yawan zuwa garin Isfahan; ina ganin irin yanayin riko da addinin mutane da koyarwa ta addini.

en: Both views of labor are wrong.
ha: Hakan kaskantar da mutum ne; dukkanin wadannan mahanga guda biyu kuskure ne.

en: These are the causes of their anger.
ha: Wannan shi ne dalilin wannan fushi na su.

en: The late Mr. Taleghani told me, "Imam Khomeini (r.a.) says that the Shah must go, but obviously it is impossible for the Shah to go."
ha: Marigayi Ayatullah Talikani ya gaya min cewa Imam yana fadin cewa: ‘wajibi ne a kawar da Shah', to a fili yake cewa Shah dai ba zai tafi ba.

en: They are suffering from economic, political and various other kinds of problems. Of course this does not mean that we can safely rest and forget about everything. No, the enemy must never be underestimated.
ha: Suna fuskantar matsalolin tattalin arziki, suna fuskantar matsaloli na siyasa, suna da matsaloli daban-daban. Ko da yake hakan ba yana nufin shi kenan sai mu kwantar da hankalin, mu share waje mu kwanta mu mance da komai ba ne; a'a, bai kamata a dinga ganin makiya a matsayin wadanda suka yi rauni wanda ba za su iya yin komai ba; wajibi ne a ko da yaushe mu dinga jin cewa makiya suna nan a bakin kofar mu; to sai dai yana da kyau a san cewa makiya ba za su iya amfani da hanyar da a baya suke amfani da ita ba.

en: Command means issuing a set of orders, telling people what to do and what not to do. Leadership means showing the standards that would take the place of those orders, giving rise to a movement without having to order people what to do and what not to do, a movement that originates from the heart.
ha: Zama kwamandan soji yana nufin ba da umurni, ni na yi bari na bari, jagoranci kuwa yana nufin yunkuri da nuna alamun da za su maye gurbin yi da kuma kada ka yi din; wato a samar da wani yunkuri da motsi ba tare umurnin yi ko kar ka yi ba; wato yunkuri daga cikin zuciya.

en: We can move ahead relying on these infrastructures.
ha: Lalle ana iya tafiya bisa wadannan asasi da aka gina.

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on July 9, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with teachers and graduates of Mahdaviat [faith in the re-appearance of the last Shia Imam, Imam Mahdi (a.s.)].
ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya yi ne a ranar 9, Yulin 2011, a yayin ganawa da malamai da marubuta a fagen akidar Imam Mahdi (a.s):

en: The more harshly an interviewee speaks, the more inappropriate things he says and the more he curses in his interview, the happier these media networks will be.
ha: Gwargwadon irin wuce gona da iri cikin magana, da fadin muggan maganganu da zage-zagen da mutumin da ake hira da shi zai fadi, gwargwadon irin farin cikin da wannan kafar watsa labaran za ta yi.

en: They must not let the system of arrogance use the different tools they enjoy and hijack this great popular movement.
ha: Bai kamata su bari cibiyoyin ma'abota girman su yi amfani da hanyoyi daban-daban da suke da su wajen karkatar da wannan gagarumin yunkuri na al'umma da kuma sace wannan motsi na al'umma ba.

en: Basically, the emergence and spread of brutal and blind terrorism in our region is the result of the evil policies of the US, Britain and their governmental and non-governmental mercenaries. All Muslims must oppose and fight against this sinister phenomenon which is a clear manifestation of corruption on earth and war against God.
ha: Bayyanar ayyukan ta'addanci na dabbanci wanda ake yinsa ido rufe da kuma bunkasarsa a cikin wannan yankin namu tushenwa shi ne bakar siyasar Amerika da Ingila da 'yan korensu na gwamnatoci da kuma kungiyoyin da ba na gwamnati ba wanda ya zama wajibi ga dukkan musulmi su kalubalanci wannan bakin hali wanda yayi daidai da barna a bayan kasa da kuma fada da Ubangiji.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will bestow success on all of you.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkaninku dacewa sannan kuma addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) su kasance tare da dukkaninku.

en: I deem it necessary to make a few points about the merits of the people of Isfahan. These things are considered to represent the identity of these faithful, honorable and persistent people.
ha: A nan dai ina ganin ya zama wajibi a wannan fagen in fadi ‘yan wasu jumloli dangane da falalolin Isfahan da mutanen Isfahan; wanda hakan yana a matsayin wani katin shaida ne na mutanen wannan gari masu imani da tsayin daka.

en: This is a very important point.
ha: Wannan lamari ne mai muhimmanci.

en: During the Sacred Defense Era everybody was witness to the presence of laborers from agricultural, industrial, and service sectors of the country and from urban and rural areas. Everybody was witness to their presence on military and logistic fronts. Everybody saw that our laborers played a role during the 8 years of defense.
ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, dukkanin mutanen da suka kasance a lokacin sun shaida da kuma ganin irin kasantuwar ma'aikata, ma'aikatan garuruwa da kauyuka, ma'aikatan masana'antu da bangaren aikin gona, ma'aikata masu hidima da wasunsu; kowa ya ga irin kasantuwarsu a fagagen soji ko kuma ba da kariya ta soji, kowa ya ga irin gagarumar gudummawar da ma'aikatanmu suka bayar tsawon wadannan shekaru takwas na kariya.

en: The mosque is the manifestation of the union of the world and the hereafter and the union of individuals and society in Islamic ideology.
ha: Masallaci alama ce da ke nuni da irin alakar da ke tsakanin duniya da lahira da kuma kulla alaka ta daidaiku da ta al'ummance a mahanga ta Musulunci.

en: Of course, by relying on your firm determination, you dear people of Iran will remove this obstacle from your path, just as you removed the other obstacles that lay on your path.
ha: Tabbas ku din nan al'ummar Iran, sakamakon wannan tsayayyiyar azama ta ku, kun sami nasarar kawar da ababe masu kawo cikas daga hanyarku, insha Allahu a nan gaba ma za ku kawar da wadannan abubuwa daga kan hanyarku.

en: The brothers and sisters who will come together to form this Majlis in the near future â€“ both the ones who have already been elected and the ones who will be elected during the second round â€“ should know what a heavy responsibility has been placed on their shoulders.
ha: Saboda haka tun daga yanzu nake kiran wadannan ‘yan'uwa maza da mata wadanda za su shigo majalisar insha Allahu - wato wadanda ya zuwa yanzu aka zabe su da kuma wadanda za a zaba a zagaye na biyu na zaben - da cewa lalle ya kamata su fahimci irin nauyi mai girman da ke wuyansu.

en: After the passage of years, this thought seeped into the bodies and minds of nations. They gradually changed until a capacity was created.
ha: Bayan gushewar shekara da shekaru, a hankali a hankali wannan tunani ya fara kutsawa cikin zukata da kwakwalan al'ummomi; a sannu a hankali ya samu ginuwa har zuwa lokacin da wata dama ta samu.

en: But this is the general attitude. When I look at you dear commanders, I really thank God for being generous to this nation and assigning such faithful and sincere elements to these great positions of responsibility.
ha: Ni dai a duk lokacin da na kalli kwamandojinmu masu girma - wadanda ku din nan ne - alal hakika na kan gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki saboda falalar da Ya yi wa wannan al'umma da kuma sanya irin wadannan muminan jami'ai masu ikhalsi a kan wadannan ayyuka masu girma.

en: Creation of different infrastructures in the country and technical and engineering capabilities in different industries - these are all advances.
ha: An samar da abubuwan gina kasa daban-daban, kwarewa ta fasaha a bangaren masana'antu, dukkanin wadannan ci gaba ne.

en: Participating in the ceremonies to express your hatred towards polytheism is itself great publicity for Islam, which shows that you have accepted the hajj in its totality.
ha: Ita kanta wannan halartar, isar da sako ne. Hakan lamari ne da ke nuni da cewa kun amince da aikin hajji da dukkanin bangarorinsa.

en: The Leader referred to the recent events in the Ministry of Intelligence and added: "Take a look at the propaganda broadcast by foreign media about these events - which are not very important. See what uproar they have caused. They are saying in their analyses that there is a rift in the ruling system of the Islamic Republic and that the President is not listening to the Leader."
ha: Yayin da ya ke magana kan batun da ya shafi batun sauya ministan tsaron cikin gida da tattaro bayanan sirri na Iran da kuma abubuwan da suka biyo baya kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana cewar: Ku dubi irin farfagandar da kafafen watsa labaran ‘yan kasashen waje suka dinga yi dangane da wannan lamari wanda ba shi da wani muhimmancin gaske, ku ga irin tada jijiyoyin wuyan da suka yi, suna cewa an sami rikici cikin tsarin Musulunci ta yadda shugaban kasa ya ki jin maganar Jagora.

en: Before the political activities of the years 1341 and 1342 were in full swing, I had observed signs of vigilance and cleverness among the youth of Qom.
ha: Kafin wannan gwagwarmaya ta yi karfi sosai a shekarun 1341 da 1342 (1962-63), to lalle mu mun ga alamun wayo da sanin ya kamatan matasan Kum.

en: It is necessary to take this issue as seriously as possible so that the path is opened up for ordinary people.
ha: Wajibi ne a yi dukkanin abin da za'a iya wajen daukan wannan aikin da dukkanin karfi saboda cikin yardar Allah hanya ta zamanto ta budu wa mutane; gwargwadon yadda zukata suka fahimci lamarin Mahdi sannan kuma suka debe kewa hakan al'amarin wannan ma'abocin girma zai dada fito mana fili da kuma jinsa a jiki a matsayin mu na mutanen da mu ke zamanin fakuwarsa da kuma samun alaka sosai da shi.

en: They forced the Imam (r.a.) out of his home and separated him from his family, friends and relatives. They exiled him to another part of the world.
ha: Gwmnatin wancan lokacin ta raba Imam da gidansa da rayuwarsa da iyalansa da na kurkusa da shi suka tilasta masa gudun hijira zuwa wani bangare na duniya.

en: Thankfully this work has already been initiated.
ha: Alhamdu lillahi a halin yanzu dai an riga da an fara wannan aikin.

en: Both of the views that are common in the modern world - that is, socialist and capitalist views of labor - are wrong.
ha: Dukkanin hanyoyi biyun da a halin yanzu ake da su a duniya kuma aka sansu - wato tafarkin 'yan gurguzu da na 'yan jari hujja - dukkaninsu kuskure ne.

en: We will answer threats with threats.
ha: Mu dai za mu mayar da martani ga barazana da barazana.

en: Even the day when you had intentions of overthrowing the Islamic Republic and you announced this openly, you could not do anything, and you will not be able to do anything in the future either.
ha: A wancan lokacin da kuka kasance kuna da niyyar kifar da tsarin Musuluncin, sannan kuma a fili kuke fadin hakan, kun gagara yin wani abu, a nan gaba ma ba za ku iya yin wani abu ba.

en: The reason is that there is such greatness in self-sacrifice that no society can achieve glory and dignity in the absence of it. We usually fail to see all the aspects and dimensions of the martyrdom of our martyrs and the self-sacrifices of our war veterans. This is while engaging in self-sacrifice in society, which might lead to martyrdom or physical disabilities, has many different meanings and dimensions.
ha: Dalilin hakan shi ne cewa batun sadaukar da kai yana da girman gaske don kuwa babu wata al'umma da za ta kai ga daukaka da matsayi mai girma da take son kai wa gare shi ba tare da wadannan abubuwa ba. A mafi yawan lokuta abin da muka fi ba shi muhimmanci cikin lamarin shahadar shahidai da kokarin masu sadaukarwa da kuma wadanda suka sami raunuka shi ne takaitacccen bangaren lamarin; alhali kuwa shi kansa aiki da kuma yunkuri na sadaukarwa a cikin al'umma wanda ya ke kai wa ga shahada ko kuma samun rauni yana da ma'anoni daban-daban wanda kowane guda daga cikin su yana bukatar bincike.

en: It is necessary to have faith in the Holy Quran with all your heart. Superficial faith is not enough.
ha: Wajibi ne mu yi imani da Alkur'ani da dukkanin karfi da zuciyar mu, imani na zahiri bai wadatar ba.

en: The kind of jihad that we should engage in - namely, economic jihad - is not more difficult than the other kinds of jihad that the Iranian nation has engaged in so far. But we should know what we want to do.
ha: Wannan jihadin da wajibi ne mu aiwatar da shi a yau - wato jihadi na tattalin arziki - , to ya fi sauran jihadodin da al'ummar Iran ya zuwa yanzu suka yi matsala da wahala; to amma wajibi ne mu fahimci me muke son aikatawa.

en: One should consider events in an appropriate manner. Appropriate evaluation and reflecting on the evaluation help create insight in human beings. That is to say, evaluation and reflection open one's eyes to the truth.
ha: Kyakkyawan kallo ga lamurran da suka faru, fahimtarsu da kyau sannan da kuma yin tunani a kansu lamari ne da ke haifar da basira; wato ya kan sama wa mutum mahanga mai kyau da kuma bude masa idonsa wajen ganin hakika.

en: This debt is equal to - or bigger than - their gross domestic product.
ha: Wannan bashin kuwa ya yi daidai ko kuma ya dara irin abubuwan da suke samarwa a cikin gida.

en: This is the first point that I wanted to discuss in this meeting.
ha: Wannan batu ne na farko da wajibi ne in sanar da ku.

en: That is to say, we can say the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps is responsible to preserve the current situation of the Revolution.
ha: Wato mu ce za mu tabbata a kan yanayin da juyi ya ke kai a halin yanzu; to wannan dai ba shi ne abin da muke fadi ba.

en: All the heads of the arrogant powers and Aimmatul Kufr [leaders of Kufr] have now stood against Islam. Islam is the religion of human freedom and morality and the Holy Quran is the book of mercy, wisdom, and justice. It is the duty of all freedom seekers of the world and followers of Abrahamic religions to stand by Muslims and oppose the evil policy of Islamophobia which is being carried out through such disgusting methods.
ha: A halin yanzu dukkanin ma'abota girman kan duniya da shugabannin kafirci sun tsaya kyam wajen fuskantar Musulunci, Musulunci wannan addini na 'yanci da kyautata ruhin bil'adama da kuma Alkur'ani wannan littafi na rahama da hikima da adalci; a saboda haka nauyin da ke wuyan dukkanin ma'abota 'yanci na duniya da kuma dukkanin mabiya saukakkun addinai na duniya shi ne su hada hannu waje guda tare da musulmi wajen fada da wannan bakar siyasa ta adawa da Musulunci ta wannan mummunar hanya.

en: They had become supporters of Marxism because they thought Marxism held some hope for the people.
ha: Sun zamanto 'yan gurguzu saboda suna zaton cewa akwai fata cikin gurguzu ga mutane.

en: Not only do they not show mercy to other nations, but they also show no mercy to their own people.
ha: Su din ba wai ma kawai ba sa tausayawa sauran al'ummomi ba ne, face ma hatta al'ummominsu ba sa tausaya musu.

en: It is not just a whim. No, the destiny of our nation depends on it.
ha: Ba wai cewa wani yayi ne na cewa dole ne Iran ta zamanto ta farko a wannan yankin ba; a'a saboda makomar wannan al'umma ta ta'allaka ne da hakan.

en: Your intention is evil.
ha: Niyyar ku bakar aniya ce.

en: And the experience of the past 30 years made it completely clear that the Iranian nation is capable of achieving these things.
ha: Kwarewar da muka samu cikin wadannan shekaru talatin din sun tabbatar mana da hakan tamkar hasken rana.

en: And follow that which is revealed to you from your Lord.
ha: Kuma ka bi abin da aka yi wahayi da shi zuwa gare ka daga Ubangijinka.

en: This is an achievement that you made.
ha: Wannan abu ne da kuka yi.

en: This presence is highly significant.
ha: Wannan kasantuwa ta mutane, wata irin kasantuwa ce mai ma'anar gaske.

en: And the money that could have been spent to bring about happiness for mankind is being used to make threats, excommunicate, assassinate, bomb, shed Muslim blood and to kindle the fire of long-lasting grudges.
ha: Ana ta amfani da kudaden da za a iya amfani da su wajen faranta wa bayin Allah zukata, amma sai ana amfani da su wajen barazana ga rayuwarsu, kafirta mutane da gudanar da ayyukan ta'addanci da dana bama-bamai da zubar da jinin musulmi da kuma ruruta wutar kiyayya da gaba.

en: Great achievements can be made now. That is almost all I wanted to say today.
ha: Mutum yana iya ganin cewa ana iya aiwatar da manyan ayyuka. Wadannan su ne abubuwan da muke son fadi.

en: Leader’s Speech to Students and Youth of Qom - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Daliban Jami'a Da Matasan Kum

en: These messages are made public on the Day of Bara'a.
ha: - Tun da fari ma a ranar barranta daga mushirikai ne ake fitar da wannan sakon ga mutane?

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that Iran has very good experiences in the area of launching a scientific movement, adding that Iran has made unbelievable achievements in this regard.
ha: A wani bangare na jawabin nasa, yayin da ya ke ishara da irin gagarumar kwarewar da Iran take da shi a fagen yunkuri na ilimi da kuma gagarumin sakamakon hakan, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Wajibi a kasar Iraki wacce tushen ilimi ne na kasashen larabawa a samu wani yunkuri na ilimi da motsawa ta masana da malamai da daliban jami'a a wannan fagen.

en: It was announced at the beginning of last year that the year 1390 would be named "The Year of Economic Jihad".
ha: Kamar yadda na fadi a shekarar da ta gabata cewa shekarar 1390, shekara ce ta kokarin bunkasa tattalin arziki.

en: The following is the full text of the letters written on November 24, 2013 by President Rouhani and Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution.
ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar wasikar shugaban kasar na Iran ne da kuma amsar da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ba shi.

en: Leader Urges Fulfillment of Bilateral Agreements - Khamenei.ir The Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Khamenei met today with Iraqi President Jalal Talabani and his accompanying delegation.
ha: A yau Alhamis (05-12-2013) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da firayi ministan kasar Iraki Nuri al-Maliki wanda yake ci gaba da ziyara a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

en: The second is faith in Quranic concepts and the promises that have been made in the Holy Quran.
ha: Na biyu ita ce gafala daga yarda da ma'anonin Alkur'ani da kuma yarda da alkawarin da Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya yi mana.

en: The late Agha Mohammad Ali - who was the son of the late Vahid Behbahani and one of his best students - decided to come to Kermanshah and stay.
ha: Marigayi Muhammad Ali (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) - dan marigayi Wahid Bahbahani wanda ya kasance daga cikin manyan daliban babansa - ya tashi ya zo Kermanshah ya ci gaba da rayuwa.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei described Ghadir as a beacon that shows the path of the Islamic Ummah.
ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya bayyana batun Ghadir a matsayin wani mizani na Ubangiji na auna ingantaccen tafarki al'ummar musulmi.

en: God willing, He will give you the opportunity to help the Armed Forces reach a position that this government and faithful, sincere, and hardworking elements like you deserve.
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya karbi irin wadannan wahalhalu da kokarin da kuke yi, sannan kuma Ya ba ku dacewa - wajen samun gagarumar nasara a fagagen daban-daban ta hanyar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru - kamar yadda na sanar da sunan wannan shekara ta bana ga al'ummar Iran (a matsayin shekarar rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru) - sannan dakaru masu makami na Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran su sami nasarar isa ga wajen da ya dace da wannan tsari (na Musulunci), wanda ya dace da wadannan muminan mutane masu gaskiya da hidima irin ku.

en: Leader's Speech at Inauguration of Islamic Awakening and Ulama Conference - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Wajen Taron Kasa Da Kasa Kan Malamai Da Farkawa Ta Musulunci

en: That is the Islamic view of labor, and it is my heartfelt belief.
ha: Wannan, shi ne imanin da muke da shi.

en: This is why I have named this year â€œThe Year of Economy and Culture with National Determination and Jihadi Managementâ€.
ha: A saboda haka taken wannan shekarar da kuma sunan wannan shekarar shi ne "Shekarar Tattalin Arziki Da Al'adu Tare Da Himma Ta Kasa Da Kokari A Fagen Gudanarwa".

en: This is what the Islamic movement means.
ha: Wannan ita ce ma'anar yunkurin Musuluncin.

en: The issues that exist today did not exist at that time.
ha: Batutuwan da suka kunno kai a yau, a wancan lokacin babu su.

en: As I said, one of the most important characteristics of the Revolution is that it creates role models.
ha: Na fadi cewa daya daga cikin siffofin da wannan juyi ya kebanta da shi, shi ne zama abin koyi.

en: This is the solution to the problems of this region.
ha: Wannan shi ne maganin matsalolin da wannan yanki yake fiuskanta.

en: Have you ever received the message of Islam from any sources other than the media?
ha: Shin ya zuwa yanzu kun fahimci sakon Musulunci ta wata kafa ta daban, ba kafar watsa labarai ba?

en: We changed ourselves a little and God helped us a lot and changed our situation.
ha: Dan motsi kadan muka yi wajen sauya kan mu, sai Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya taimaka mana, ya sauya yanayin mu.

en: On the other hand, they mastermind and lead brutal sectarian and ethnic terrorism among the nations of this region. The Middle East and North Africa were colonized, occupied, and humiliated for more than a century by western governments, including the British and French governments, and subsequently by the American government.
ha: Yankunan Gabas ta tsakiya da arewacin Afirka a lokaci mai tsawo sama da karni guda sun kasance cikin mulkin mallaka da mamaya da kwace musu albarkatun da suke da su da kuma wulakansu ta hannun gwamnatocin yammaci na Ingila da Faransa da sauransu kana kuma daga baya ta hannun gwamnatin Amurka; suna kwace musu albarkatun kasar da suke da su sannan kuma suka kawar da irin ruhin neman ‘yanci daga wajensu sannan kuma al'ummomin wadannan kasashe suka zamanto wadanda wadannan ‘yan kasashen waje suka yi garkuwa da su.

en: In the beginning of the year 1388, through their unprecedented presence the people gave rise to an election that was unprecedented in the history of our Revolution - and of course in the long history of our country -and was considered a prominent peak.
ha: A farkon shekarar 1388 al'ummarmu sun shirya kansu wajen fitowa maras tamka a cikin zaben da aka gudanar wanda a tarihin wannan juyi na mu - kai ana iya cewa tsawon tarihin wannan kasa ta mu - ba a taba ganin irinsa ba kuma ana iya kirga shi a matsayin wani koli na fitowar al'umma.

en: They should be careful, but at the same time they should also observe justice.
ha: Su lura sosai tare kuma da yin adalci.

en: Of course this issue was pointed out in previous administrations as well and certain things have been done in the 9th and 10th administrations, but what has been done is not enough.
ha: Wajibi ne bayyanar da komai a fili. Ko da yake a gwamnatocin da suka gabata an gabatar da hakan, a wancan gwamnatin da wannan ma an gudanar da ayyukan da yawa sai dai kuma ba su wadatar ba.

en: When there is sincerity and monotheism, these things will be eliminated.
ha: A lokacin da aka sami tsarkin zuciya, to kuwa shirka za ta kawu, za a kawar da ita gaba daya.

en: These are some of the requirements of piety.
ha: Wadannan wani bangare ne na tsoron Allah.

en: Economic jihad and jihad-like presence in economic arenas is a necessity for the Iranian nation.
ha: Kokari a fagen bunkasa tattalin arzki da kuma yin damara da tsayin daka a wannan fagen wani lamari ne da ya zama wajibi a kan al'ummar Iran.

en: The English first infiltrated and interfered in the political system of our country in the year 1800. They recruited supporters for themselves. And certain other European countries accompanied them and did the same things.
ha: Tun daga shekarar 1800 ne a karon farko turawa Ingila suka kutso cikin cibiyoyin siyasa na kasar nan da tsoma bakinsu, haka su din nan da na kurkusa da su na daga sauran kasashen turai suka ci gaba da hakan na tsawon wancan lokacin.

en: On the one hand, the hajj represents the ayah "So your God is One God, therefore to Him should you submit.
ha: Taken aikin hajj a wani bangare (daidai ya ke da fadin Allah Madaukakin Sarki cewa): Sa'an nan kuma abin bautawarku, Abin bautawa ne guda, sai ku sallama Masa.

en: So far nobody has negotiated with them on behalf of the Leader.
