en: The second advantage that the Armed Forces enjoy is that they lay down their lives in the arena of rendering services.
ha: Siffa ta biyu da dakarun soji suka kebanta da ita, ita ce cewa a lokacin gudanar da ayyukansu, suna sadaukar da rayukansu ne a fage.

en: Today if you take a look at the enemies' propaganda, you will see that when they speak about economic matters, all they want to say is that we have reached a dead end, that the problems are insurmountable, that there are many problems and that bad things will happen in the future.
ha: A saboda haka farfagandar ta karu. A yau idan kuka kalli farfagandar makiya, a matsayin misali a shafi tattalin arziki, dukkanin abin da suke fadi shi ne cewa an kai ga yanayi na tsaka mai wuya, akwai matsaloli da dama, gobe ga abin da zai faru da dai sauransu.

en: International scientific centers predict that in a few years - by the year 2017 - Iran will rank fourth in the world in terms of science.
ha: Cibiyoyin kididdigar na duniyaay suna fadin cewa zuwa shekaru masu zuwa - zuwa shekara ta 2017 - Iran za ta kai matsayi na hudu na ilimi a duniya.

en: This is the position of the Iranian nation and the position of the Islamic system. This is the clear position adopted by the Islamic Republic.
ha: Wannan ita ce matsayar tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci; wannan ita ce fitacciyar matsayar tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

en: The Iranian nation has set its sights on the peaks, and it is moving towards those peaks.
ha: Al'ummar Iran dai ta damfara idanuwanta ga kololuwar da take son kaiwa, sannan kuma tana ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan hanya ta isa ga wannan kololuwar.

en: Not only did our government officials not retreat, but they also increased our nuclear facilities by several times each year against the wish of the enemy.
ha: Amma jami'an kasar mu ba wai ma kawai ba su ja da baya ba ne, face ma dai sabanin abin da makiyan suke so a kowace shekara sai kara rubanya shirin ake yi.

en: After consulting with the Expediency Council, Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution announced general employment policies to the heads of the three braches of the government, the head of the Assembly of Experts and the chairman of the Guardian Council. The following is the full text of these policies:
ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar matanin wannan siyasar ne wanda Jagoran ya gabatar da ita ga shugabannin bangarori uku na gwamnati (majalisar ministoci, majalisar dokoki da kuma ma'aikatar shari'a), shugaban majalisar fayyace maslahar tsarin Musulunci da kuma shugaban majalisar kare tsarin mulki na kasar Iran:

en: Although the sanctions have been imposed on us under the pretext of the nuclear issue, they are lying. The nuclear issue is not the reason behind the sanctions.
ha: Duk da cewa sun fake da batun makamashin nukiliya wajen sanya takunkumin tattalin arziki, to amma hakan karya ce; lamarin nukiliya ba shi ne dalilin sanya wadannan takunkumin ba.

en: If we succeed, I assure you that we will strike a serious blow to our blood-thirsty enemies.
ha: Matukar dai muka sami damar aiwatar da wadannan ayyuka, to ku san da cewa hakan ba karamin bugu ba ne ga makiyanmu mashaya jini.

en: And it is due to this reason that this strategy has been known as "Mutual Assured Destruction" or MAD.
ha: Ba abin mamaki ba ne idan har aka kira wannan siyasar kawar da juna da sunan hauka.

en: In this regard, the year 1391, which has come to an end, was one the busiest years for our enemies.
ha: Wannan shekara ta 1391 da ta gabata, daya ce daga cikin shekarun da makiyanmu suka shagaltu ainun da ayyukansu na kiyayya.

en: One of the friends reported that a student organization has been formed in order to research economy of resistance.
ha: Wani daga cikin ‘yan'uwa ya sanar da kafa wata cibiya ta daliban jami'a don gudanar da bincike cikin fagen tattalin arziki.

en: Since the first day, the people of this region made sacrifices together with our military forces. We had brave and competent commanders from this province, Air Force commanders who would offer facilities and tactical support to Shahid Shiroudi and others in order to carry out those amazing operations, both in Army 81 and elsewhere.
ha: Akwai jami'an soji jarumai a wannan wajen; a kurkusa mun ga kwamandan dakarun sama da irin su shahid Shirudi da sauransu suka amfana da irin kwarewarsa wajen aiwatar da irin kwarewa ta kai hari da jiragen yaki mai ban mamaki, shin a bataliya ta 81 ne ko kuma a bangarori daban-daban wadanda wasu daga cikin su ma an ambace su a wannan wajen.

en: Oppressed nations are after their dignity, the same dignity that was one of the pillars of the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) call to Islam.
ha: Al'ummomin da ake zalunta suna neman tabbatar da karamar su ne; wannan daukaka da karama dai daya ne daga cikin tushen wannan sako na Annabi.

en: Our government officials identified this need in time and they did what they had to do.
ha: Jami'an kasar nan sun gano hakan, kuma cikin lokaci suka fahimci hakan, sai suka yi abin da ya kamata su yi.

en: Anybody who fails to gain knowledge will be ruled. This is the logic behind our scientific movement over the past 10-15 years.
ha: Wannan shi ne mandikin mu a wannan yunkuri na ilimi da muka sa a gaba cikin wadannan shekaru goma zuwa sha dayan (da suka gabata).

en: It is one thing to raise objections, present reasons or condemn a wrong political or religious idea, but it is quite another thing to do something that goes against ethical principles, sharia and political common sense. I reject the latter completely and decisively. It must not be done.
ha: Nuna rashin amincewa, kafa hujjoji, yin Allah wadai da wani tunani na siyasa ko na addini mara kyau wani lamari ne na daban, sannan kuma fadawa cikin tarkon wadannan ayyuka da suka saba wa kyawawan halaye da shari'a da kuma hankali na siyasa, wani abu ne na daban; to mu dai a fili muna Allah wadai da wannan na biyun, ba mu yarda da shi ba, bai kamata a aikata hakan ba. Abin bakin cikin shi ne cewa wasu suna aikata irin wadannan ayyuka.

en: According to the law, some people can run in our elections and some others cannot.
ha: Bisa doka ce wasu za su iya shigowa fagen zaben, wasu kuma ba za su iya shigowa ba.

en: I, like many Islamic scholars and sympathetic personalities in the Islamic Ummah, announce that any statement or action which fuels the fire of discord among Muslims, any insult to the sacred beliefs of each one of the Muslim denominations and any act of takfirism against Islamic denominations equals serving the camp of atheism and polytheism and betraying Islam.
ha: A wannan karon ma ni, da kuma da dama daga cikin malaman Musulunci da masu fatan alheri ga al'ummar musulmi, ina sake sanar da cewa duk wata magana da aiki da za su kara ruruta wutar sabani tsakanin musulmi haka nan kuma da cin mutumcin ababe masu tsarki (ababen girmamawa) na dukkanin al'ummar musulmi, ko kuma kafirta daya daga cikin mazhabobi na Musulunci, lalle hakan hidima ce ga sansanin kafirci sannan kuma tarayya ce cikin cutar da Musulunci.

en: That is to say, I may not agree with certain opinions expressed in such meetings, but the spirit of thinking, making choices and expressing opinions with motivation is the same thing that I wish to see among our youth.
ha: Mai yiyuwa ne ra'ayina ya bambanta da wasu daga cikin abubuwan da aka fadi din, wato mai yiyuwa ne ya zamana ban yarda da abin da aka fadi din ba, to amma ruhin tunani, zaban abubuwa da kuma ruhin bayani shi ne dai abubuwan da muke fatan gani daga wajen matasa.

en: It is the people who are doing these things.
ha: Ci gaba ne na al'ummar Iran.

en: Today the subject of Islamic Awakening, which you will discuss in this conference, tops the list of the issues of the Islamic world and the Islamic Ummah, an amazing phenomenon that will result in the re-emergence of Islamic civilization - for the Islamic Ummah and then for all of the world - in the not too distant future providing that, with Allah's permission, it stays healthy and continues.
ha: A yau maudhu'in 'farkawa ta Musulunci' wanda za ku yi magana da kuma bahasi kansa a wannan taron, ya kasance daga cikin lamurra na gaba-gaba a duniyar musulmi sannan a tsakanin al'ummar musulmi; haka nan kuma wani lamari ne mai ban mamaki wanda cikin yardar Allah idan ya tabbata da kuma ci gaba da wanzuwa, to nan ba da jimawa ba zai sake dawo da ci gaban Musulunci ga al'ummar musulmi da kuma duniya baki daya.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will hasten the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.).
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya gaggauta bayyanar wannan ma'abocin girma, sannan kuma ya sanya mu cikin mabiyansa a lokacin fakuwarsa, haka nan kuma a lokacin da ya bayyana, haka nan kuma insha Allahu ya sanya mu cikin mujahidai masu jihadi tare da shi sannan kuma mu yi shahada a karkashin tutarsa.

en: In the Name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
ha: Da Sunan Allah Mai Rahama Mai Jin Kai.

en: Those who address the people today and say different things, should discuss what they are capable of doing and what the people need.
ha: Mutanen da a yau suke magana da mutane, su gaya musu irin abubuwan da za su iya wadanda kuma mutane suke bukatarsu.

en: Of course many different things have been said about educational issues and the role of teachers.
ha: Ko da yake an fadi maganganu da dama dangane da lamarin ilimi da tarbiyya da kuma gudummawar malami.

en: We should adjust our behavior towards friends, enemies and arrogant powers according to the Quranic plan.
ha: Mu tsara halaye da alakar mu da abokai da 'yan adawa da ma'abota girman kai ta yi daidai da koyarwa ta Alkur'ani.

en: Here is the blessed House and the source of guidance from which the manifest divine signs radiated and the canopy of safety was set up to cast its universal shade.
ha: Wannan wajen shi ne dai dakin nan mai albarka kuma cibiyar shiriya wanda daga nan ne bayyanannun ayoyin Ubangiji suka sauka kuma suka baza lemar aminci akan kowa da kowa.

en: That is to say, the world is moving forward. It is moving towards perfection. It is an evolutionary movement.
ha: Saboda a halin yanzu duniya tana ci gaba da tafiya ne da kuma samun kamala; yunkurin da ake yi yunkuri ne na kamala.

en: This experience shows us that our capacities are very high. You should go after innovative activities. You should go after the ideas that have not been explored in the world - regarding warfare and intelligence strategies as well as the methods of dealing with the enemy.
ha: Ku kama hanyar sabbin ayyuka, ku kama hanyar neman ayyukan da ake bukata wadanda kuma ba a riga da an gwada su ba; a cikin ayyukanku na soji, cikin ayyukanku na taro bayanan sirri, cikin ayyukan fuskantar makiya; ku gudanar da ayyukanku da kyau; wadannan ayyuka ne masu muhimmancin gaske.

en: The spread of the culture of extravagance and luxurious lifestyles in society and the failure to stop the tendency towards violence among certain people, are harmful.
ha: Muna nuna fina-finan da su kansu wadanda suka shirya su, suna jan kunnen da kuma kaunar ganin an kawo karshen irin wannan amfani da karfi da makamai a cikin al'umma; to amma sai ga shi muna yada irin wadannan fina-finan!

en: This internal progress has a material aspect as well as a spiritual aspect.
ha: Wannan yunkuri da aiki na cikin gida yana da bangare na abin duniya da kuma bangare na ruhi.

en: The Quranic account of the two promises that Allah the Exalted gave to the mother of Prophet Moses is an example of this divine tactic.
ha: Hikiyar da Alkur'ani mai girma ya kawo dangane da alkawarin Allah ga mahaifiyar Annabi Musa, daya ne daga cikin misalan da suke tabbatar da cika alkawarin Ubangiji.

en: Therefore, it is reasonable to expect a young member who has just entered the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps to push the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps one step forward in terms of knowledge, insight, awareness and selflessness and in terms of willingness to work and doing the job in an appropriate and timely way - these are the characteristics that the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps has demonstrated during these years.
ha: A saboda haka muna fatan matasan dakarun kare juyi su zamanto sama da wadanda suka gabace su a fagen masaniya, basira, fahimta, sadaukarwa, shirin aiki, aiwatar da aiki yadda ya kamata sannan kuma a daidai lokacin da ya kamata a aiwatar da shi, wanda kuma wannan wata siffa ce wacce dakarun kare juyin juya halin Musuluncin suke da ita tsawon wadannan shekaru. A lokacin da mutum ya kalli dakarun kare juyi na yau, zai ga cewa lalle suna da matsayi mai girma.

en: In this bloody event and similar events, one of the goals of the enemies is to foment discord among Muslims.
ha: Daya daga cikin manufofin makiya na kai wannan harin da aka zubar da jini da makamancinsa shi ne haddasa sabani a tsakanin musulmi.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will accept your efforts and reward them.
ha: Lalle ina muku addu'a da cewa Allah Madaukakin Sarki ya karbi wannan aiki na ku ya kuma ba ku dacewa.

en: From this perspective, life is beautiful, and moving on in this vast arena is enjoyable.
ha: Da irin wannan mahanga, rayuwa tana da wata fuska mai kyau sannan kuma yunkuri a wannan tafarki mai fadi wani aiki ne mai faranta rai.

en: After the victory of the Islamic Revolution, different American presidents tried to ingratiate themselves [with the Islamic Republic].
ha: Shugabannin Amurka da suka zo a lokuta daban-daban bayan nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci sun kasance masu baki biyu cikin magana.

en: Based on reports, this year as well, besides barring the participation of Iranian pilgrims and pilgrims from certain other countries, they have placed pilgrims from the participating countries under unprecedented surveillance with the help of the spy agencies of the U.S. and the Zionist regime. They have made the divine sanctuary unsafe for everybody.
ha: Rahotanni suna nuni da cewa a wannan shekarar ma bayan sun hana alhazan Iran da ma na wasu kasashen zuwa aikin hajjin, sun sanya alhazan da suka tafi hajjin na bana karkashin gagarumin sanya ido ta hanyar amfani da na'urorin bincike da leken asiri na Amurka da Sahyoniyawa, inda suka sanya Dakin Allah mai aminci cikin rashin aminci ga kowa.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution referred to his meeting with the former Lebanese Prime Minister the late Rafik Hariri and spoke about his efforts for the progress of Lebanon.
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin dai ya yi ishara da ganawar da ya yi a shekarun baya da marigayi Rafik Hariri tsohon firayi ministan kasar Labanon, inda ya yi karin haske dangane da irin kokarin da ya yi wajen ciyar da kasar Labanon gaba.

en: The education system can determine the future of this country.
ha: Na'am sauyi cikin tushen ilimi da tarbiyya wani aiki ne na asasi wanda a lokuta da dama na sha gaya wa jami'an gwamnati da na bangaren ilimi da tarbiyya; alhamdu lillahi a cikin jawabin da mai girma minista ya yi ma kun ji cewa an gudanar da ayyuka masu kyau a wannan bangare wanda wajibi ne a samar da sauyi na asasi da ya yi daidai da bukatar da ake da ita, bisa asasin babbar manufa da kuma daidai da irin albarkatun da ake da su a kasa, da karfi na mutum a ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya.

en: And paradise is the reward in the hereafter.
ha: Wannan ladar kuwa a nan duniya ce haka nan kuma a can lahira ma.

en: [The Holy Quran, 33: 39] Do not be afraid of anything. Do not be afraid of the hardships that you will face on your path.
ha: Kada ku ji tsoron komai, kada ku ji tsoron wahalhalun da suke kan hanya.

en: I would like to express my condolences on the passing away of the mujahid scholar, late Ayatollah Hajj Sheikh Muhammad Asef Mohseni, to all his enthusiasts in Afghanistan and in Iran, and to his honourable family.
ha: Ina isar da sakon ta'aziyyar rasuwar babban malami marigayi Ayatullah Hajj Agha Izzuddeen Husaini Zanjani (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) ga dukkanin masoyansa a garuruwan Masshad da Zanjan haka nan kuma ga manyan malamai da makaranta Hauza sannan kuma musamman ga ‘ya'yansa da kuma iyalansa masu girma.

en: Later on when they had arrested Imam (r.a.), on the 15th of Khordad there was a great movement in Tehran as well as in Qom and other cities and the taghuti regime decided to do everything in its power to suppress the movement by relying on its army, police and security organizations.
ha: Daga baya jami'an tsaro suka kama Imam, a ranar 15 ga watan Khordad, a Tehran haka nan kuma a Kum da wasu garuruwan na daban, mutane sun fito zanga-zanga. Gwamnatin Dagutu ta wancan lokacin kuwa ta fito da dukkan karfinta, da sojoji da ‘yan sanda da sauran jami'an tsaron fararen kaya, ta yi diran mikiya a kan mutane. A ranar 15 ga watan Khordad an sami wani yunkuri na mutane.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei described the presence of US and European fleets in the region as detrimental and unpleasant and stressed: "The era in which the arrogant powers used to determine the destiny of other nations through their military presence has come to an end. Even if certain regional governments still have a tendency to follow the orders of the arrogant powers, nations of the region are vigilant and they consider foreigners' military presence in the region as a source of insecurity."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana kasantuwar jiragen yaki na ruwa na Amurka da wasu kasashen Turai a wannan yanki a matsayin lamari mai cutarwa wanda kuma ba a maraba da shi yana mai cewa: Lokacin da ma'abota girman kan duniya za su tilasta wa al'ummomi abin da suke so ta hanyar amfani da karfin soji ya wuce sannan kuma idan ma har akwai wadansu gwamnatoci na wannan yankin da suke son yin biyayya wa ma'abota girman kan, to al'ummomin wannan yankin dai sun farka sannan kuma suna ganin kasantuwar sojojin bakin haure a matsayin barazana ga wannan yankin.

en: If we had decided to buy nuclear fuel for the research reactors that we have, they would not have given a bit of it to us without making the Iranian nation completely humiliated.
ha: Idan har muna son mu samar wa wannan cibiya makamashin da take bukata, mu saya daga wajensu, don a kaskantar da al'ummar Iran sannan kuma babu wani abin da za su ba mu.

en: This power can be ensured by you members of the Armed Forces who are very familiar with the meaning of jihad and selflessness. Since the establishment of the Islamic Republic, we have never provoked any power or any country into confrontation and war. And we will try as much as we can to avoid any kind of calculated or accidental confrontation.
ha: Ku din nan dakaru masu makami wadanda kuke gudanar da ayyukanku da ke da ma'ana ta jihadi ne za ku iya tabbatar da hakan. Tun daga farkon lokacin da aka kafa tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, mu dai babu wata kasa da muka tsokana da yaki kuma a nan gaba ma ba za mu yi hakan ba, sannan kuma gwargwadon yadda za mu iya za mu hana faruwar irin wannan yakin da aka shirya da ma wanda ya kunno kai ba tare da shiri ba - to wannan dai lamari ne da yake nan a wajensa - mu dai wata al'umma ce mai son zaman lafiya da sulhu; to amma mutanen da suke son ciyar da ayyukansu gaba ta hanyar amfani da karfin soji da amfani da tursasawa, to wajibi ne su ji a jikinsu cewa akwai wata al'umma tsayayyiya a gabanta; ko shakka babu ku din nan sojin ruwa ku ne alamar irin wannan tsayin daka da karfi na al'umma a cikin teku da kuke nan a dukkanin bakin ruwan nan.

en: Even in the last few days of his life, nobody noticed any signs of despair, doubt, exhaustion, weakness or submission in the words and actions of our magnanimous Imam (r.a.).
ha: Har zuwa karshen rayuwarsa, babu wani da ya taba ganin wata alama ta rauni da gajiyawa ko shakku da mika wuya cikin maganganu da kuma ayyukan mai girma Imam.

en: Seminarians have gathered here from different parts of the country.
ha: Sun taru a wannan waje daga dukkanin bangarori na kasar nan.

en: We are not a nation that stands by and watches the fragile materialist powers â€“ which have been eaten by worms and termites from within â€“ threaten the steadfast and powerful Iranian nation.
ha: Mu dai ba al'umma ce wacce za ta ci gaba da zama tana kallon masu karfi na abin duniya mai gushewa - wadanda tsutsa da gara ta cinye su daga ciki - suna ci gaba da yin barazana ga tsayayyiyar al'umma Iran ba.

en: Towards the end of his life, in a statement written in Azar 1367 - namely, around ten years after he ordered the establishment of Basij - Imam Khomeini (r.a.) demanded that students and seminarians should establish Basij for students of universities and Islamic seminaries.
ha: A cikin wancan abin da Imam ya rubuta a watan Azar na shekarar 1367 (1988) - wato a karshen rayuwarsa, kimanin shekaru goma bayan wancan umurni na farkon da ya yi - ya bukaci daliban jami'a da na makarantun addini da su kafa dakarun Basij; wato Basijin daliban jami'a da kuma Basijin daliban addini.

en: His Eminence referred to the victory of the Iranian nation in the imposed war as another example of superiority of spiritual power over material power and added: "Amid comprehensive sanctions during the Sacred Defense Era, the Iranian nation managed to defeat the corrupt Ba'ath Party - which was receiving full support from the east and the west - by relying on the faith and courage of its youth and Armed Forces."
ha: Jagoran ya bayyana nasarar da al'ummar Iran suka samu a lokacin kallafaffen yaki a matsayin wani misali da ke nuni da wannan lamari yana mai cewa: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, duk kuwa da irin takunkumin da aka dankara mata, amma al'ummar Iran ta sami nasara a kan lalatacciyar gwamnatin Ba'athawa ta Iraki da take samun dukkanin goyon bayan kasashen yammaci da gabashi sakamakon dogaro da imanin da suke da shi da kuma jaruntakar matasa da dakarunsu masu makami.

en: Of course, we should mainly focus on what lies ahead.
ha: Tabbas wajibi ne mu ba da himma kan abubuwan da ke gabanmu.

en: Government officials made valuable and great efforts. These efforts are comparatively valuable.
ha: A shekarar 1388 al'ummar mu ta samu nasarori da jin dadi; su ma jami'an gwamnati sun gudanar da kokari mai girman gaske.

en: Everybody, including you, should be careful. You who are involved in the arena of religion and religious understanding should be very careful.
ha: Ku din nan mutane ne da kuke gudana da ayyukanku a fagen addini da masaniya da lamurra na Ubangiji, a saboda haka wajibi ne ku kara yin taka tsantsan sosai.

en: The invasion rallied Iranians behind the new regime, enhancing Imam Khomeini's stature and allowed him to consolidate and stabilize his leadership.
ha: Hakan ya tilasta masa janye wannan sabuwar kalanda tasa a shekarar 1357 (1977).

en: I express my condolences to the people of Kurdistan province, especially the bereaved families and also congratulate them on the martyrdom of these people. I also pay homage to the memory of those honorable martyrs, especially the dear martyr Mr. Mamousta Sheikholeslam.
ha: A daidai lokacin da nake isar da sakon ta'aziyya ta da kuma taya murnar (samun shahada) ga al'ummar lardin Kurdestan musamman ma dai iyalan wadanda wannan lamari ya shafa, ina jinjinawa ambaton wadannan manyan shahidai musamman ma dai babban shahidi abin kauna mai girma Mamousta Sheikk al-Islam, sannan kuma ina rokon Allah da Ya yarda da su da kuma gafarta musu da kara musu matsayi da daukaka.

en: China, Pakistan and India achieved nuclear technology with the help of other countries. But where did Iran get this technology? The article says that Iran did not get nuclear technology from a foreign country.
ha: Kasar China ta sami fasahar nukiliya, amma daga ina ta samu, kasar Pakistan ta sami fasahar nukiliya, daga wa ta samu; Indiya ma ta samu, amma daga ina ta samu; Iran kuma daga ina ta samu?

en: First of all, I would like to welcome you dear friends who are active in different economic sectors of the country.
ha: Da farko dai ina yi wa ‘yan'uwa masu girma, masu gudanar da ayyukansu a bangarori daban-daban na tattalin arzikin kasar nan, barka da zuwa.

en: We should divide our issues into primary and secondary issues, and we should focus on the primary issues.
ha: Mu dinga tunanin shiryar da wannan al'umma da kuma wannan tsarin, sannan kuma mu yi aiki don hakan.

en: This was an experience for our nation, and our nation will always stand up against such events.
ha: Lalle hakan ya zamanto darasi ga al'ummar Iran, kuma al'ummar Iran za su tsaya kyam wajen tinkarar sake faruwar hakan.

en: We should prepare ourselves for justice.
ha: Mu fahimtar da kan mu ma'anar adalci sannan kuma mu shirya kan mu wajen aiwatar da shi haka nan kuma mu zamanto masu shirin karbar gaskiya.

en: Shahid Ashrafi Esfahani was another religious scholar who had migrated to this city.
ha: Shi kansa marigayi Shahid Ashrafi Isfahani yana daga cikin malaman da suka yi hijira zuwa wannan garin.

en: Of course all of them were done around 17, 18 years ago.
ha: Ina da misalan hakan; ba wai yanzu ba kimanin shekaru sha bakwai sha zuwa takwas da suka gabata.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will enable all Muslim nations and the Islamic Ummah - particularly the elites and influential figures of the Islamic Ummah - to benefit most from the teachings of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) and the Holy Quran.
ha: Nan ba da jimawa ba za a ga faruwar hakan. Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba wa dukkanin al'ummar musulmi, musamman ma fitattu da kuma masu tasirin cikin al'ummar dacewar amfanuwa da kasantuwar Annabi da kuma koyarwar Alkur'ani iyakacin yadda za su iya.

en: Therefore, there are various arenas for jihad.
ha: A saboda haka jihadi yana da fagage daban-daban da muka fadi.

en: I hope He will make the holy heart of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake) satisfied with us.
ha: Haka nan kuma muna fatan ran mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) zai yi farin cikin da kuma yarda da mu.

en: First of all, jihad-like spirit and thought were predominant in the institute.
ha: A matakin farko shi ne ruhi da tunani na jihadi da ke cikin zukatan masu gudanar da wannan aikin.

en: The youth and children of the Iranian nation who are acquiring knowledge in different universities throughout the world are valuable saplings which have their roots in fertile soil of their own country. Like their brothers and sisters in the dynamic and active universities of the country, they will provide their country and their people with valuable fruits.
ha: Matasa da ‘ya'yan al'ummar Iran da a halin yanzu suke karatu a jami'oi daban-daban na duniya, haka nan sauran ‘yan'uwansu maza da mata da suke karatu a rayayyun jami'oin cikin gida, tamkar wata bishiya ce da ta kama kasa wacce kuma da yardar Allah za ta ba da ‘ya'yanta masu amfani da kima ga al'ummar wannan kasar.

en: They are doing everything in their power to achieve this goal and their activities reached full swing in the year 1390.
ha: Sun yi dukkanin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun cimma wannan manufar. Shekarar da ta gabatar ta kasance shekarar da suka kara kaimi ainun wajen cimma hakan.

en: This is what is happening in the world.
ha: A saboda haka daga karshe dai fidirar mutum din za ta farka; wannan shi ne abin da a halin yanzu kuke ganin yana faruwa a duniya.

en: Well, learned people and ulama have many characteristics, but this holy ayah only refers to fear of God.
ha: Na'am malamai suna da wasu siffofin, to amma sai aka zabi tsoron Allah.

en: By law, several seats in the Parliament are reserved for minority religions.
ha: Ni kuwa ina sauraron nasara a tsakiyan Khordad

en: The second reason is that you are a source of power for your country and your nation.
ha: Dalili na biyu shi ne cewa ku din nan ku ne tushen karfi da daukaka ga kasarku da kuma al'ummar ku.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei further stressed that the enemies of the Islamic Republic and the global domineering powers that are trying to use faulty reasoning to dominate the world will be defeated by the Iranian nation as well as other independent nations of the world.
ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya ci gaba da cewa: Ko shakka babu makiya tsarin Musulunci da wadannan kurayen duniya wadanda suke son mulkan duniya ta hanyoyin da suke cike da kura-kurai, to kuwa za su sha kashi a gaban ‘yantattun al'ummomi.

en: We do not distinguish between Gaza, Palestine, Tunisia, Libya, Egypt, Bahrain and Yemen.
ha: Mu dai babu wani bambanci a wajen mu tsakanin Gaza da Palastinu da Tunusiya da Libiya da Masar da Bahrain da Yemen.

en: As the founder of this great movement to whom our society owes a debt of gratitude, Imam Khomeini (r.a.) said, "If I strayed away from Islam, the people would turn their back on me."
ha: Imam - wannan mutumin wanda shi ne uban wannan yunkuri, ya sanya wa wannan al'umma rai da yunkuri mai girma - ya taba fadin cewa idan ma ni din nan zan kauce wa Musulunci, to kuwa mutane za su juya min baya.

en: I am thankful to God who bestowed His grace and guidance on these pure-hearted, pious, sincere and magnanimous people.
ha: Muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya sanya falalarsa da kuma shiriyarsa ga wadanan mutane mumina kuma masu gaskiya da shimfidar fuska.

en: Friday prayers, congregational prayers, Name of God, religious scholars, promoters of religion, founders of new schools of religious thought in certain countries - these were the elements that encouraged the people to step in.
ha: Wato abubuwan da suka tara su ne sallar juma'a, sallar jam'i, sunan Allah, malaman addini, mutane masu isar da sakon addini da kuma masu bayanin mahangar addini a kasashe. Da suka shigo cikin fage, don haka sai su ma mutane suka shigo cikin fagen.

en: [The Holy Quran, 13: 11] The Iranian nation tested this verse in action.
ha: Al'ummar Iran dai sun jarraba wannan; sun tabbatar da hakan kuma a aikace.

en: If this atmosphere prevails, it will spread like a contagious disease.
ha: Idan har suka bar hakan ya ci gaba da wanzuwa, to ko shakka babu zai ci gaba da yaduwa - tamkar cuta mai yaduwa - hakan ne ya sanya kwatsam ake ganin irin wadannan abubuwa suna faruwa hatta a wajen sallar juma'a wanda waje ne na kaskantar da kai ga Allah da kuma zikiri.

en: Not every book is beneficial. Not every book is harmless.
ha: Ba wai dole ne kowane littafi ya zamanto mai amfani ba sannan kuma ba kowane littafi ne ya ke zamantowa ba shi da cutarwa ba.

en: Fortunately this slogan was practiced throughout the year. I can claim that over the past years "Intensified Effort and Labor" was the most successful slogan in terms of attracting the attention of the people and government officials, and it closely corresponded to the situation of the country.
ha: Lalle muna iya ikirarin cewa daya daga cikin taken da mutane da jami'ai suka ba su muhimmanci da kuma aiwatar da su cikin yanayi na kasar nan shi ne dai wannan take na " Rubanya Himma Da Kuma Aiki Tukuru", wanda alal hakika tsawon wannan shekarar mutane da gwamnati sun nuna yi tukuru da kuma himma ba kama hannun yaro cikin ayyuka da yunkurinsu.

en: The fact that the Holy Prophet of Islam (s.w.a.) bowed to kiss the hand of a laborer cannot be interpreted as a ceremonial gesture. That was an effort to create a cultural norm. That was a lesson which was intended to make the Islamic Ummah appreciate laborers and their efforts throughout history.
ha: Yayin da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a.) yake sunkuyar da kai da kuma sumbantar hannun wani ma'aikaci (lebura), babu yadda za a iya fassara hakan da cewa wani lamari ne na fulako kawai; samar da wata al'ada ce; darasi ne; hakan saboda a girmama da kuma jinjinawa gagarumin aikin ma'aikata a cikin al'ummar musulmi tsawon tarihi ne.

en: Since many years ago until today, they have been fueling the fire of discord between Shia and Sunni so that they can divert the attention of the two sides from the main enemy - who is the enemy of Islam, not the enemy of Shia or Sunni in particular - and so that they can busy them with each other.
ha: A yau sannan kuma tsawon wadannan shekaru sun ba da himma wajen haifar da sabani tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna duk dai da nufin shagaltar da dukkanin bangarori biyu daga makiyansu na asali - wadanda su ne makiyan Musulunci, ba wai makiyan Shi'a kawai ba ne ko kuma Sunna kawai ba ne - da hada su fada da junansu.

en: The next point is related to the issue of exports.
ha: Batu na gaba shi ne batun fitar da kayayyaki zuwa waje.

en: One of the reasons why the general atmosphere of the country is full of determination, enthusiasm and rationality is that the youth make up a major portion of the population of our country.
ha: Daya daga cikin dalilan da suka sanya yanayin kasar nan, alhamdu lillahi, ya zamanto wani yanayi ne da ke cike da azama da irada da amfani da hankali, shi ne cewa mafi yawa daga cikin al'ummar kasar nan matasa ne.

en: Through its advances, our nation proved that refusing to live under the hegemony of America does not mean backwardness. This is an important point.
ha: Ta hanyar irin wadannan ci gaban, al'ummarmu ta tabbatar da cewa rashin zama karkashin ikon Amurka ba yana nufin koma baya ba ne; lalle wannan lamari ne mai muhimmanci.

en: The sanctions which were imposed on us by the enemies of our nation were an attempt to thwart the accelerated progress of our country.
ha: Shi kansa wannan takunkumin da makiyan al'ummar Iran suka share fagensa ko kuma suka aiwatar da shi a kan al'ummar Iran, manufar hakan ita ce cutar da irin ci gaban da kasar nan take samu da kuma dakatar da shi.

en: If you study the Leader's messages, you will see that the first point that is raised in these messages is the role of hajj in structuring the Islamic Ummah.
ha: Idan har ka dubi sakonnin Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci da kyau, za ka ga cewa batu na farko da ake gabatar da shi a cikin wannan sakon, shi ne rawar da hajji ya ke takawa wajen gina al’ummar musulmi.

en: In any case, thankfully it is clear that the year 1389 was truly "The Year of Intensified Effort and Labor".
ha: Ala kulli hal abin da ya bayyana mana a shekarar 1389 shi ne cewa alhamdu lillahi wannan shekarar, da dukkanin ma'anar kalma, shekara ce ta rubanya himma da kuma aiki tukuru.

en: Sometimes one may be asked to do something that is beyond one's capabilities. This would not be a wise demand.
ha: A wani lokacin a kan samu wani ya gabatar wa wani mutum da wata shawarar aikata wani abu wanda ya ketare irin karfin da yake da shi; to wannan dai ya saba wa hankali.

en: As we have said many times, we have no negotiations with America on different global and regional issues. We have no bilateral negotiations with America. Sometimes, we have negotiated with them in exceptional cases such as the nuclear issue and we have done so because of our interests.
ha: Kamar yadda a lokuta da dama muka sha fadi, ba ma tattaunawa da Amurka cikin batutuwa daban na duniya da na wannan yankin; ba ma da wata tattaunawa ta bangarori biyu da Amurka; a wasu lokuta ne a wasu batutuwa na musamman kamar wannan batu na nukiliya, saboda wata maslaha, muka tattauna da Amurka.

en: A lot of things have been done in this regard and it is necessary to do a lot of other things.
ha: Ko da yake wajibi ne a aiwatar da hakan a aikace; wajibi ne hakan ya bayyanar da kansa a wajen gudanarwa da kuma tsare-tsare.

en: Economic corruption is a syndrome that spreads very fast and is highly contagious. Therefore, it is necessary to pay attention to this point.
ha: Cutar ta'annuti ga tattalin arziki tana daga cikin cututtuka masu hatsarin gaske da kuma yaduwa cikin sauri; a saboda haka wajibi ne a lura da hakan sosai.

en: I think I was present in the graduation ceremonies of each and every one of you, those of you who graduated from our military academies and were awarded epaulets. I see that today our Army is more advanced than 20, 15 years ago. It is much more advanced compared to the beginning of the Revolution.
ha: A zahiri na kasance wajen dukkanin bikin gama karatunku da kuma samun lambobin girma da kuka yi; wato ku din nan da kuka tafi makarantar soji sannan kuma kuka sami karin girma. A lokacin da na duba ina ganin cewa a yau sojojinmu sun sami ci gaba sama da shekaru sha biyar zuwa ashirin din da suka gabata; ko kuma gagarumin ci gaba idan aka kwatanta da farko-farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci.

en: The events of the year 1388 - which inflicted losses on the country - took place because certain people decided not to accept the law. They decided not to accept the votes of the people.
ha: Abin da ya faru a shekarar 1388 (2009 bayan zaben shugaban kasa) - wanda ya cutar da kuma haifar da hasarori ga kasar nan - ya samo asali ne daga rashin girmama dokar da wasu suka yi. Ba sa so su girmama ra'ayin mutane.

en: You know how many machinations have been designed and how many poisoned daggers have been secretly used against our nation and our government since the victory of the Islamic Republic of Iran up until today.
ha: Ku din nan kun san irin makirci da kulle-kullen da aka kulla wa wannan al'umma da kuma wannan tsarin tun farkon nasarar jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran.

en: Of course the Iranian nation has the honor of having tolerated these sanctions for 32 years.
ha: To amma abin alfahari shi ne cewa shekaru talatin da biyu kenan al'ummar Iran suka jure wa wannan takunkumin.

en: You can have your own beliefs, but at the same time you can also cooperate with each other.
ha: Kuna iya rike akidunku, to amma ku dinga gudanar da ayyukanku na tarayya.

en: You see the different actions that they take.
ha: Kuna ganin abubuwa daban-daban da suke yi.

en: A nation that was helped by no one, a nation that was refused industrial products and technological advances managed to manufacture the second, third, and fourth generation centrifuges. All the countries that enjoy nuclear power and technology were left astonished.
ha: Al'ummar da babu wani mutumin da ya ke taimaka mata, al'ummar da aka rufe mata dukkanin kofofin na masana'antu da kere-kere da kuma ci gaba na fasaha, to amma sai ga shi ta samu nasarar kera bututun tace sinadarin uranium da kanta; hakan ya ba wa dukkanin kasashen da suka mallaki fasahar nukiliya a duniya mamaki.

en: You are my dear children.
ha: Ku din nan 'ya'yana ne masu girma.

en: The heartless and murderous Saudis locked up the injured with the dead in containers- instead of providing medical treatment and helping them or at least quenching their thirst. They murdered them.
ha: Mujiriman jami'an Saudiyya masu kekasashshen zuciya sun kulle wadanda suka sami raunukan tare da gawawwakin wadanda suka rasu cikin kullallun kwantenoni inda suka kashe su a matsayin shahidai maimakon yi musu magani da taimaka musu kai ko hatta ma da ba su ruwa don jika bakunansu da suka bushe saboda kishirwa.

en: To the believers is he most kind and merciful" [The Holy Quran, 9: 128].
ha: Sannan a tsakanin musulmi kuma ya kasance "abin da zai cuce ku yana damunsa" (Suratut Tauba 9:128).

en: These are tried and true facts. This is why I am so sensitive about the issue of humanities. I never said we should not learn the knowledge of westerners who have made a lot of progress over several centuries.
ha: Mu dai ba mu taba cewa kada a koyi irin ilmummukan da kasashen yammaci suke da su a fagage daban-daban na ilmummukan dan'adam da suka samo su tsawon karnoni daban-daban ba, ko kuma kada mu karanta littattafan su ba; abin da mu ke cewa shi ne kada mu zamanto masu koyi ne kawai.

en: Dhu al-Qa’dah 1437, September 2016
ha: Zil Ka'ada, 1437 (Satumban 2016)

en: What I am trying to say is that we should learn humanities so that we can produce an indigenous form of humanities and export it to the world.
ha: Mu muna fadin cewa ne mu koyi ilmummukan dan'adam don mu sami damar samar da shi da kuma gabatar da shi ga duniya.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution confirmed the statements of the Iraqi Prime Minister about negotiations between Iran and Iraq on strengthening economic, political and scientific relations between the two countries, further reiterating: "The scientific growth of Iran has been outstanding during the recent years and sharing these scientific experiences with Iraq can be an important step towards cooperation between the two countries."
ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake kara jaddada abin da firayi ministan kasar Irakin ya fadi dangane da tattaunawar da suka yi da jami'an gwamnatin Iran musamman kan hanyoyin da za a karfafa alakar da ke tsakanin kasashen biyu a fagagen tattalin arziki, siyasa da ilimi, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: A hakikanin gaskiya Iran ta samu gagarumin ci gaba a fagen ilimi cikin ‘yan shekarun bayan nan. A saboda fagen musayen irin wadannan kwarewar da Iran ta samu ga kasar Iraki, yana iya zama wani fage mai muhimmanci da kasashen biyu za su iya aiki tare.

en: Fortunately, today the necessary means have been prepared. The writings of Shahid Motahhari and the writings of our outstanding religious scholars and luminaries who are living in Qom, Tehran and other places - these writings contain good points and good teachings.
ha: Su kansu wadannan rubuce-rubucen shahid Mutahari da sauran manyan malamai wadanda a yau suke a Kum da Tehran da sauran wajaje, abubuwa ne masu kyau, akwai masaniya masu kyau a ciki; akwai ababe masu karfafa ruhi, akwai abubuwa na hankali, akwai kula da kuma lura da makoma.

en: Basically the Revolution was based on clarification, logical reasoning and avoidance of uproar. Uproar will work against logical reasoning.
ha: Tun farko ma dai ayyukan juyin nan sun ginu ne bisa tushen bayani da karin haske da kuma bayanin da ya yi daidai da hankali wanda kuma yake cike da dalilai ba tare da tada jijiyoyin wuya ba.

en: A few years ago - I do not remember which year it was - I had a meeting with my athlete friends.
ha: A shekarun baya, a halin yanzu dai ba zan iya tuna ko a wace shekara ba ce, a lokacin da wadannan ‘yan wasa suka zo nan muka gana, na ambaci sunan ‘Cugan'.

en: At that time, his thoughts and ideas provided answers for different people at various intellectual levels. Today many intellectual advances have been made and many intellectual problems have been resolved, but Shahid Motahhari's thoughts and ideas still provide answers to new questions.
ha: A yau ma akwai mutane a bangarori daban-daban da suke amfanuwa da maganganunsa da kuma irin tunaninsa, wajen samun amsar tambayoyin da suke da su; a yau ma da tunani suka ci gaba, inda aka magance matsaloli daban-daban da suke cikin kwakwalan masu bincike, to amma duk da haka sun kasance masu amsa sabbin tambayoyin da ake da su.

en: On Bahman 20-22, 1357, I visited one of the factories on Karaj Highway several times because I had received some troubling news. I received the news from the laborers who were working for the factory.
ha: Ni din nan na shaidi cewa a ranar sha tara da ashirin da ashirin da daya da ashirin da biyu na watan Bahman 1357 (8-11, Fabrairun 1979 wato ranakun da aka samu nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci) labarai daban-daban suna ta zuwa mana na faruwar 'yan wasu abubuwa, na tafi daya daga cikin kamfanonin da suke garin Karaj.

en: Leader’s Speech to Families of Martyrs and War Veterans of Kermanshah - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Iyalan Shahidan Lardin Kermanshah

en: Therefore, if we are careless when the year 1388 ends and the year 1389 begins at a pre-specified point in time, we will not pay attention to the change in nature. And this point in time is identical to any other moment of our lives. From a natural and mathematical point of view, the last hour of the year 1388 is not at all different from the first hour of the year 1389.
ha: Don haka ku duba ku gani cikin sauyawar shekarar 1388 (hijira shamsiyya) zuwa 1389 wanda sa'a guda ne muke ajiye mata - wannan sa'ar kuwa tamkar sauran sa'oi ne na rayuwa; a bangaren dabi'a, a bangaren yawa, wannan sa'a ta karshen shekarar 1388 ba ta da wani bambanci da sa'ar farko ta shekarar 1389; wani haddi na lokaci ne ya ke ayyanawa - idan har muka gafala, ba za mu iya fahimtar wannan gushewar dabi'a da kuma sauyi na dabi'a ba; amma idan har muka kula da wannan sauyi, to lalle za mu fahimci hakan da kuma jinsa a jiki.

en: If our country makes progress in science, all the other things will become easy.
ha: Saboda idan har ilimi ya ci gaba a kasa, to kuwa dukkanin sauran ayyuka da za su zo daga baya za su yi sauki.

en: This is a characteristic of knowledge and technology.
ha: To ilimi da fasaha suna da irin wannan siffar.

en: I hope hajj pilgrims will make efforts to receive the light of hajj and to preserve the message of hajj so that hajj can have its effect on educating the Islamic Ummah.
ha: Muna fatan alhazai za su yi kokari wajen samun wannan haske na hajji da kuma kokari wajen kiyaye sakon da ke tattare da hajji don aikin hajji ya sami damar taka rawar da yake da shi wajen tarbiyyar al'ummar musulmi.

en: This is another propaganda tactic and a downright lie.
ha: Wannan wata dabara ce ta farfaganda, sannan kuma karya ce tsagoronta.

en: Try to become familiar with each other's culture, wishes and ideals.
ha: Ku fahimci irin al'adun juna da irin fatan da kuke da shi da manyan manufofinku; ta haka za a iya samar da wata al'umma guda.

en: He stressed: “The efforts to increase the power of Iraq â€“ especially through preparing the ground for constant scientific jihad as well as through creating a widespread national movement for the construction of Iraq â€“ will increase the achievements of the Iraqi people and government and will strengthen their position.”
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Kokari wajen kara karfafa irin karfin da kasar Iraki take da shi musamman a bangaren karfafa bangaren ilimi da kuma yunkurin sake gina kasar lamari ne da zai kara ninninka irin matsayin da al'umma da kuma gwamnatin Iraki take da shi.

en: First, it is necessary to be thankful to God because these things are the result of God’s will, mercy and grace.
ha: Da farko dai wajibi ne in gode wa Allah, don kuwa hakan ya samo asali ne daga wajensa da kuma irin irada da karfi da rahama da falalarsa.

en: The same is true of the others.
ha: Su ma sauran haka suka kasance.

en: God's assistance means the assistance of the forces of nature - all of them will help you. Even supernatural forces will come to your aid. You will be assisted, and you will move ahead - just as you have up until today.
ha: Taimakon Ubangiji yana nufin taimakon dukkanin karfin da suke duniyar nan; dukkanin su za su taimaka muku; karfin da ba a iya ganinsa ma zai taimaka muku; za a taimaka muku, za ku sami ci gaba; kamar yadda a yau din nan kuka ci gaban.

en: Our consumption has been more wasteful than many countries - and in a sense, more wasteful than all countries in the world.
ha: Irin yadda muke amfani da wadannan albarkatu ya dara na da dama daga cikin kasashen duniya - mai yiyuwa ne ma ana iya cewa sama da dukkanin kasashen duniya.

en: We consider it our responsibility to help you dear people as much as we can to benefit from pure Islamic teachings and the teachings of Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) household.
ha: Lalle mu na jin cewa wani nauyi ne a wuyanmu mu gabatar muku da gwargwadon ilimin Musulunci na hakika da koyarwar Ahlulbaiti (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare su) da muke da su, gwargwadon yadda za mu iya.

en: Therefore, this is what I mean when I sometimes speak about foreign coaches.
ha: A saboda idan har a wani lokaci na yi magana dangane da masu horarwa na waje, to wannan shi ne abin da na ke nufi.

en: Dear God, make us be accompanied by the Holy Quran throughout our life.
ha: Ya Ubangiji Allah! Ka tayar da mu da Alkur'ani cikin dukkanin rayuwar mu.

en: Of course today western arrogant powers are resisting. They do not want to accept the great and undeniable fact that the regional nations have awakened.
ha: Ko da ya ke kasashen yammaci ma'abota girman kai suna ta amfani da dukkanin karfin da suke da shi; ba sa son su yarda da wannan hakika mai girma da babu wanda ya isa ya yi inkarinsa na cewa al'ummar wannan yankin dai sun farka, kuma suna riko da Musulunci; wannan dai shi ne hakikanin lamarin.

en: Therefore, insight is a compass and a beacon of guidance.
ha: Basira lamari ne mai samar da haske; basira na'ura ce mai nuna alkibla.

en: Leader’s Speech to Assembly of Experts - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa 'Yan Majalisar Kwararru

en: In the modern world those who decided to manage the world in the absence of religion are now suffering from difficulties that are strangely severe.
ha: A halin yanzu ma dai mutanen da suka cire addini cikin rayuwarsu ta duniya sannan kuma suke son gudanar da duniya ba tare da (tsoma bakin) addini ba, suna fuskantar matsaloli masu wahalar magancewa.

en: The TV channels that used to cover the details of the regional issues should now be silent about the events in Bahrain.
ha: Gidajen talabijin din da suke watsa abubuwan da suke faruwa a wannan yankin, to amma sai ga shi sun yi shiru kan lamarin Bahrain, ba sa fadin abin da ke faruwa na irin zubar da jinin mutanen Bahrain da ake yi.

en: As long as the corrupt and wicked government of the Soviet Union was in power, it was opposed to Islam and the Islamic system, just like the so-called system of liberal democracy. You know that they disagreed about many issues, but there were a few issues that they all agreed on. One of those issues - and the most important one - was confronting Islamic uprisings, Islamic progress and Islamic systems.
ha: Wannan karkatacciyar hukumar ta tarayyar Sobiyeti, tamkar wannan hukumar ta 'yan jari hujja, ta ci gaba da adawa da Musulunci da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran har zuwa lokacin da ta fadi. Kun san cewa suna da sabani cikin daruruwan abubuwa (a tsakaninsu), to amma sun yi tarayya cikin wasu abubuwan, daya daga cikin wadannan abubuwan kuwa shi ne gaba da kuma fada da koyarwar Musulunci da ci gaban Musulunci da tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

en: Of course, fortunately many advances have been made today in the area of domestic production.
ha: Ko da yake abin farin cikin shi ne cewa an samu ci gaba da yawa a fagen kayayyakin da ake samarwa a cikin gida.

en: When these youth and adolescents entered the arena and reflected the message that had been yelled by the Imam (r.a.) 14 years earlier, the mercenary killers of America took revenge on them. They opened fire on the youth.

en: Leader’s Address to People Active in Economic Sector - Khamenei.ir The following is the full text of the speech delivered on August 18, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with a number of people from economic sectors of the country.
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Masu Gudanar Da Ayyuka A Bangaren Tattalin Arziki Shimfida: A ranar laraba 17, Augustan 2011 wacce ta yi daidai da ranar 16 ga watan Ramalana mai alfarma ne, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da wasu daga cikin masu gudanar da ayyukansu a bangaren tattalin arziki, jami'an gwamnati da sauran ‘yan kasuwa inda suka tattauna kan yanayin tattalin arzikin kasar Iran.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution reiterated that the Bahraini government and the countries which have deployed their forces in Bahrain have made a mistake. ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Baya ga hukumar Bahrain din, su ma wadanda suka zo kasar daga waje sun yi kuskure. en: In this year as always, there are both opportunities and threats.
ha: A wannan shekarar ma kamar yadda aka saba, akwai dama da kuma barazana da kalubale.

en: It is the protest of a nation against the oppression that is being imposed on it, just like what happened in Tunisia and Egypt and just like what is happening in Libya and Yemen: there is no difference.
ha: Nuna rashin amincewar wata al'umma ce da zaluncin da ake yi mata; kamar abin da ya faru a kasar Tunusiya, kamar yadda ya faru a Masar, kamar abubuwan da suke faruwa a kasar Libiya, haka nan tamkar abin da ke faruwa ne a Yemen; babu wani bambanci.

en: You should be prepared.
ha: Don haka wajibi ne ku zamanto cikin shiri.

en: Find you own way by resorting to the blessed fountainhead of Islam and give back foreigners' prescriptions to themselves.
ha: Ku sama wa kanku mafita ta hanyar dogaro da koyarwar Musulunci sannan ku mayar wa bakin haure abin da suka zo muku da shi.

en: This oppression was the result of the weakness of incompetent, corrupt and materialistic monarchies and the dynamism that their enemies enjoyed.
ha: Raunin hukumar sarakuna maras dacewa mai son duniya da kuma irin makircin da makiya suke aikatawa shi ne dalilin faruwar wannan zaluncin.

en: All these areas are important and necessary. By Allah's favor, working on these areas is indeed a genuine charitable act that will be accepted by Allah the Exalted.
ha: Dukkanin wadannan ayyuka ne masu muhimmanci, ayyuka ne na wajibi sannan kuma alal hakika aiki a wadannan bangarori wata ciyarwa ce ta hakika sannan kuma sadaka ce abar karbuwa a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki, insha Allahu.

en: Of course, I am not claiming that this is definitely the case everywhere because I do not have all the necessary information. The situation might be different in a particular corner of the world.
ha: Ko da yake ni dai ba zan iya ikirarin cewa a hakikanin gaskiya haka lamarin ya ke a duk fadin duniyar ba, don kuwa ba ni da cikakkiyar masaniya; mai yiyuwa ne lamarin ya zamanto ba haka yake a nan da can ba - to amma abin da muka gani da kuma ji, a mafi yawan lokuta haka lamarin yake a duniya.

en: Of course they try to keep the world of Islam busy.
ha: Koda yake suna iyakacin kokarinsu wajen ganin sun shagaltar da duniyar musulmi.

en: These different mountains of problems that oppressed people across the world are faced with will not be eliminated unless through the willpower and firm determination of believers.
ha: Idan ba tare da azama da karfafffiyar irada ta imani ba, ba za a iya kawar da wannan matsaloli daban-daban da suke kawo cikas ga hanyar raunanan duniya ba.

en: The western world, which is enslaved by the hegemony of material power, is frustrated today.
ha: Kasashen yammaci ma wadanda suka fada tarkon ikon abin duniya, su ma dai sun fara damuwa.

en: You are young.
ha: Ku din nan matasa ne.

en: Your youthful view, your sincere worship, your repentance, your divine remembrance, your appeal for divine assistance and your solemn praying are very effective.
ha: Irin wannan mahanga ta samartaka da kuke da ita, duk wata magana ta zuci da za ku yi da Allah, duk wani istigfari da hailala da takbiri da neman taimako da kankan da kai a gaban Allah Madaukakin Sarki, wani lamari ne mai tasirin gaske a wajenku.

en: It is 35 years now that we in the Islamic Republic are letting out this cry. We do not only speak, rather we act.
ha: Shekaru 35 kenan a nan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran mu ke rera wannan take (na hadin kai); ba wai kawai a baki ba, a aikace ma mun aikata hakan.

en: That is to say, the assassinations should be seen as a link in the chain of the enemy's plots. There are several integrated levels of action, including economic sanctions, promotion of corruption, promotion of addiction, security measures and undermining the faith of the people - both their faith in Islam and their faith in the Revolution.
ha: Akwai wata alaka tsakaninsu, wato a matsayin misali tsakanin silsilar takunkumin tattalin arziki, yada lalata, yada muggan kwayoyi, hare-hare, haifar da rauni da girgiza cikin tushe da lamurra na akida; shin akida ta Musulunci ne ko kuma akida ta juyin juya halin Musulunci.

en: They should not provoke each other's feelings, they should not insult each other's holy beliefs and they should not fuel the fire of discord between Muslim tribes and groups - particularly between Shia and Sunni - because this is what the enemies of Islam want.
ha: Kada su motsa da sosa ran junansu, kada su ci zarafin ababe masu tsarki na junansu, kada su hura wutar fitina da rikici tsakanin mazhabobi da kungiyoyi na musulmi musamman tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna - wanda hakan shi ne abin da makiya Musulunci suke so.

en: Allah the Exalted will definitely help the people whose efforts, work and determination have this orientation, just the way He has assisted us during the past 32 years. Without God's assistance it was not possible for a nation to stand up against global arrogance. There are rich sources of natural gas in this region, which we share with the neighboring countries.
ha: Idan ba tare da irada ta Ubangiji ba, babu yadda za a yi wata al'umma ta iya irin wannan tsayin dakan a gaban ma'abota girman kan duniya. A wannan yanki da ke da arzikin iskar gas, lalle muna da abokan tarayya; ni dai ba na son in yi amfani da kalmar abokan hamayya (ga kasashen da suke makwabtaka da mu).

en: On my trips to different cities, as far as I am concerned one of the greatest and most important meetings is the meetings that are arranged with the honorable families of our martyrs and war veterans.
ha: A wajena daya daga cikin mafiya muhimmancin ganawa a dukkanin ziyarar da na ke kai wa garuruwa daban-daban, ita ce ganawa da iyalan shahidai, masu sadaukarwa da kuma wadanda suka sami raunuka.

en: Before the elections and the fitna that followed, some people - who had successfully passed the test of fitna - used to come to me and say that the year 1388 would be a difficult time in terms of economic matters. They used to present the situation as gloomy, disappointing and overwhelming.
ha: Kafin fara zabe da wannan lamari na fitinar da ta kunno kai, wasu daga cikin wadanda suka taka rawa cikin wannan fitina, suna zuwa wajenmu suna gaya mana cewa lalle shekara mai zuwa za ta zamanto shekara mai wahala - wato wannan shekarar ta 2009 - a fagen tattalin arziki kaza ne zai faru, yanayin da ake ciki yanayi ne da ke cike da matsaloli wadanda ba za a iya maganinsu ba.

en: In his official addresses, the American president speaks about Iran's economic problems as if he is speaking about his victories.
ha: (A kwanakin baya) shugaban kasar Amurka, a cikin jawabin da ya yi, ya yi magana kan matsalolin tattalin arzikin da Iran take fuskanta; tamkar yana magana ne kan irin nasararorin da ya samu.

en: The Revolution is moving in this direction.
ha: A wannan fagen kan juyin nan yana ci gaba da tafiya ne.

en: The late Chamran employed them.
ha: Marigayi Chamran ne ya dauke su aiki.

en: The spiritual spring of Hajj has arrived with its freshness, purity and God-given grandeur and majesty, gathering again the faithful and eager hearts like butterflies encircling the Ka'bah of divine unity and Islamic solidarity. Camped at Makkah and Mina, Arafat and Mash'ar are the fortunate human beings who, having responded to the call of â€œproclaim the Hajj to all the peopleâ€, are being honored with the hospitality of the clement and munificent Lord.
ha: A halin yanzu dai lokacin aikin hajji da dukkanin sabuntaka da tsarki da girma da daukaka da yake da shi ya yi, sannan kuma zukatan muminai masu tsananin shauki suna nan tamkar malam buda littafi suna ta zagaya Dakin Ka'aba, wannan daki na tauhidi da hadin kai. Garin Makka da Mina da Mash'ar da Arafa wajaje ne na mutanen da suka sami nasara amsa kiran-kur'ani da ke cewa: "Kuma ka yi yekuwa ga mutane da wajabcin Hajji..." sannan kuma suka sami shiga cikin bakuntaka ta Ubangiji Ma'abocin gafara da baiwa.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described insulting the tomb of Hujr ibn Adi, the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) companion, as a tragic event, stressing: "Muslims - particularly scientific, political and religious personalities of the world of Islam - should carry out their responsibility in the face of this malevolent move and they should prevent the fire of fitna from spreading." Ayatollah Khamenei described elections as the great manifestation of national and Islamic trust, adding: "The Guardian Council, organizations in charge of holding and supervising elections and organizations in charge of creating a safe and healthy environment for elections are responsible for safeguarding this great trust. They have important and valuable responsibilities which will exert a permanent influence on the country."
ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da ya ke magana kan lamari mai bakanta rai da ya faru a kasar Siriya na keta hurumin kabarin babban sahabin nan Hijr bn Adi, Jagoran cewa ya yi: Wajibi ne al'ummar musulmi musamman manyan cikinsu da suka hada malamai da sauran ‘yan siyasa sun sauke nauyin da ke wuyansu na fada da wannan bakar aniya ta masu kafirta musulmi, sannan kuma su yi abin da za su iya wajen hana yaduwa wutar wannan fitinar. Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana zaben a matsayin wata amana mai girma ta kasa da kuma Musulunci yana mai cewa: majalisar kiyaye kundin tsarin mulki da sauran cibiyoyi masu sanya ido da kuma tabbatar da tsaro suna dauke da wannan amana ce mai girma, kamar yadda wannan aiki mai girma da muhimmanci kuma yake wuyansu ne. Har ila yau yayin da yake ishara da rawar da zabe ya ke takawa wajen sayar rayar da kasa da kuma tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci, Ayatullah Khamenei cewa ya yi: Fitowar al'umma a lokacin zabubbukan da aka gudanar tsawon shekaru 34 da suka gabata (a Iran), a koda yaushe sun kasance masu kore wasu bala'oi daga kasar Iran da kuma kara karfin gwuiwa ga kasa, al'umma da kuma wannan juyi na Musulunci ne.

en: The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) said, "Daily prayers are a means for every pious man to get closer to God."
ha: Amirul Muminin (a.s) yana fadin cewa: (salla tana) "kusata dukkanin wani mai tsoron Allah zuwa ga Ubangiji" shi kansa hakan lamari ne da ke kusata mutum.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that certain developments in the past few months have revealed the power of the Iraqi people and government in the Arab and Muslim world.
ha: Jagoran ya bayyana cewar wasu batutuwa da suka faru a kasar Irakin cikin 'yan watannin baya-bayan nan lamurra ne da suke nuni da irin karfin da al'umma da kuma gwamnatin Irakin suke da shi a kasashen larabawa da na musulmi.

en: By Allah's favor, everybody will work hard.
ha: Muna fatan kowa zai kara himma.

en: It is necessary to help promote justice.
ha: Haka nan kuma wajibi ne a taimaka wa ci gaban adalci.

en: Today his ideas are still alive and novel even after the passage of 30 years since his martyrdom.
ha: A yau din nan bayan shekaru talatin da shahadar wannan babban mutum, amma maganganunsa suna nan kamar na yau; kamar yau aka rubuta su.

en: In the year 1358, when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) had been hospitalized, a temporary platform was built in front of the hospital and a few units of the Army paraded past the platform and Imam Khomeini (r.a.) announced the day as Army Day.
ha: A wancan lokacin a shekarar 1358 (1979) Imam ya kasance yana asibiti a kwance, a nan gaban asibitin aka shirya wani waje sannan sojoji suka zo suka yi fareti sannan kuma Imam ya sanar da wannan ranar a matsayin ranar sojoji. Lalle ina da masaniya dangane da yanayin sojoji.

en: This was a perfect instance of self-sacrifice and it safeguarded Islam.
ha: Wannan shi ne sadaukarwa ta gaba daya sannan da kuma kiyaye Musulunci.

en: The first occasion that the 13th of Aban represents is the day when our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was forced into exile in the year 1343.
ha: Batu na farko da ya faru a wannan ranar shi ne cewa a shekarar 1343 (1964) a irin wannan ranar ce (tsohuwar gwamnatin Shah), ta tilasta wa Imaminmu mai girma gudun hijira.

en: Imam Khamenei's message of condolences to the President - Khamenei.ir
ha: A yammacin yau Asabar (9-3-2013) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya fitar da sakon ta'aziyyar rasuwar babban malami, marubuci sannan kuma wakilin Jagoran a garin Lorestan, Hujjatul Islam wal Muslimin Hajj Sayyid Mujtaba Musawi Lari:

en: This cannot be achieved except with the cooperation, understanding and solidarity of Islamic countries.
ha: Ba kuma za sa sami kaiwa ga hakan ba sai ta hanyar hadin kai da aiki kafada da kafada tsakanin kasashen musulmi.

en: The nature of the issue in Syria is different from the nature of the issue in these countries.
ha: Akwai bambanci tsakanin abin da ke faruwa a kasar Siriya da abin da ke faruwa a sauran kasashen.

en: Independence, freedom, justice, refusal to bow to despotism and colonialism, rejection of ethnic, racial, and religious discrimination, and the outright rejection of Zionism, which, today, comprise the pivots of the movements in Islamic countries, are all inspired by Islam and the Quran.
ha: ‘Yanci, ‘yanci kai, neman tabbatar da adalci, rashin mika kai ga mulkin kama-karya da mulkin mallaka, kore nuna bambanci na kabilanci da launin fata da mazhana da kuma rashin amincewa da sahyoniyanci, dukkanin wadannan tushe ne na asali na yunkuri da juyin juya halin kasashen musulmi na yau, sannan kuma dukkanin su sun samo asali ne daga Musulunci da kuma Alkur'ani.

en: They considered it to be the greatest rally in the world. Who had such an opinion?
ha: Ta yadda suka bayyana shi a matsayin taro mafi girma a duniya. Waye suka fadi hakan?

en: I hope Allah the Exalted makes us successful in following this path and protecting ourselves against deviations.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba mu dacewar ci gaba da tafiya a kan wannan tafarki da kyau, ya kare mu daga kauce wa hanya, don mu sami damar isa ga wannan babbar manufa sannan kuma mu zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

en: What the responsibility of Muslims - whether Shia or Sunni Muslims - is, is that they should not help the enemy by provoking the feelings of one another.
ha: Nauyin da ke wuyan musulmi - shin musulmi ‘yan Shi'ane, ko kuma musulmi ‘yan Sunna - shi ne su fahimci cewa sosa zukatan junansu wani lamari ne da zai taimaka wa makiya cimma burinsu.

en: In fact, all the tests that we go through involve one essential element - all tests involve a sacrifice.
ha: Dukkanin jarabawan da muke ji, wannan shi ne yanayinsa na asali; ya kan sanya mana wani tafarki na sadaukarwa da kuma runtse idanuwa.

en: No, time passes like a flash and soon it will be time to leave this world. If you want to do something with this short life, you should prepare the way while you are young.
ha: Ina, cikin gaggawa za su wuce; daga nan kuma sai maganar tafiya. Idan har cikin dan wannan karamin lokaci an tsara mutum zai sami damar aikata wani abu, ya sami damar rike wani guzuri, to wajibi ne tun lokacin samartakansa ya samar da hakan.

en: They used to say something else. They had a different analysis.
ha: Wani abu na daban su ke fadi, ko kuma suna da wata fassara ta daban.

en: Of course there were also certain pseudo-revolutions in the Middle East region and mostly in North Africa and Latin America, which were not genuine revolutions.
ha: Mun shaidi wasu yunkuri makamantan juyin juya hali da suka faru a yankin gabas ta tsakiya da kuma arewacin Afirka da Latin Amurka wadanda alal hakika ba wai juyin juya hali ba ne; a mafi yawan lokuta juyin mulki ne.

en: [The Holy Quran, 74: 1-7]
ha: (Suratul Muddathir 74:1-7).

en: And if you do not do anything about this laziness, it will increase.
ha: Gwargwadon yadda mutum ya share wa wannan ragwantakar fage, gwargwadon yadda za ta ci gaba da karuwa.

en: If a nation enjoys such insight and such patience, it will definitely reach the peaks.
ha: Idan har aka sami irin wannan basirar da kuma irin wannan hakurin cikin al'umma, to ko shakka babu wannan al'umma za ta kai ga kololuwar da take son kai wa gare ta.

en: This is the way in which production of knowledge contributes to national wealth and addresses the needs of the people.
ha: Hakan mayar tafarkin samar da ilimi zuwa ga dukiya ta kasa ne da kuma biyan bukatun mutane.

en: Therefore, they are making efforts to portray Shia Muslims as a group that does not belong to the Muslim world."
ha: A saboda haka ne suke iyakacin kokarinsu wajen fitar da miliyoyin ‘yan Shi'a daga cikin duniyar musulmi.

en: As the dear youth said, I just want to tell you that Allah the Exalted will reward you and He will help you, your families and your relatives benefit from divine blessings and the prayers of the Imam of the Age (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake). Greetings be upon you and Allah's mercy and blessings
ha: Ina gode wa Allah, sannan kuma kamar yadda wannan matashi mai girma wanda a cikin abin da ya karanta ya bayyana cewar manufar zuwa ta ita ce yi muku ban gajiya da neman kara muku karfin gwuiwa, ina son in gaya muku cewa ya kamata ku san cewa ladar wannan kokari na ku yana nan a kiyaye a wajen Allah Madaukakin Sarki, sannan ku din nan da kuma iyalanku ko shakka babu kuna cikin tausayawa da kuma falala ta Ubangiji, sannan kuma insha Allahu za ku zamanto cikin addu'oin mai girma Bakiyatullah (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi).

en: However, individual orientations and organizational orientations have different meanings. When the orientation of a society or organization is wrong, individual efforts will not be effective in that society, no matter how strenuous they are.
ha: A lokacin da mahanga ta gaba daya ta wata hukuma da wata al'umma ta zamanto bisa kuskure, to kuwa mahanga ta daidaiku komai yawansu a cikin wannan gungun ko hukumar, ba za ta zamanto mai wata sakamako mai kyau ba.

en: Therefore, if we follow the path of God, He will undoubtedly help us."
ha: Kuma matukar muka kasance tare da Allah Madaukakin Sarki, ko shakka babu Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai kasance tare da mu.

en: Jaafar Nimeiry gradually changed from an anti-west element who had carried out a coup against his pro-western government to a western puppet and mercenary.
ha: Ja'afar Numeiri ya kasance wani mutum mai kyamar yammaci wanda ya yi juyin mulki ga wata hukuma ta yammaci, amma daga baya ya zamanto wani yaron kasashen yammaci kuma dan amshin shatansu.

en: They said this in their meetings with us and in the interviews they gave. They also said the same thing when they returned to their home countries.
ha: Sun gaya mana hakan, sannan kuma cikin hirar da suka yi da kafafen watsa labarai duk sun fadi hakan, haka nan kuma al'ummominsu duk sun gaskata hakan bayan da suka koma gida.

en: Some people used to pretend that if we sit at the negotiating table with the Americans, many of our problems will be solved.
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Wasu mutane suna ganin idan har muka zauna teburin tattaunawa da Amurkawa, lalle za a iya magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli.

en: Were the interests of America served by the mercenary soldiers who shot the people, dismembered their bodies and took pictures with the body parts?
ha: Shin akwai kare manufofin Amurka cikin yadda sojojin (kasar) suke zuwa su bude wuta kan al'umma, su keta hurumin gawawwakinsu sannan kuma su dinga daukan hotona tare da su?

en: We have made good advances in sectors related to production, services, agriculture, industry, knowledge-based industries and different other areas which were discussed in this meeting.
ha: Mun sami ci gaba da kyau a bangaren samar da kayayyakin da ake bukata, a bangaren hidima, a bangaren aikin gona, a bangaren masana'antu da sauran bangarori na ilimi da sauransu da aka ambace su a nan.

en: Now, I am going home with complete health.
ha: A zahiri dai ga shi zan koma gida cikin koshin lafiya.

en: And the facilities that we currently have at our disposal are not comparable to the facilities we used to have at the beginning of the Revolution - or before the Revolution for that matter. Nor are our facilities comparable to many of the countries that did not have to deal with the difficulties we have faced - the countries that have pinned their hopes on the assistance of foreigners and their enemies.
ha: Irin karfin da muke da shi a yau, ba abu ne da za a iya kwatanta shi da irin karfin da muke da shi a farko-farkon juyin juya halin Musulunci ba - ko kuma kafin nasarar juyin juya halin Musuluncin ba - ba abu ne da za a iya kwatanta shi da ma na wasu kasashe da dama ba wadanda shekara da shekaru ma ba su da irin wadannan matsaloli; sun rmika zukatansu ne suna jiran taimakon 'yan kasashen waje da kuma makiya.

en: Thirty years of machinations, conspiracy, and enmity - anything ranging from staging a coup d'état and causing the eight-year imposed war to imposing sanctions and freezing our assets; from psychological and propaganda warfare and media confrontation to efforts to thwart our scientific growth and acquisition of knowledge- especially nuclear knowledge- to engaging in open provocation and interference in the impressive and significant presidential election - all these turned into scenes of the enemy's defeat, disgrace, and confusion. And the ayah "surely the machinations of the devil is weak" [the Holy Quran, Sura al-Nisa (4), Ayah 76] was once again realized in front of the eyes of the Iranian people.
ha: Shekaru talatin na kafar ungulu da makirce-makirce da kiyayya kama daga kokarin juyin mulki da kallafaffen yaki na shekaru takwas, har zuwa ga takunkumi da kwace dukiya, haka nan kuma kama daga yaki irin na kwakwalwa da bakar farfaganda da amfani da kafafen watsa labarai (wajen yada kararraki) har zuwa ga kokari wajen hana ci gaba na ilimi da kuma samun ilmummuka na zamani ciki kuwa har da ilimi da fasahar nukiliya, kai hatta ma da tunzurawa da tsoma baki na fili cikin gagarumin zaben (shugaban kasa) na baya-bayan nan da aka gudanar, amma dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun zamanto wani fage ne na shan kashin makiya, sannan kuma a wani karon ma wannan aya ta "Hakika kaidin Shaidan ya kasance mai rauni" ta sake bayyana a gaban idanun al'ummar Iran.

en: We should learn from the past and we should look to the future and make decisions for it with open eyes and with wise hearts.
ha: Mu dau darussa daga shekarun baya, sannan kuma mu kalli gobe da kuma makomarmu da idon basira da kuma zuciyar da take a farke don daukar matakan da suka dace da makomarmu.

en: At that time the people on the coast of the Persian Gulf - especially the people of Bushehr and Hormozgan provinces - rendered a lot of services to the country.
ha: A wancan lokacin mutanen wannan yanki na bakin ruwa musamman mutanen lardin Bushehr da kuma lardin Hormuzgan, sun yi gagarumar hidima, sun tsaya kyam, sun nuna jaruntaka sannan kuma sun tabbatar da daukaka da kuma tsayin dakan da suke da shi.

en: This requires economic jihad.
ha: Ko shakka babu hakan yana bukatar jihadi (kokari) na tattalin arziki.

en: You should know that the difference between 20, 30 or 70 years of age is not that great. Time passes like a flash.
ha: Lalle ya kamata ku san cewa; tazarar da ke tsakanin shekaru ashirin da shekaru talatin har zuwa shekaru saba'in har zuwa sama da saba'in, wato irin shekarun da muke da shi, tazara ce karama; tamkar wutan lantarki haka za ta wuce.

en: For this reason, as far as I know, in all divine religions there are teachings which are essentially the same as Mahdaviat.
ha: A saboda haka ne a cikin dukkanin addinan Ubangiji - gwargwadon ilimin da muke da shi - akwai wani abu da wannan ma'ana ta hakika ta akidar Mahdi, sai dai kawai a yanayi da aka gurbata shi, ta yanayi da ke tattare da rudu ba tare da abin da suke son fadi ya fito fili ba.

en: What is noteworthy is the economic movement of our government officials which was accompanied by the exemplary and praiseworthy cooperation of the people throughout the year 1390.
ha: Lalle irin ayyukann da jami'an kasar nan suka gudanar a fagen tattalin arziki tare da kuma irin hadin kan da mutane suka ba su tsawon shekarar da ta gabatan wani lamari ne abin ambato da jinjinawa.

en: But until you achieve ultimate victory, the battle and the confrontation will go on.
ha: To amma har zuwa ga samun wannan nasara ta karshe, to kuwa gwagwarmaya da fada da kalubale za su ci gaba da bayyana.

en: The day when Islam achieved victory in Iran and managed to capture the fort of America and Zionism in one of the most important countries in this extremely sensitive region, those who were wise and quick to learn realized that if they had patience and insight, other victories will come one after another.
ha: A lokacin da Musulunci ya yi nasara a Iran sannan kuma ya sami nasarar kwace tungar Amurka da sahyoniyawa a daya daga cikin yankuna masu muhimmanci na wannan yanki mai matukar muhimmanci, masu yawo da daukan darasi da hikima sun san cewa idan har aka yi hakuri da kuma amfani da basira, to kuwa za a ci gaba da samun nasarori daya bayan daya.

en: Whenever we travel to other countries and take part in different conferences, everybody mentions these points and praises these messages. We travel to around 50 countries every year and we speak to different Muslim individuals, groups and leaders, particularly political leaders and activists of different Islamic countries.

en: What I want to say to the people of Iran is that by Allah's favor and grace, the Islamic Republic has become powerful and strong. It has become stronger on a daily basis.

en: This outrageous and brutal behavior will fail as well and they will not achieve their evil and malevolent goals.
ha: Ko shakka babu za su sha kashi cikin wannan mummunan aiki na su kuma abin kyama sannan kuma ba za su kai ga munanan manufofinsu ba.

en: Fortunately, today the entire country is like a huge factory, and people are working, rendering services and doing construction work in every part of this huge factory. Iranian laborers acquire skill and gain experience, the people benefit from this and we become independent of the others.

en: These are the things that call religious scholars and just reformers to careful thinking and sense of responsibility and they make identification of the enemies' goals behind highlighting sectarian, ethnic and partisan differences an obligation for everybody.

en: Of course it is possible to stay home or retreat from public life and still do something positive.
ha: Tabbas ana iya zama a cikin gida sannan kuma ana iya tafiya a wani bangare nasa, kuma za a iya aikata ayyuka masu kyau; to amma daga lokacin da mutum ya shigo cikin fage na zamantakewa - shin fagen siyasa ne ko kuma sauran fagage na gudanarwa - to akwai wannan lamari na bugu da bugewa.

en: Our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) had three beliefs which made him decisive, courageous and steadfast: namely, faith in God, faith in the people and faith in himself. These three beliefs revealed themselves in the character, decisions and actions of Imam (r.a.) in the true sense of the word.
ha: Imam dai ya kasance yana da wasu abubuwa guda uku da ya yi imani da su, wadanda su ne suka ba shi azama, jaruntaka da kuma tsayin daka. Wadannan abubuwa ukun kuwa su ne: imani da Allah, imani da karfin mutane da kuma imani da kai. Wadannan imani guda uku sun bayyanar da kansu cikin samuwa da kuma matsayar da Imam yake dauka.

en: From the perspective of the leaders of the order of domination, terrorism is whatever that threatens their illegitimate interests.
ha: A wajen shugabannin tsarin mulkin mallaka, ta'addanci shi ne duk wani abin da ya ke barazana ga haramtattun manufofinsu.
