en: They speak about the rights of all nations while each day Muslim nations feel- with their bodies and souls- the fire of discord more than the past. For decades, the oppressed Palestinian nation has been receiving strikes as a result of the crimes of the Zionist regime and its supporters. In the countries of Afghanistan, Pakistan and Iraq, terrorism - which originates from the policies of global arrogance and its agents in the region - has ruined the lives of the people.
ha: Suna magana kan kare hakkokin bil'adama ne kuwa alhali a kowace rana al'ummar musulmi suna ci gaba da dandanar zafin wutar fitinar da suka kunna. Dubi cikin yanayin al'ummar Palastinu wadanda shekaru aru-aru kenan suke fuskantar zaluncin gwamnatin sahyoniyawa da masu goya musu baya; ko kuma kasashen Afghanistan da Pakistan da Iraki wadanda suke dandana dacin ayyukan ta'addancin da ya samo asali daga siyasar girman kai da ‘yan amshin shatansu na yankin nan; ko kuma kasar Siriya wacce saboda goyon bayan kungiyoyi masu gwagwarmaya da sahyoniyawa da take yi take fuskantar kiyayyar ‘yan mulkin mallaka na kasa da kasa da yaransu na wannan yankin da kuma haifar mata da yakin basasa na cikin gida; ko kuma kasar Bahrain da Myammar, wadanda kowace guda daga cikinsu, suke fuskantar zaluncin makiyan da ake goya musu baya ko kuma sauran al'ummomin da suke fuskantar barazana ta soji da matsin lamba ta tattalin arziki daga wajen Amurka da kawayenta, dubi cikin dukkanin wadannan abubuwa za su iya tabbatar wa kowa hakikanin wadannan ‘yan mulkin mallakan.

en: This is what the narration means: if a society is ruled by corrupt and oppressive individuals, pious deeds of the members of that society will not get them anywhere and if some people surrender to those oppressive individuals and follow them, God will punish them. The opposite situation has also been mentioned in the same narration: "And I will forgive any group of Muslims who follow a ruler who guides them under God's order even if they are oppressive and commit sins."
ha: Wato abin da hadisin yake nuni da shi shi ne cewa matukar dai jagorancin wani tsari na al'umma ya kasance a hannun wasu mutane lalatattu kuma azzalumai sannan kuma batattu, to kuwa kokari da yunkurin muminan mutanen da suke cikin wannan al'umma babu inda zai je; sannan kuma idan aka samu wasu mutane a cikin wannan al'umma da suka mika wuya ga wadannan azzaluman da kuma yi musu biyayya, to kuwa Allah zai azabtar da su. Ko da yake a cikin shi kansa wannan hadisin an yi magana kan kishiyar hakan inda yake cewa: "Sannan kuma zan yafe wa duk wani daga musulmin da ya yi biyayya ga wani shugaba mai shiryarwa daga wajen Allah, ko da kuwa a cikin ayyukansu sun zamanto masu zalunci da sabo".

en: Before instilling a sense of confidence into the people of Iran, Imam (r.a.) first revived this sense of self-confidence in himself. ha: Ya bayyanar wa duniya irin karfin da yake da shi. A ranar Ashurar 1342, duk da matsin lamba, haka Imam ya bayyana a gaban dalibai da mutanen Kum a makarantar Faiziyya, ya yi wa sarki Muhammad Ridha Shah, wanda ya dogara da Amurka da masu takama da karfi na waje, wanda kuma yake gudanar da mulki ba tare da wani kaidi ko sharadi ba, ya yi masa barazana cewa matukar ka ci gaba da abin da kake yi, to kuwa zan gaya wa mutane da su kore ka daga Iran.

en: We should feel the transient nature of the day and nights of our life.

en: That man of steel was not shaken by the flood of harms and events that were enough to shake a nation. The power and awe of global powers were hollow to that man. But before the greatness of God, he used to shed tears like that when praying and asking God for help.
ha: Ku duba ku ga wannan mutumin wanda abubuwan da suke faruwa cikin rayuwa wadanda suke girgiza wata al'umma amma ko da wasa ba sa girgiza shi. en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution said that the effect of teachers on the individual and social characteristics of children and adolescents is far beyond the effect of parents, media, social factors, genetic inheritance, morality, and spirituality. ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana cewa gudummawa da tasirin malami wajen gina shaksiyyar yara da matasa ta daidaiku da ta al'umma ta ketare irin wadda iyaye da kafafen watsa labarai da sauran hanyoyi na zamantakewa da gado yana mai cewa: Malami da irin wannan gudummawar da yake bayarwa zai iya tarbiyantar da wani mutum mumini mai kumaji, ma'abocin hakuri, mai kyakkyawan fata ga gobe, mai kokarin tabbatar da ababen amfanin al'umma, mai kaunar isa ga kolin kamala ta daidaiku da ta al'ummance, mai kirkiran sabbin abubuwa, mai tunani sannan kuma ma'abocin bincike.

en: Pay attention to this point. This is one side of the issue. Another side of the issue is that it is wrong to resort to certain restrictive regulations in order to derail and isolate innovative movements that originate from the basiji spirit.

en: The Ali ibn Abi Talib Army was one of the successful armies during the Sacred Defense Era, and it was a pioneer.
ha: Wannan bataliya ta Aliyu bn Abi Talib (ta garin Kum) wacce tana daga cikin bataliyoyin da suka sami nasarori da lokacin kallafaffen yaki ta kasance a sahun gaba.

en: Had it not been for the military intervention of NATO and America, victory of people might have been delayed, but all these infrastructures would not have been damaged, and innocent women and children killed and then enemies that were accomplices of Qaddafi would not have been able to intervene in this innocent war-torn nation.
ha: Idan ba don amfani da karfin soji da Amurka da kungiyar NATO suka yi a kasar Libiya ba, mai yiyuwa ne nasarar da al'umma suka samu ya dan yi jinjiri, to amma a bangare guda kuma da ba za a lalata kasar irin yadda aka lalata ta a halin yanzu ba, da ba a kashe irin wadannan rayuka da ba su ci ba su sha ba na daga mata da kananan yara, sannan kuma da wadannan makiya wadanda shekara da shekaru suka kasance tare da Gaddafi da ba su yi da'awar cewa suna da hakkin tsoma baki cikin harkokin cikin gidan wannan kasa da aka zalunta sannan kuma aka lalata ba.

en: Several years ago, when I wrote letters to the heads of the three branches of government and warned of economic corruption, certain people were alarmed that my warnings would scare off the potential investors.
ha: Yan shekarun da suka gabata a lokacin da na rubuta wa shugabannin bangarori uku na gwamnati wasika dangane da batun almundahana da cin hanci da rashawa da jaddada wajibcin fada da hakan, wasu sun tsorata suna cewa mai yiyuwa ne hakan ya kashe gwuiwan masu zuba jari.

en: The friends and enemies of the Iranian nation should know that this nation has found its path and will remove all obstacles on its way to reach the peaks of success and prosperity by relying on God and their God-given power.
ha: Ya kamata masoya da makiya al'ummar Iran su san cewa wannan al'umma (ta Iran) ta fahimci tafarkin da take kai sannan kuma ta kuduri aniyarta sannan kuma ta hanyar dogaro da Allah da kuma karfin da Allah Ya ba ta za ta ci gaba da bin wannan tafarkin na isa ga kololuwan ci gaba da sa'ada, sannan kuma za ta kawar da duk wata cikas da ke kan wannan tafarki.

en: Our martyrs and disabled war veterans as well as their families passed the most difficult test on this path.
ha: Lalle shahidai, sojojin da suka sami raunuka, fursunonin yakin da aka sako su da kuma iyalansu sun ba da gagarumar jarrabawa a wannan tafarkin.

en: I hope that Allah the Exalted gives you and us the blessing to carry out our responsibilities.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku da kuma mu dacewar sauke nauyin da ke wuyanmu.

en: If somebody manages to identify the needs and tries to fill the gaps, his efforts are highly valuable. This is how Mr. Qara'ati has acted.
ha: Amma a lokacin da wani mutum ya sami damar gano bukatun da ake da su da kuma gibin da ake da shi sannan kuma ya yi gagarumar himma wajen ganin an cike wannan gibin, to kimar da ke cikin wannan aikin ya kan karu.

en: The only thing that restricts the president in our country is the law.
ha: Iyakan da kawai yake da ita, ita ce iyaka ta doka.

en: And America, its regional puppets and its guard dog â€“ the Zionist regime â€“ should know that the response of the Iranian nation to any kind of aggression, attacks or even threats will be a response that will make them collapse from within.
ha: Kuma wajibi ne su san cewa; Amurka ta sani, haka nan 'yan amshin shatanta haka nan kuma wannan kurar dajin ta su a wannan yanki wato haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila su kwana da sanin cewa; martanin da al'ummar Iran za su mayar ga duk wani hari, duk wani wuce gona da iri, kai duk wata barazana ma, martani ne da zai ruguza su daga ciki da kuma kawo karshensu.

en: Today - which is the birthday anniversary of the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) - we should learn his lessons.
ha: Yau dai, wacce ran ace ta haihuwar Annabi (s.a.w.a), yana da kyau mu dau darasi daga rayuwarsa.

en: The most obvious sign of it is the enthusiasm of public opinion, especially among young people, to revive the glory and greatness of Islam, to become aware of the nature of the international order of domination and to remove the mask from the shameless, oppressive and arrogant face of the governments and centers that have been pressuring the Islamic and non-Islamic East in their clutches for more than two hundred years and have been exposing nations to their brutal and aggressive thirst for power disguised with the mask of civilization and culture.
ha: Mafi girman alamar hakan ita ce irin kumajin da al'umma musamman matasa suke nunawa wajen rayar da irin daukakar da Musulunci yake da ita, da kuma masaniyar da suka samu dangane da yanayin tsarin mulkin mallaka na duniya da kuma bayyanar bakar fuskar azzaluman gwamnatoci ma'abota girman kai da cibiyoyin da sama da shekaru dari biyu suka lankwame kasashen Musulunci da ma wadanda ba na musulmin ba da kuma ci gaba da zaluntar wadannan al'ummomi. Bangarorin wannan farkawa mai albarka suna da girma sannan sun fadada.

en: It is wrong to think that it was our resistance and steadfastness that made them determined in their enmity.
ha: Lamarin ba shi ne cewa a halin yanzu da muka yi tsayin daka, hakan ya sanya su tada jijiyoyin wuya.

en: This was how Imam Hussein (a.s.) acted as a guardian.
ha: Wannan shi ne tsayin daka da kuma kariya ta Imam Husaini (a.s).

en: Faithful men and women throughout the Islamic world, particularly in Egypt, Tunisia and Libya should make the most of this opportunity in order to create an international Islamic power bloc.
ha: Yana da kyau maza da mata muminai a duk fadin kasashen musulmi musamman a kasashen Masar da Tunusiya da Libiya su yi amfani da wannan dama wajen kafa wani karfi na Musulunci na kasa da kasa.

en: I prayed many times to Allah the Exalted to give more strength to all those who are in charge the elections: members of Assembly of Experts, the government, the Ministry of Interior, the officials in charge of security matters who managed to ensure the security of the elections, the officials in charge of public relations, the IRIB and others.
ha: A lokuta da dama na kan yi addu'ar cewa Allah ya ba su karfi da iyawa wajen gudanar da wannan aiki, su kansu haka nan kuma ga gwamnati da ma'aikatar cikin gida, haka nan jami'an tsaro wadanda suka sami damar tabbatar da tsaro a lokacin zaben, haka nan jami'an bangaren isar da sako, wato hukumar gidan radiyo da talabijin da sauransu.

en: Those who produce books should also pay attention to this point. When producing books - in the sense of producing copies of books, translating them or making them available to people - it is necessary to pay attention to the needs and shortcomings in society.
ha: Wajibi ne su ma masu buga littafa su lura da wannan lamari. A wajen samar da littafi - shin buga littafi da ma'anar samar da shi ko kuma da ma'anar yin tarjamar littafi ko kuma da ma'anar yada littafi da isar da shi zuwa ga hannun wane da wane - lalle su dinga la'akari da bukatar da ake da ita a kasa. Wato su gano bukata da kuma gibi na tunani da ake da su, don haka sai su nemo hanyar da za a cike wannan gibin da ake da shi.

en: I explained in a speech that state subsidies have always been distributed among the people in an unfair way: this is the nature of general subsidies.
ha: A baya a wani jawabi na yi bayani kan hakan cewa a baya ana raba irin wannan tallafi tsakanin bangarori daban-daban na al'umma ne ta hanyar da babu adalci a cikinta; a dabi'ance dai haka aikin raba tallafi yake.

en: In spite of the fact that everybody agreed on the necessity of taking action, nobody had done anything due to the complexities and hardships involved. In the year 1390, the executive and legislative branches of government made efforts and carried out important stages of this work while we were under sanctions and while the hardships and complexities were more than ever before.
ha: Duk kuwa da cewa wannan wani lamari ne da aka yi tarayya a kansa, to amma lamarin ya ci gaba da zama ba tare da an aiwatar da shi saboda irin matsaloli da wahalhalun da ke cikinsa. Amma gwamnati da majalisa a shekarar da ta gabatan, a irin wannan yanayi na takunkumi da ake ciki wanda matsala da wahalar da ke cikin lamari ya fi na koyaushe wahala, sun yi himma da fara aiwatar da wannan aiki, kuma ya zuwa yanzu an aiwatar da wani bangare mai muhimmanci na shirin.

en: Today our youth have to shoulder a heavy duty in this regard.
ha: A yau nauyin da ke wuyan matasanmu a wannan fagen yana da girman gaske.

en: The Holy Quran teaches us, "And do not quarrel for then you will be weak in hearts and your power will depart." [The Holy Quran, 8: 46] If we quarrel about different issues - political issues, economic issues, personal issues - if we fight with each other, our enemy will be encouraged.
ha: Alkur'ani mai girma ya karantar da mu cewa: "kuma kada ku yi jayayya har ku raunana kuma iskarku ta tafi" (Suratul Anfal 8:46), idan har muka yi jayayya cikin lamurra daban-daban - batutuwa na siyasa, na tattalin arziki da batutuwa na kashin kai - muka kama kwalar rigunan junanmu, to kuwa makiyanmu za su sami karfin gwuiwa.

en: Allah the Exalted is helping you: He has made the hearts of the people kind towards you.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana taimaka muku; ya sanya zukatan mutane suka zamanto masu rahama da kaunar ku.

en: A pious, intellectual, expert and sympathetic cleric in a mosque is the spirit of the mosque - just as doctors and nurses are the spirit of a hospital.
ha: Samun malami mai tsoron Allah, da hikima, masani da kishi a masallaci, tamkar likita da malamin jiyya ne a asibiti, ruhi ne mai sanya rayuwa ga masallaci.

en: There is no doubt that the revolutions in the region that rely on and demand these principles are not to the liking of America, Europe and the Zionists, and they are going to use all means to deny them, but the truth will not change with their denial.
ha: Ko shakka babu wannan hakika ta cewa juyin juya halin wannan yankin sun riki wadannan koyarwa da kuma ganin an tabbatar da su wani lamari ne da ba zai yi dadi wa Amurka da kasashen yammaci da yahudawan sahyoniya ba, sannan kuma za su yi amfani da dukkanin karfinsu wajen ganin sun yi fada da hakan, to sai dai kuma ba za a taba sauya hakika da irin wannan inkarin ba.

en: Therefore, I hope that God willing, the year 1395 will be an auspicious year for the people of Iran by the blessedness of Hazrat Zahra (s.a.) and that we will learn lessons and benefit from the spirituality, instructions and life of that great personality.
ha: A saboda haka muna fatan insha Allahu wannan shekara ta 1395, albarkacin Nata Fatima, za ta zamanto shekara mai cike da albarkoki ga al'ummar Iran sannan kuma za mu dau darussa daga irin kusaci da Allah da take da shi da kuma irin maganganu da kuma rayuwarta da kuma amfanuwa da hakan.

en: I would like to congratulate all my dear countrymen across the nation, all Iranians who are living in different parts of the world and all other nations who celebrate Norouz [Iranian New Year], on the occasion of Norouz and the arrival of the new year. In particular, I would like to congratulate the honorable families of our martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their families, all our war veterans and all those who are active in different arenas in the country.
ha: Ina taya, al'ummarmu masu girma a duk fadin kasar nan da kuma dukkanin iraniyawa da suke rayuwa a sauran bangarori daban-daban na duniya da kuma dukkanin al'ummomin da suke gudanar da bukukuwan sabuwar shekara ta idin Norouz, murnar wannan idin da kuma shigowar sabuwar shekara; musamman iyalan shahidai masu girma, dakarun da suka sami raunuka a wajen yaaki da iyalansu da kuma dukkanin masu sadaukarwa da kuma dukkanin masu gudanar da ayyukansu a bangarori daban-daban.

en: It was only Americans who could have taken action against him, and it is clear what the action would have been.
ha: To hukumcin da za su yanke masa dai a fili yake.

en: The following is an excerpt of the message:
ha: Abin da ke biye fassarar sakon da Jagoran ya fitar ne:

en: We should become used to consuming every product that is produced inside the country. In all areas including the areas related to daily consumption as well as larger and more important areas, we should create a cultural norm among ourselves and consider it our obligation to seriously avoid consuming foreign products the equivalents of which are also produced inside the country.
ha: Wajibi ne mu saba da kuma sanya hakan ya tzamanto wata al'ada a gare mu. Haka nan kuma mu dinga jin cewa lalle wajibi ne a kanmu mu yi amfani da dukkanin kayayyakin da ake samar da irin su a cikin gida da kuma nesantar kayayyaki (irin su) da ake shigowa da su daga kasashen waje. A dukkanin fagage: shin a fagen amfani na yau da kullum ne ko kuma a fagen abubuwan da muke saye mu ajiye.

en: Humanity needs this waiting and the Islamic Ummah needs it even more.
ha: Mutane dai suna bukatar wannan jiran dako, al'ummar musulmi ma su ne suka fi bukatar hakan.

en: In the area of science and technology, certain things were done which were remarkable and a genuine source of joy for those who have faith in the future prospects of the country.
ha: A fagen ilimi da fasaha, a shekarar da ta gabatan an gudanar da ayyuka masu yawan gaske da za su faranta ran mutanen da suka yi imani da makoma mai kyau ga al'ummar nan.

en: Currently you complain why the manager is old and his consultant is young.
ha: Kuna cewa ne shugaba ya zama matashi, mai ba da shawara kuma ya zama tsoho.

en: The points which were raised in this meeting by my dear brothers, sisters and children were exactly the same things that I expected to hear from you dear youth.
ha: Abubuwan da ‘yan'uwa maza da mata ‘ya'yana masu girma suka fadi a wajen nan shi ne dai abubuwan da na ke fatan ji daga bakunanku matasa masu girma.

en: Of course the people of Isfahan have been vigilant.
ha: Ko da yake mutanen Isfahan sun lura.

en: I hope that Allah the Exalted will help both the people and the honorable officials to carry out their responsibilities in this area.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya taimaki al'umma da jami'an (kasar nan) masu girma don su sami damar aiwatar da aikin da ke wuyansu a wannan fagen; haka nan kuma ya sanya zuciya mai tsarki ta Waliyul Asr (rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi) ta yi farin ciki da mu; sannan kuma ya sanya ruhin Imaminmu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) da shahidanmu masu girma su yarda da kuma yin farin ciki da mu.

en: If an athlete does not have firm determination, he will not be a champion.
ha: Dan wasan da ba shi da karfafaffiyar irada da kuma tsayayyiyar azama, ko shakka babu, ba zai kai ga zama zakara a wata gasa ba.

en: These are the requirements of waiting. One of the things that the essence of waiting requires is that we should not be satisfied with the status quo and with the level of progress we have made so far.
ha: Daya daga cikin siffofin da aka tabbatar da su cikin hakikanin jiran dako, shi ne cewa bai kamata mutum ya ji ya wadatu da yanayin da ake ciki na irin ci gaban da aka samu a halin yanzu ba; mutum ya ji cewa a ko da yaushe ya ji cewa yana son ganin an sami irin wannan ci gaban a cikin al'umma.

en: Of course some people are just careless sometimes, and their lack of insight is not rooted in spite or malevolence.
ha: Amma wadansu kan a'a saboda adawa, saboda mummunan fata, a wasu lokuta kuma wadansu su kan gafala.

en: Dear brothers and sisters, dear people of Iran, you should know that today the situation of America is precarious in spite of all its muscle-flexing, in spite of all the uproar it causes.
ha: Ina son in sanar da ku, Ya ku 'yan'uwa maza da mata masu girma, Ya ku al'ummar Iran! cewa Amurka da dukkanin irin nuna karfin da take yi, da dukkanin irin wadannan ihu bayan hari da rikice-rikicen da take haifarwa, a yau dai suna cikin yanayi na rauni da gazawa ne.

en: The Americans would be happy to use their propaganda machines in the region and pass off the issue of Bahrain as a Shia-Sunni conflict.
ha: Amurkawa sun yi farin cikin cewa sun sami nasarar kiran wannan lamari a matsayin sabani tsakanin Shi'a da Sunna ta hanyar kafafen watsa labarai da hanyoyin farfagandarsu.

en: The messages explain the crimes that are being committed as well as the most important issues and developments in Islamic territories, ranging from the distortion of Islamic truths to enmities, ethnocentric fitnas, spread of corruption, numerous killings and the propaganda against the Islamic Ummah.
ha: Danyen aikin da suke aikatawa da kuma batutuwa masu muhimmanci da suke faruwa a kasashen musulmi; da suka hada da batutuwan da (makiyan) suka gurbata su da kuma kokarin da suke yi na haifar da fitina ta kabilanci da yada fasadi da kisan gilla da kuma bakar farfagandar da suke yi a kan al'ummar musulmi.

en: In which part of the world do such things exist?
ha: A ina ne ake samun irin wannan yanayin a duk fadin duniya?

en: And this is something that must be done.
ha: Wajibi ne a samar da hakan.

en: You should be careful about your morality and your purity of tongue, heart and hands.
ha: Taka tsantsan na kyawawan halaye, taka tsantsan cikin maganganunmu da kuma tsarkake zuciyarmu.

en: It is a fact that at the beginning of the Revolution our youth were highly excited, which was due to the strong sentiments created by the Revolution.
ha: To a farkon nasarar juyin juya halin Musulunci kumaji irin na samartaka yana da yawa - wanda ya samo asali ne sakamakon wannan kumaji na juyin - to amma ba a ko ina ba ne ake samun irin wannan zurfin tunanin ba.

en: I would like to take this opportunity to point out that officials of the French government have been openly hostile towards the Iranian nation over the past few years and this is not a clever move by French government officials.
ha: A nan ina ga ya dace in sanar da cewa cikin shekarun baya-bayan nan jami'an gwamnatin Faransa suna bayyanar da kiyayyarsu ga al'ummar Iran. Hakan wauta ce da jami'an Faransar suke yi.

en: I would also like to thank everybody who has attended this meeting, especially Mr. Qara'ati.
ha: Ina mika godiya ta ga kowa da kowa, musamman ma ga mai girma Sheikh Kara'ati wanda wajibi ne in gode masa.

en: When the White Revolution proclaimed by the Shah's government in Iran called for land reform, nationalization of the forests, the sale of state-owned enterprises to private interests, electoral changes to enfranchise women, profit sharing in industry, and an anti-illiteracy campaign in the nation's schools.
ha: Kamar yadda muka nuna a baya, taimako da goyon bayan haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila da fadada alakar Iran da ita na daga cikin sharuddan da Amurka ta kafa wa gwamnatin Shah matukar tana son goyon bayanta.

en: This year I will analyze the issues related to economic jihad.
ha: To a wannan shekarar zan rarraba batutuwan da suka shafi tattalin arziki ne kashi-kashi.

en: After Napoleon's exile and death, monarchy remained the system of government in France for around 50 years - that is to say, until around the year 1815. Of course there were very difficult and bitter upheavals. If you read 19th century French novels, including the books of Victor Hugo, Balzac and others, you will clearly see the signs of the upheavals and the hardships and bitterness that the people of France went through.
ha: Bayan korar Napoleon da mutuwarsa - wato a kimanin shekarar 1815 - hukumar sarakuna ta yi kimanin shekaru hamsin tana iko a kasar Faransa cikin yanayi mai tsanani, ta yadda idan har kuka karanta littafan labarun karni na sha tara na kasar Faransa, a fili za ku ga alamun irin wadannan juyi da irin wadannan wahalhalu da bala'oi da suka faru a kan mutanen Faransa; daga cikin su kuwa akwai littafan Bictor Hugo da Balzac da sauransu.

en: Another issue is that professional sports - now that international competitions are well-established and popular - are a manifestation of the capacities, dignity and identity of a nation.
ha: Wani lamari na daban kuma shi ne cewa gasar wasanni, wanda a yau gasa ta kasa da kasa ta yadu ko ina, tana a matsayin wata alama ce ta abubuwan bukata da kwarewa da kuma matsayi da wata al'umma take da shi.

en: In the present time too, you are busy making mistakes in different places in the region and particularly towards the Islamic Republic and the people of Iran.
ha: A halin yanzu ma, a bangarori daban a yankin nan, musamman dangane da Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran da al'ummar Iran, kuna ci gaba da kuskure.

en: The great opportunity which these precious days provide for Muslims throughout the world is like a miraculous elixir. If the value of such days is appreciated and if we benefit from such days in an appropriate way, many of the maladies of the world of Islam will be cured.
ha: Irin damar da wadannan ranaku masu tsananin muhimmanci suke samar wa al'ummar musulmin duniya a kowace shekara, tamkar wata mu'ujiza ce maras tamka, wacce matukar aka fahimci matsayinta sannan kuma aka yi amfani da ita kamar yadda ya kamata, to kuwa za a iya magance da dama daga cikin matsaloli da barazanar da duniyar musulmi take fuskanta.

en: Leader’s Speech to Members of Assembly of Experts - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da 'Yan Majalisar Kwararru

en: They will receive great rewards for their work, but the duty they have to shoulder is very difficult.
ha: Malamin jiyya dai yana dauke da wani aiki mai wahalar gaske a wuyansa, to amma yana da lada mai girma; to sai dai yana tare da aiki mai wahalar gaske.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will soon bestow deliverance on the people of these countries - the people of Bahrain, the people of Yemen and the people of Libya. I hope Allah the Exalted will punish the enemies of these nations.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya gaggauta samar da mafita ga wadannan al'ummomi - wato al'ummar Bahrain, al'ummar Yemen da al'ummar Libya - sannan kuma ya azabtar da makiyan al'ummomi da azabar da ta dace da su.

en: The role that the government should play in this regard is to support our domestic industrial and agricultural products and the role of our investors and laborers is to strengthen the cycle of production and bolster production work.
ha: Rawar da gwamnati za ta taka a wannan fagen shi ne ba da goyon baya ga kayayyakin da ake samar da su a cikin gida, masana'antu da ayyukan gona. Sannan rawar da masu zuba da jari da leburori (ma'aikata) za su bayar ita ce karfafa abubuwan da ake samarwar da kuma tabbatar da nasara cikin hakan.

en: This path has been created for human beings, not only for men or for women.
ha: Wannan wata hanya ce da aka tsara wa dan'adam, ba wai namiji ko mace ba.

en: If we consider the hajj as an opportunity, then we will have a better view of our obligations and will pay more attention to them.
ha: Idan muka kalli hakan da kallo na wata dama, to a irin wannan yanayin ne idanuwanmu za su budu, sannan kuma za mu ba wa nauyin da ke kanmu muhimmancin (da ya dace).

en: Our enthusiastic people and enthusiastic Muslim people throughout the world would like to hear about your condition and the last moments that you are in hospital.
ha: Al'ummarmu da sauran al'ummomin kasashen musulmi da masoyanka a duk fadin duniya, za su so jin yanayin jikinka da kuma ranakun karshe-karshen na zamanka a asibiti.

en: Leader's Speech to Exemplary Nurses - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Dubban Malaman Jiyya Na Iran

en: Why should the revision of collective conscience apply to the distant past and not to the current problems?
ha: Me ya sa ake damfara lamirin mutane ga abubuwan da suka faru cikin tarihin shekaru aru aru ba batutuwan da suke faruwa a halin yanzu ba?

en: God says the Muslims harmed the enemy just as the enemy harmed the Muslims: "And you had certainly afflicted (the unbelievers) with twice as much." God tells them not to be surprised. After all, in a battlefield you hurt the enemy and you also get hurt.
ha: Da farko dai idan har makiya sun cutar da ku, to ku ma dai ai kun cutar da makiyan "alhali kuwa kun samar da biyunta" - kada ku yi mamaki; ai a fagen yaki dai akwai cutarwa da kuma cutuwa, akwai dukkaninsu biyun.

en: Allah the Exalted says, â€œAgainst them make ready your strength to the utmost of your power, including steeds of war, to strike terror into (the hearts of) the enemies of Allah.â€ [The Holy Quran, 8: 60] Your preparedness makes the enemy fearful: not fearful of your invasion because you are not aggressive, but fearful of your resistance and of attacking you.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana fadin cewa: "Kuma ku yi musu tanadi iyakar iyawarku na karfi (makami) da kuma tanadaddun dawakai, ku rika tsorata makiya Allah da kuma makiyanku da shi.." (Suratul Anfali 8:60). Irin shirin da kuke da shi yana tsoratar da makiya; ba wai suna tsoron wuce gona da irin ku ba ne - don kuwa ku din nan ba masu wuce gona da iri a kan kowa ba ne - suna tsoron irin tsayin dakan da kuke da shi ne, suna tsoron yin tunanin kawo muku hari ne.

en: Jihad is not just limited to holding a rifle in your hand. Jihad means that one should see oneself in the arena of action and fight against the obstacles and those who create them.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei said that election is a manifestation of being present on the scene and reiterated: "With the conflict going on among the materialistic powers, the Iranian nation should always be present on the scene and maintain its vigilance in order to be able to defend its rights and the rights of its future generations."
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar zabe dai daya ne daga cikin alamun da ke tabbatar da kasantuwar mutane a fagen don haka sai ya ce: A yayin da ake ci gaba da rikici da ja-in-ja tsakanin masu takama da karfi na abin duniya, wajibi ne al'ummar Iran su kiyaye kasantuwarsu a fage da kuma nuna sanin ya kamata don ta hakan ne za su sami damar tabbatar da hakkokinsu da kuma kiyaye su ga zuriya masu zuwa.

en: How can one do business, negotiate and reach an agreement with such a policy?

en: The prayer "O Transformer of power and circumstances" transforms the year. This transformation is not just limited to transforming winter to spring. After all, all seasons of the year are transformed.
ha: Ana fadin cewa: "Ya Mai sauya shekara"; Shi ne ya ke sauya shekara. Sauya shekara ba wai kawai ta takaita ne ga sauya lokacin zafi zuwa lokacin damina ba; alal hakika dukkanin lokuta ne suke sauyawa.

en: The people of Qom were successful in all great trials, and their youth were in the vanguard.

en: You are making grave mistakes in the region.
ha: Kuna ci gaba da tafka babban kuskure a yankin nan.

en: I would also like to commemorate our kind, humble, lovely and friendly scholar, the late Hajj Agha Mojtaba Hajj Akhund, who was one of my old friends in Hojjatiyyeh School in Qom. He was pious, sincere, virtuous and honest.
ha: Haka nan kuma wajibi ne in ambaci babban malamin nan na kyawawan halaye, mai tawali'u kuma abin kauna marigayi Hajj Agha Mujtaba Hajj Akhund, wanda shi ma ya kasance daga cikin tsoffin abokanmu a makarantar Hujjatiya ta Kum; mutum ne mumini, mai tsarkin zuciya, salihi sannan kuma mai gaskiya.

en: And we are truly grateful to our people and we hope that Allah the Exalted will fully reward them.
ha: A saboda haka muna gode wa Allah Madaukakin Sarki, haka nan kuma muna gode wa al'ummarmu masu girma sannan kuma ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya ba su cikakkiyar ladar wannan aiki da suka yi.

en: This is not at all accepted by Islam.

en: If you trace these elements, you will see that all of them are connected to espionage and intelligence services of the enemies of Islam - not the enemies of Iran and Shia Muslims, rather the enemies of Islam.

en: Today the officials in charge of this center discussed some of these things during this long visit, and I offered some recommendations.

en: We should focus on guiding our people and helping our government make progress. I hope Allah the Exalted will awaken us so that we can identify and fulfill our responsibilities appropriately.
ha: Muna rokon Allah da Ya farkar da mu daga barci na gafala, don mu sami damar ayyana nauyin da ke wuyanmu da kyau, mu fahimci hakan sannan kuma da yardar Allah mu yi aiki daidai da hakan.

en: We know where we are going. We know our friends, and we know our enemies as well.

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on April 11, 2010 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Revolution in a meeting with a group of high-ranking military and police officials in Tehran.

en: Today westerners - both in America and in Europe - have learnt modern and highly advanced methods of propaganda. We are behind in this regard.
ha: A yau mutanen kasashen yammaci - shin a Turai ne ko kuma a Amurka - sun koyi hanyoyin da suka ci gaba sosai a fagen farfaganda da yada labarai; lalle mu kan muna baya a wannan fagen.

en: This is a very important point considering the fact that thirty three years have passed since the Revolution. This is what I mean when I say the Revolution is stable and established.

en: This truth indicates the weight and position of diplomacy in the management of a country."
ha: Hakan wani lamari ne da ke nuni da muhimmanci da kuma matsayin da ayyukan diplomasiyya suke da shi cikin gudanar da wata kasa.

en: Historical occasions are often like a symbol.

ha: Wani misalin kuma shi ne marigayi Agha Sayyid Husain Ha'iri, wanda a karshen rayuwarsa ya zo Mashahad.

en: On a social level, a champion raises national self-confidence because he is the manifestation of the capabilities of a nation in a certain arena.
ha: Bangare na al'umma sannan kuma na gaba dayan, shi ne cewa shi zakaran zakaru wata alama ce ta irin karfi da kwarewar da wata al'umma take da su a wani bangare na musamman.

en: The events that happened last year revived those plans.
ha: Rikicin da suka faru a shekarar da ta gabata sake rayar da wadancan tsare-tsare da suka yi ne.

en: Sometimes you hear the arrogant powers attribute the output of their corrupt minds to the global community. They say the global community wants this or that!
ha: A wasu lokuta ku kan ji cewa wadannan ma'abota girman kai na duniya suna jingina mummunan abubuwan da suke cikin tunaninsu ga duniya; suna cewa wannan shi ne abin da al'ummar duniya take so!

en: The Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that the existence of violent conflicts in countries located in West Asia and the creation of terrorist groups such as DAESH is the result of the interference and imposition of some powers.
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana irin rikice-rikice da zubar da jinin da ke faruwa a kasashen yankin yammacin Asiya da samar da kungiyoyin ta'addanci irin su Da'esh da aka yi a matsayin sakamako na tsoma bakin wasu manyan kasashen duniya inda ya ce: Nauyin dake wuyan dukkanin kasashe shi ne kokari wajen kashe wutar wannan rikici, sannan kuma Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran sabanin irin bakar farfagandar 'yan mulkin mallaka, ta kasance mai tasirin gaske wajen cimma wannan manufa, to sai dai ba ta tsoma baki cikin lamurran sauran kasashe.

en: If we look carefully, we can identify our flaws.
ha: Idan har muka duba da kyau, za mu gano hakan.

en: Surely Allah has bought of the believers their lives. [The Holy Quran, 9: 111] God buys the lives of believers. This is a great opportunity which was provided for that great man.
ha: Lalle ne, Allah Ya saya daga muminai, rayukansu (Suratu Tauba 9:111), Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana sayen rai, wato Allah shi ne mai sayen. Lalle hakan babbar dacewa ce.

en: This was done in the year 1390.
ha: Wannan lamari ne da ya faru a shekara ta 1390.

en: With such behaviors, claims of fighting terrorism are extremely shameless.
ha: Da irin wadannan ayyuka, ko shakka babu ikirarin fada da ta'addanci, wani lamari ne na wauta da rashin kunya.

en: Therefore, it is necessary to pay serious attention to books, particularly to reading books.
ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne a ba wa littafi muhimmanci.

en: This is different from asking the same thing of a physically weak person who has no chance of becoming a good wrestler or gymnast even if he spends 20 years on it.
ha: Akwai bambanci cikin hakan idan aka kwatanta shi da wani mutum mai rauni wanda ko da shekaru ashirin ya yi yana wasan motsa jiki ba zai iya zama wani dan kokawa na kwarai ba.

en: Nobody could believe that among the Islamic countries, the biggest revolution would happen in Egypt: the Egypt of Camp David Accords, the Egypt of Hosni Mubarak.
ha: Babu wani da ya ke jin cewa babban juyin juya hali na wannan lokacin a kasashen musulmi zai faru a kasar Masar ne; kasar Masar din da ta kulla yarjejeniyar Camp Dabid, kasar Masar din Hosni Mubarak.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will help you.
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya taimake ku.

en: This is the historical background of this region, and such things will never be erased from history.
ha: Wanda hakan wani lamari ne da ba za a taba shafe shi daga tarihi ba.

en: Needless to say, government supervision is very important in this regard. That is to say, the government should provide support and it should also supervise the companies that it supports.
ha: Ko da yake sanya idon gwamnati a wannan fagen ma lamari ne mai muhimmanci; wato a gefen irin wadannan taimako da gwamnati take bayarwa, wajibi ne kuma a sanya ido.

en: His students traveled to distant cities to spread his lessons and ideas. All this frightened the Shah's SAVAK agents and so, in the winter of 1975, they broke into his home in Mashhad and arrested him for the 6th time and confiscated all his books and notes.
ha: Su ma a nasu bangaren daliban da suka yi karatu a wajensa a kan tura su sauran garuruwa na kusa da na nesa don isar da wannan sako da share fagen gagarumin juyin juya halin Musulunci. Hakan ne ya sanya a watan goma (Dey) na shekarar 1353 (1975) jami’a tsaron Sabak suka fada wa gidansa inda suka kama shi cikin yanayi na rashin tausayi sannan kuma suka tafi da rubuce-rubucen da yayi.

en: I think our time is up.
ha: To ina tsammanin dai lokacin ya kare.

en: And when her child's body is returned to her, she feels proud that her child has been martyred.
ha: Daga baya kuma a lokacin da aka dawo mata da gawarsa, tana alfaharin cewa da na yayi shahada.

en: I would like to congratulate all the dear brothers and sisters who have attended this great and impressive meeting on the auspicious occasion of Norouz and the beginning of the new year. The people who have gathered here are in fact a sample of the Iranian people.
ha: Ina isar da sakon taya murnar wannan idi na Norouz da kuma shigowar sabuwar shekara ga dukkanin 'yan'uwa maza da mata wadanda suka taru a wannan waje da kuma wannan taro mai girman gaske; shin a wannan farfajiya ce ko kuma wadanda suke waje a wajaje daban-daban, 'yan'uwa maza da mata da suke sauraren wannan jawabi.

en: The lectures were circulated among the people in hand-written or typed forms, in most towns and cities.
ha: Shi kuwa darasin Nahjul Balaga da yake bayarwa yana da irin nasa nau'i na karbuwa a wajen mutane inda ake buga su a ‘yan takardu ana raba su wa al’umma.

en: This is an issue which requires accurate psychological analysis in order to figure out how some individuals unknowingly helped the enemies."
ha: Wannan wani lamari ne da ke bukatar a yi sharhi da dubi cikinsa sosai kan yadda aka yi wadansu mutane suka shigo fage ba tare da sun san cewa suna taimakon makiya ba ne.

en: Our magnanimous Imam taught us that our attention should be focused on the great Islamic Ummah.
ha: Imaminmu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) ya koyar da mu cewa wajibi ne idanuwanmu su kalli dukkanin fagen al'ummar musulmi.

en: The clergy have social responsibilities as well. They should get involved in social issues, but the essential point is that their involvement in social issues should be accompanied by spirituality not by a tendency to dominate others, otherwise their involvement will be useless.
ha: Har ila yau kuma malamai suna da nauyi na zamantakewa a wuyansu. Wajibi ne malamai su shigo cikin batutuwa na zamantakewa; to sai dai lamari mai muhimmanci shi ne cewa wannan shiga cikin lamurra da malamai za su yi, su shiga da yanayi na malanta, ba wai da tilasci da mamaya ba.

en: And this gathering, which is a sample of the young population of this divine country, is filled with knowledge and insight as well as enthusiasm about great revolutionary wishes and ideals.
ha: Wannan taro ma wanda yake a matsayin daya daga cikin misalan gagarumin taron matasan wannan kasa, taro ne da ke cike da ilimi, basira da kuma kyakkyawan fata zuwa ga manyan koyarwar juyin juya halin Musulunci.

en: I have repeatedly emphasized the issue of knowledge for several years, and scientific progress and generation of knowledge are thankfully well under way in the country. Of course this process should be accelerated.
ha: Shekara da shekaru kenan nake jaddadawa dangane da batun ilimi, alhamdu lillahi yunkurin ilimi da samar da ilimi a kasar nan yana ci gaba da tafiya; to sai dai duk da haka wajibi ne ya kara irin saurin da yake da shi.

en: During the latter stages of Imam Khomeini's auspicious life, he went through a difficult and critical test, and I ask Allah the Exalted to bestow mercy and forgiveness on him due to the hardships he endured.
ha: A karshe-karshen rayuwar marigayi Imam mai cike da albarka wata jarrabawa mai girma da hatsarin gaske ta kunno kai wanda na ke rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya rufe hakan da gafara da rahamarsa sannan kuma musibu na rayuwar duniya su zamanto kaffarar wadannan abubuwa.

en: Our Revolution is based on the characteristics of Zeinab al-Kubra.
ha: Juyin juya halin mu, juyi ne irin na Zainab.

en: We pray to God, “Dear God, I ask You for the requirements of Your mercy.”We should prepare the ground for divine blessings and then we will be showered with divine grace and blessings. Our people prepared the ground for divine blessings.
ha: A cikin addu'a (Du'a Kumayl) muna karanta cewa: "Ya Allah ina rokonka abubuwan da suke saukar da rahamarka", a saboda haka wajibi ne mu samar da abubuwan da za su samar da rahamar Ubangiji, a irin wannan yanayi ne ruwan rahama da falalar Ubangiji za su sauko a kanmu.

en: By Allah's favor, they will definitely be defeated in this one as well.
ha: A wannan sabon makircin ma, da yardar Allah, za su sha kashi.

en: Such differences are not favorable to us. Islam does not approve of such differences.
ha: Wannan tazarar dai ba abu ne da muke so ba; Musulunci bai amince da hakan ba.

en: We have learnt lessons from Ali (greetings be upon him) who describes human beings in this way: Those who have the same religion as you, they are brothers to you, and those who have religions other than that of yours, they are human beings like you.
ha: Mun koya daga Imam Ali (a.s) wanda ya siffanta mutum da cewa: ‘imma dai dan'uwanka ne a addini, ko kuma kwatankwacinka cikin halitta".

en: If the people, the administration and different officials can – by Allah’s favor – adopt correct, timely and proper measures, then we can hope that this will influence other issues – such as social maladies and moral and cultural issues – as well.
ha: Idan har cikin yarda da taimakon Ubangiji, al'umma da kuma gwamnati da sauran jami'an bangarori daban-daban suka samu nasarar aikata ayyukan da suka dace a fagen tattalin arziki sannan kuma a daidai lokacin da ake bukata, to fatan da muke da shi shi ne cewa za a samu damar yin tasiri da magance sauran matsalolin da ake da su irin su matsalar zamantakewa, matsalar kyawawan halaye da matsalar al'adu da sauransu.

en: The movement should be a progressive movement.
ha: Wajibi ne yunkurin ya zamanto yunkuri ne na ci gaba wanda ya yi daidai da zamani.

en: The events that have taken place in the Islamic world in the interval between the previous and the current Hajj pilgrimage can transform the destiny of the Islamic Ummah and forebode a bright future rich with dignity as well as progress, material and spiritual.
ha: Tsakanin hajjin bara da na bana, wasu lamurra sun faru a kasashen musulmi da za su iya haifar da sauyi cikin makomar al'ummar musulmi da kuma samar da makoma da take cike da daukaka da ci gaba na duniya da lahira a gare su.

en: When this living creature was sent into space and was returned safely, international scientists and observers were so surprised that they first denied it.
ha: A lokacin da aka aika da wannan halitta mai rai zuwa sararrin samaniya sannan ya dawo da ransa kuma cikin koshin lafiya, da farko dai masana a duniya sun musanta hakan saboda yadda ya kasance babban abin mamaki a gare su.

en: The power of such a nation is secretly acknowledged even by its enemies although they might not be prepared to announce this publicly because of being stubborn.
ha: Hatta makiya dai suna jin irin wannan daukaka da wannan al'umma take da ita a jikinsu; duk kuwa da cewa ba za su fadi hakan da baki ba saboda kiyayyar da ke cikin zukatansu.

en: I would like to extend my congratulations to the people of Iran, Islamic nations, the entire Islamic Ummah and all liberated people throughout the world - those for whom the issue of freedom and human values is very important.
ha: Haka nan kuma ina taya dukkanin al'ummar Iran da sauran al'ummar musulmi, sannan da kuma dukkanin ‘yantattu na duniya; mutanen da batun ‘yan'adamtaka da ‘yancin kai ya dame su, murnar wannan rana.

en: Because Mahdaviat represents what all prophets were sent for - namely, building a monotheistic world on the basis of justice using all the capacities that Allah the Exalted has bestowed on humanity. This is the era that will come after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (God's greetings be upon him and may God hasten his re-appearance): the era in which monotheism and genuine spirituality will be dominant over the entire life of human beings, the era in which justice will be established in the real sense of the word.
ha: Saboda kuwa abin da akidar Mahdi take bishara da shi, shi ne dai abin da aka turo dukkanin annabawa da manzanni da shi wanda shi ne samar da wata duniya ta tauhidi (kadaita Ubangiji) sannan kuma wacce aka gina ta bisa asasi na adalci da kuma amfanuwa da dukkanin dama da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya arzurta dan'adam da shi. Shi ne dai irin wannan yanayi na lokacin bayyanar Imam Mahdi (amincin allah ya tabbata a gare shi sannan kuma allah ya gaggauta bayyanarsa).

en: This is one of the essential things that the enemy follows in his propaganda, and all their efforts are in this direction.
ha: Daya daga cikin ayyuka na asasi na makiya cikin farfagandar da suke yadawa a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci sun shafi wannan bangare ne sannan dukkanin kokarinsu ma saboda hakan ne.

en: Take care not be influenced by such things.
ha: To ku lura sosai, kada ku tasirantu da irin wadannan abubuwa da ake aikowa.

en: In Islamic countries, the people are part of the Islamic Ummah.
ha: To a wadannan kasashe da kuma sauran kasashen musulmi, mutanen wadannan kasashe dai musulmi ne, su din nan wani bangare ne na al'ummar musulmi.

en: Health issues are among the most important issues in human communities.
ha: Batun kiwon lafiya daya ne daga cikin batutuwa na farko masu muhimmanci na rayuwar al'umma.

en: He is kind to believers and "those who are with him are strong against unbelievers, but compassionate amongst each other" [The Holy Quran, 48: 29].
ha: Ya kasance mai tausayi ga muminai. Amma "Masu tsanani ne a kan kafirai, masu rahama ne a tsakaninsu" (Suratul Fat'h 48:29).

en: This is an important factor that should be taken into consideration by anybody who has plans to achieve lofty goals.
ha: Kada ku mance da hakuri da tsayin daka; wannan wani lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske cikin rayuwar duk wani mutum da yake da wata gagarumar manufa.

en: You have control over the children and adolescents who sit in your classrooms.
ha: Wannan matashi da wannan yaron da ya zauna a gabanku a aji, yana hannunku ne.

en: I have reports that during the elections, several hundreds of millions of text messages might be sent and received every day.
ha: An kawo min rahoton cewa mai yiyuwa ne a ranakun zabe, a aika daruruwan miliyoyin irin wadannan sakonni.

en: It means that the existing situation is very bad and that we are determined to change it.
ha: Shi ne cewa mu a halin yanzu muna cikin wani irin yanayi ne mai munin gaske, to ina so in sauya wannan yanayin ne.

en: His Eminence stressed: "Thanks to the fact that nations are moving on the path of Islam, the future of the region will be far better than its current situation."
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: Makomar wannan yankin, albarkacin himma da yunkuri na al'ummomin bisa tafarkin Musulunci, za ta fi yau din wannan yankin kyau.

en: I have been familiar with Kermanshah and its people since a long time ago. But during the past two, three days, Allah the Exalted gave me another opportunity to meet you dear people of Kermanshah and observe your behavior, which made me respect Kermanshah and its people even more than before.
ha: Duk da cewa tun da jimawa ina da masaniya kan wannan yanki na Kermanshah da kuma mutanen Kermanshah, to amma a cikin wadannan kwanaki biyu zuwa uku da Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba ni dacewar ganawa da ku din nan mutanen wannan yanki masu girma daga bangarori daban-daban sannan da kuma ganin halayenku, hakan ya kara min irin kaunar da nake da ita ga garin Kermanshah da kuma mutanen Kermanshah.

en: In this great arena that lies in front of our eyes, the champion is the Iranian nation.
ha: To zakarar wannan gagarumin fage dai a gabannin idanuwanmu, su ne al'ummar Iran.

en: Of course, as I said a few months ago, the Americans expressed joy and said that I have confessed to the effect of the sanctions. Yes, the sanctions have not been inconsequential. If they are happy about this, let them be happy.
ha: Lalle ya kamata in fadi - a ‘yan watannin da suka gabata ma na taba fadin hakan - cewa Amurkawa suna bayyana jin dadinsu suna cewa ni ma na tabbatar da cewa takunkumin ya yi tasiri. Na'am, ba za a ce takunkumin bai yi tasiri ba, idan suna son su yi farin ciki, su yi farin cikinsu.

en: And thankfully the Iranian nation has achieved this opportunity by relying on its power, its courage and its intelligence.
ha: Alhamdu lillahi al'ummar Iran, albarkacin irin karfi da jaruntaka da kuma sanin ya kamatanta, ta yi amfani da wannan damar.

en: Leader's Speech on the Occasion Eid al-Ghadir - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Imam Khamenei Yayin Ganawa Da Mutane Wajen Bikin Idin Ranar Ghadir

en: He added: "On the basis of which law is the US government continuing its occupation of Iraq and increasing the number of its troops in Afghanistan every day?"
ha: Ayatullah Khamene'i ya ci gaba da cewa: Bisa wace dokar ce kasar Amurka take ci gaba da mamaye kasar Iraki, sannan kuma da wace doka ne suka kara sojojinsu a Afghanistan sannan kuma a kowace rana suke zubar da jinin mutane.

en: The economy must be resistant. It must be able to withstand the enemies' machinations.
ha: Wajibi ne tattalin arziki ya zamanto mai tinkarar barazana; wajibi ne ya zamanto zai iya tinkarar duk wani abin za a iya fuskanta na daga makircin makiya.

en: They had prepared plans since after the demise of the Imam (r.a.). The effect of those plans revealed itself in the year 1378, including the events that happened at the Tehran University dormitory and the other events that most of you remember.
ha: Tun bayan rasuwar marigayi Imam akwai wadansu tsare-tsare da suke da su; sakamakon wadannan tsare-tsare ya fito a shekarar 1378 (1999), mafi yawa daga cikinku za ku iya tuna lamarin nan na rikici da ya barke a jami'ar Tehran da sauran batutuwan da suka faru.

en: That is to say, there were other people who were not working for the factory.
ha: Amma mutanen da suka taru a wajen dakin taron sun kai mutane dari bakwai zuwa dari takwas; wato wasu ma wadanda ba ma'aikatan ba sun zo.

en: Because we have been an oil-rich country, we have been in the habit of using gas, natural gas, diesel and kerosene in a wasteful way.
ha: Da yake mu din nan kasa ce da Allah ya albarkace ta da man fetur, don haka mun saba da yin almubazzaranci wajen amfani da man fetur, gas, kananzir ba tare da lura ba.

en: The same is true of other places. The same crimes are unfortunately being committed in America and other places and countries.
ha: Haka lamarin yake a wasu wajajen ma na daban; a Amurka da sauran wajaje da sauran kasashe na daban, abin bakin cikin haka lamarin yake.

en: Their enmity towards the Islamic Republic is because of the flag of Islam that has been raised in this country and the Islamic Republic's constant call to unity and Islamic power and glory.
ha: Kiyayyar da su ke nunawa jamhuriyar Musulunci saboda daga tutar Musulunci ne a cikin wannan kasa da kuma kiran da ta ke yi na hadin kai a tsakanin musulmi da karfafa Musulunci da kuma daukaka shi.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) establishment of an Islamic community as a proof of the fact that Islam is not limited to verbal admonishment and that it is after implementing divine rules in society. His Eminence said that appointing a successor for the Holy Prophet (s.w.a.) in Ghadir Khumm was an effort to continue this path.
ha: Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana kafa hukuma da Manzon Allah (s.a.w.a) ya yi da kuma kokarin samar da wata al'umma wacce ta yi daidai da koyarwar Musulunci a matsayin abin da ke tabbatar da cewa Musulunci ba wai magana ta fatar baki ne kawai face dai wani kokari ne na tabbatar da hukumce-hukumcen Ubangiji a cikin al'umma wanda kuma ba za a iya samunsa ba in ba ta hanyar kafa hukuma ma'abociyar adalci ba.

en: When it comes to revealing things about other people, we should only reveal their good characteristics.
ha: Da sasanta tsakanin mutane, idan har akwai wani sabani tsakanin mutane, to mu yi kokarin sasanta su.

en: These were the threats in which foreigners were directly involved.
ha: Wadannan abubuwa ne da suke da alaka da ‘yan kasashen waje, wanda suke da hannu cikinsu kai tsaye.

en: Of course, if we take a careful and analytical look today, we see that the unreal effort which America and its allies are making in the region today under the name of confronting DAESH is, in fact, an effort for channeling enmities among Muslims more than it is an effort for nipping this evil movement in the bud.
ha: Ko shakka babu a yau idan mutum ya kalli lamarin da idon basira, zai ga cewa kokarin da Amurka da kawayenta suke yi cikin abin da suke kira ‘fada da Da'esh' - wanda a hakikanin gaskiya ba haka lamarin yake ba - kafin ya zamanto wani kokari ne na ganin bayan wadannan lalatattun kungiyoyi, wani kokari ne wajen rarraba kan musulmin.

en: However, looking back on the path that we have followed will also be beneficial for us so that we see what we have done, how we have moved forward and what results our work has produced, and we should learn lessons from it and gain experience.
ha: Duk da cewa duba baya da kuma abin da muka yi a baya zai kasance mai amfani a gare mu, don mu ga me muka yi, ya ya yunkurinmu ya kasance, mene ne sakamakon abubuwan da muka yi, sannan kuma mu dau darasi daga cikinsu.

en: In certain narrations he has been likened to Prophet Joseph whose brothers used to see him.
ha: A wasu daga cikin riwayoyin ma an kamanta shi (Imam Mahdi) da Annabi Yusuf wanda 'yan'uwansa suna ganinsa, yana tare da su, suna tafiya wajensa, to amma ba su san shi ba.

en: Seyyed Ali Khamenei
ha: Sayyid Ali Khamenei

en: This fall is not preventable. They are condemned to destruction.
ha: Wannan lalacewar dai ba abu ne da za a iya hana faruwarsa ba. Lalle za su fadi kasa warwas.

en: At the beginning of each new year, people should tell themselves, "Last year and the previous years are gone, and there is nothing I can do about them, but now a new stage has started." We should define a new relationship with Allah the Exalted, proactively and retroactively. The proactive aspect is related to committing sins.
ha: Daga lokacin da sabuwar shekara ta shigo, to sai mutum ya yi tunanin cewa to a shekarar da ta gabata dai ga yadda zuciyarsa ta kasance; yanzu kuma wani sabon lokaci ne, sai mu yi kokarin kulla wata sabuwar alaka da Allah Madaukakin Sarki; shin a bangare mai kyau ne da kuma mara kayu. Bangare mara kyau shi ne sabon Allah.

en: This is the goal of the hegemony of the arrogant powers.
ha: Wannan ita ce manufar ma'abota girman kan.

en: This behavior is not Islamic. It is not revolutionary.
ha: To wannan dai ba dabi'a ce ta Musulunci ba, ba ta juyin juya halin Musulunci ba ce.

en: Dear God, bestow a Quranic, divine and Islamic life on us.
ha: Ka arzurta mu da rayuwa ta Alkur'ani, rayuwa irin ta Ubangiji da kuma Musulunci.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution stated that the Islamic Republic of Iran is not an aggressive country.
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin ya bayyana dakaru ruwa na soji da na dakarun kare juyi a matsayin masu taimaka wa juna inda ya ce: Sojojin ruwa guda biyu ne da suke da ayyuka masu kyau, a saboda haka za su iya musayen irin kwarewar da suke da ita da junansu.

en: Responding to a faulty statement should be done in a particular way.
ha: Mayar da martani da magana ta kuskure tana da nata hanyar, tana da aikin da ya kebanta da ita.

en: The third point is that in the movements of Islamic Awakening it is necessary to pay constant attention to the bitter and horrifying experience of following the West in politics, behavior and lifestyle.
ha: Batu na uku shi ne cewa cikin yunkuri na farkawa ta Musulunci, wajibi ne a koda yaushe a dinga lura da irin cutarwar da aka fuskanta sakamakon koyi da kuma biyayya ga kasashen yammaci cikin siyasa da halaye da kuma salon rayuwa.

en: This language was a combination of reason and feelings.
ha: Maganganu ne da suka kumshi tunani da hankali da kuma tausayawa.

en: As the people who are familiar with the Holy Quran, who recite the Holy Quran and who are interested in listening to recitations by qura with pleasant voices, you dear youth should appreciate your value. By Allah's favor, you will be rewarded by God.

en: That is to say, the dimensions of his action are far more than what we estimate.

en: If, over these 30-something years, the enemies have not managed to undermine the Islamic Republic, the reason is this.

ha: To a wannan shekarar ne dai wannan juyi ya faru.

en: Those evil, dependent and greedy politicians who were submissive against the enemies and treated the people in an angry way, were replaced by representatives of the people. Our scientifically backward country transformed into a country that was advanced in terms of science.

en: The message of Islam includes this obedience and learning - that is to say, the knowledge, wisdom, acumen, mercy, unity, morality and other human characteristics that the Holy Prophet's (s.w.a.) message promoted and that Hazrat Abi Abdullah Ja'far ibn Muhammad al-Sadiq (peace and greetings be upon him) made the most efforts to promote and establish.

en: Relying on Islamic teachings - according to which human dignity is a top priority and according to which killing a single innocent person is like killing all human beings - and as a nation which has suffered great losses during the past three decades as a result of terrorism, we think of fighting this evil phenomenon as our fundamental responsibility, and by Allah's favor, we will continue our efforts on the path of this great struggle with all our power.

I extend my greetings to the Imam of the Age- may my soul be sacrificed for his sake- and I ask Allah that the accepted prayers of that honorable Imam improve the Islamic Ummah and save Muslims from the fitna and malevolence of the enemies.

en: We need to take into consideration both what the government has managed to do and what it has failed to do.

en: Of course the sanctions that have been imposed on us during the recent years have grown in number and variety. en: But when you benefit from a native coach for soccer, basketball, volleyball, wrestling or any other sports, I become happy and I feel a sense of pride.

en: These are important points. These days are close to the birthday anniversary of Imam Mahdi (a.s.), which is a great Eid for the Muslim world and even all of humanity.

en: [Audience shouting slogans] Please listen. My purpose is not to express my opinion about past events.

en: Today has been an enjoyable and pleasant day for me: being in the company of you dear brothers and youth from the Armed Forces, speaking to you in person and benefiting from the manifestations of your motivation and dynamism and from your pure and enlightened hearts.

en: In particular I would like to extend my congratulations to the individuals and families who are rendering services to the country, the Revolution and the Islamic system, the families of our dear martyrs, our disabled war veterans and their families and the families of those who have sensitive and important duties and cannot be with their families during these holidays.
ha: Har ila yau ina mika sakon taya murna na musamman ga mutane da iyalan da suke hidima wa wannan kasa da wannan juyin juya hali da kuma wannan tsari (na Musulunci); iyalan shahidai masu girma, wadanda suka sami raunuka da kuma iyalansu, da iyalan ma'aikata da jami'an da a wadannan ranaku suke ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukansu a daidai lokacin da sauran mutane suke tare da iyalansu su kuwa an hana su kasancewa tare da na su iyalan.

en: They should do this both in the arena of the economy and culture.

en: In this beloved and oppressed homeland, the taghuti, dependent and corrupt regime depended on different means of material power provided by international powers, but it was defeated by an unarmed nation that was equipped with faith and self-confidence.

en: Resistance against avarice should always be the main standard in the forward movement for the officials in charge of this sector and so it shall remain, God willing.

en: The Commander-in-Chief of the Iranian Armed Forces stressed: "We have not encouraged any country to cause confrontation and war and we will not do so.

This is wrong. They are angry because you exist, because the Islamic Republic exists, because Imam (r.a.) is alive in the minds of the people and in our national plans, because the people show their feelings for Imam (r.a.) every year on his demise anniversary.

en: The Commander of the Faithful, Imam Ali (`a) says: “فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَمْ يَقْصِمْ جَبَّارِي دَهْرٍ قَطُّ إِلَّا بَعْدَ تَمْهِيلٍ وَ رَخَاءٍ وَ لَمْ يَجْبُرْ عَظْمَ أَحَدٍ مِنَ الْأُمَمِ إِلَّا بَعْدَ أَزْلٍ وَ بَلَاءٍ وَ فِي دُونِ مَا اسْتَقْبَلْتُمْ مِنْ عَتْبٍ وَ مَا اسْتَدْبَرْتُمْ مِنْ خَطْبٍ مُعْتَبَر..” The important recommendation is that you must always consider yourself as being present on the scene: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانْصَبْ ( So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].)Therefore, when thou art free, still labor hard), always consider God as present and as your aid: وَإِلَى رَبِّكَ فَارْغَبْ(And to thy Lord turn all thy attention), and must not allow your victories to cause you to become arrogant or negligent:
ha: Amirul Muminin (a.s) yana fadin cewa: Allah Madaukakin Sarki ba ya karyar wuyan duk wani azzalumin shugaba a wannan duniyar har sai ya ba shi lokaci da kuma dama, sannan kuma ba ya tara karyayyun kasusuwan wata al'umma, har sai ya jarraba ta da bala'oi da wahalhalu..." (huduba ta 88) Wasicci mai muhimmanci a nan shi ne cewa a koda yaushe ku dinga jin cewa ku din nan kuna cikin fage ne: "saboda haka idan ka kare (ibada) sai ka kafu (kana rokon Allah), a ko da yaushe ku dinga jin cewa Allah Madaukakin Sarki yana nan sannan kuma zai taimaka muku: "Kuma zuwa ga Ubangijinka ka yi kwadayi" sannan kuma kada nasarar da muka samu ta zamanto za ta sanya mu jiji da kai da kuma gafala: "Idan taimakon Allah ya zo da cin nasara.

en: It is wrong to say that we have learnt democracy from westerners.
ha: Abin da wasu suke fadi na cewa mun koyo tsarin demokradiyya ne daga wajen kasashen yammaci lalle hakan kuskure ne.

en: And as soon as one questions their approach, they say, "You are preventing us from telling the truth.
ha: Daga lokacin da mutum ya ce me ya sa kuke fadin haka, nan take za su ce kai dai ba ka barin mu mu fadi hakikanin lamurra.

en: This is the direction of an important portion of the propaganda that is broadcast against the Islamic Republic: they want to prevent creation of role models. They want to prevent the Islamic Republic from becoming a successful role model in the eyes of Muslim nations.
ha: Bangare mafi girma na irin farfagandar da ake yadawa kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran (da nufin bakanta ta) suna da alaka ne da wadannan abubuwa; saboda a hana ta zama abar koyi; wato kada Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta zamanto abar koyi a idanuwan al'ummomin musulmi.

en: God has provided you and me with this opportunity. Therefore, we need to be thankful for it.
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Ya ba mu ni da ku wannan damar; a saboda haka wajibi ne mu gode.

en: In the case of domestic policies, the purpose of their sanctions was to make the Iranian nation uncertain about their path, to distance the Iranian nation from the Islamic Republic and to make the people disappointed.
ha: A fagen siyasar cikin gida kuwa, manufarsu ta sanya wannan takunkumin ita ce su sanya shakku cikin zukatan al'ummar Iran dangane da tafarkin da suka rika; su haifar da sabani tsakanin al'umma da tsarin Musulunci; su kashe wa mutane gwiwa da sanya su yanke kauna.

en: There is no fixed answer to this question. Probably there are many different answers.
ha: To wannan tambayar dai ba amsa guda daya kawai take da ita ba; mai yiyuwa ne amsoshi daban-daban.

en: Leaders of socialist and communist countries took advantage of their societies.
ha: Shugabannin kasashen 'yan gurguzu sun ribantu ainun da al'ummominsu; sun nuna karfi da shugabanci.

en: These are our duties. Our management of the caravans, our publicity, and other such affairs should be based on these needs. Our cultural and political planning and our choices should be based on these needs.
ha: Wadannan wasu nauyi ne da suke wuyan mutum; wadannan abubuwa ne da wajibi ne mu lura da su a lokacin da muke shirya tsare-tsarenmu wajen shirya tawagar alhazai da kuma wajen isar da sakonni da makamantan hakan. Wajibi ne dukkanin tsare-tsarenmu na ala'du, na siyasa, na gudanar da tawagar alhazanmu da kuma dukkanin alhazanmu su zamanto suna bin wadannan bukatu ne, sannan kuma wadannan bukatun su zamanto su ne a kan gaba.

en: I would like to congratulate all you dear brothers who are shouldering heavy responsibilities on the occasion of Norouz and the arrival of the spring - the season of vitality, freshness, and revitalization. I have been witness to your efforts in different areas. Hopefully, God will accept these efforts from all of you, and He will provide you with the opportunity to enter and succeed in other vast arenas through intensified labor and efforts.
ha: Ina taya murnar idin Nuroz (sabuwar shekarar hijira shamsiyya) da kuma shigowar kaka - wanda lokaci ne na farin ciki da sabunta rayuwa - ga dukkaninku 'yan'uwa masu girma, wanda kuke da gagarumin nauyi a kafadunku, sannan kuma muna ganin irin gagarumin kokari da wahalhalun da kuke sha a bangarori daban-daban da suka shafe ku.

en: His Eminence said that the greatness of education is exemplified by the effect of Shahid Motahhari's scholarly and cultural works.
ha: Jagoran ya bayyana irin tasirin da ayyuka na ilimi da al'adu na shahid Mutahhari a matsayin misali na irin daukakar da aikin ilimi da tarbiyya yake da ita.

en: Regarding faith in the people, our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) knew the Iranian nation in the true sense of the word.
ha: Dangane da imani da mutane, mai girma Imam (r.a) ya fahimci al'ummar Iran da dukkanin ma'anar wannan kalmar.

en: Yet they repeat these policies and they will be kicked in the mouth again.
ha: Amma har ya zuwa yanzu suna sake maimaita wannan siyasar, to za su sake shan kashi kuwa.

en: It is 30 years that they have been expressing their anger in one way or another, but the willpower of the Iranian people - which depends on the will of Allah the Exalted and on their faith in the divine promise of victory - has disappointed the enemies, and the Iranian nation has been treading the path of progress, growth and transcendence every day.
ha: Shekaru talatin kenan wadannan mutane suke bayyanar da fushinsu ta hanyoyi daban-daban (a kan wannan kasa), to amma sakamakon irada da tsayin dakan al'ummar Iran - wadda irada ce da ta ginu bisa irada ta Ubangiji Madaukakin Sarki da kuma yarda da alkawarin Allah - makiya sun sha kashi sannan al'ummar Iran kuma a kowace rana sai dada ci gaba da kuma samun kamala da daukaka take ci gaba da samu.

en: Elections do not belong to a particular political orientation or a particular intellectual and political current.
ha: Zabe ba na wata kungiya guda ko kuma wata jam'iyya mai ra'ayi guda na siyasa ba ne.

en: Through the sanctions they wanted to make life so difficult for the Iranian nation and the Islamic Republic that the people would protest against the Islamic Republic. This was their goal.
ha: Suna tunannin cewa ta hanyar wannan takunkumi za su sanya lamurra su zamanto masu wahalar gaske ga al'ummar Iran da kuma takura fage wa al'ummar Iran ta yadda su da kansu za su fito don nuna rashin amincewarsu da Jamhuriyar Musulunci; wannan ita ce manufarsu.

en: That is why arrogant powers became so angry.
ha: Hakan shi ne abin da ke bakanta wa ma'abota girman kan duniya rai.

en: Dear God, make benevolence prevalent in this country.
ha: Ka sanya kyawawan halaye su zamanto su ne masu iko a wannan kasar.

en: All those aid caravans from Isfahan, all those efforts and all that motivation, yet look at the families of those martyrs.
ha: Dukkanin irin wadannan taimako da ya fito daga Isfahan, irin wannan himma, irin wannan kumaji, irin wadannan iyalai da wadannan shahidai.

en: But our youth carried out research on it and they themselves produced the 20-percent fuel.
ha: Daga nan suna zaton ba za mu iya samar da bututun zuba makamashin ba; amma haka matasanmu suka samar da shi sannan suka fara aiki.

en: These are our capacities. This is our country.
ha: Wannan ita ce kwarewarmu, wannan kuma ita ce al'ummarmu.

en: He further reiterated: "This great insult was the result of post-election violations of the law and dependence on the encouragement of foreign media.
ha: Jagoran ya ci gaba da cewa: wannan gagarumin cin mutumci, sakamako ne na irin wannan take doka da kuma damfara zuciya da irin kwadaitarwar kafafen watsa labaran ‘yan kasashen waje.

en: During the hajj, all Muslims assemble in one place, focus their attention on the same thing, and prostrate before the same center. That is how we should view the hajj. We should view it as an opportunity.
ha: Dukkanin musulmi su taru waje guda, su fuskanci wata cibiya guda, wani waje guda, suna masu kankan da kai a gaban wannan waje; to da irin wannan kallo ne ya kamata mu kalli hajji; a matsayin wata dama.

en: These two factors are the key to the problems everywhere.
ha: Wadannan abubuwa su ne mabudin magance matsaloli a ko ina.

en: Even if all the oil and gas resources of the world were ours, they would not be of much use to us. As you know, there are some countries that are very rich in terms of their mineral and natural resources - including energy resources as well as precious and rare metals - but they are living an absolutely miserable life in abject poverty.
ha: Idan da a ce dukkanin man fetur da iskar gas na duniya an tara su ne a karkashin kasar mu da kuma rijiyoyinmu, da ba za su amfane mu ba; kamar yadda kuke ganin akwai wadansu kasashe wadanda a bangaren albarkatun kasa - shin albarkatu ne na makamashi ko kuma karafa masu tsananin kima - suna da dukiya mai yawa; to amma suna rayuwa mai wahala da tada hankali duk kuwa da suna rayuwa ne a saman wannan dukiyar.

en: The parliamentary election acted as an honest and powerful media outlet.
ha: Lalle wannan zaben ya zamanto wata kafar watsa labarai mai gaskiya da kuma karfi.

en: In one part of the Holy Quran, we religious scholars are advised to fear God and in another part, we are advised to "deliver the messages of Allah". The messages of Allah are the same messages that were delivered by His prophets.
ha: A nan ana yi mana wasicci da kankan da kai - a matsayin mu na malamai - a can kuma ana yi mana wasicci ne da "Wadanda ke iyar da manzancin Allah". To ‘manzancin Allah' dai shi ne ‘manzancin annabawan Allah'.

en: This takfiri orientation - the thing that has emerged in Iraq, Syria and some other regional countries today and that confronts all Muslims, not just Shias - is the handicraft of colonialists themselves.
ha: Wadannan kungiyoyi masu kafirta musulmi, wadannan da a halin yanzu suka kunno kai a kasashen Iraki da Siriya da ma wasu kasashen yankin nan, a hakikanin gaskiya suna fada ne da dukkanin musulmi, ba wai kawai da ‘yan Shi'a ba.

en: Dear brothers and sisters and dear people of Iran, elections are the manifestation of all the three beliefs of Imam Khomeini (r.a.) and we should have faith in the same things.
ha: Ya ku ‘yan'uwana maza da mata! Ya ku al'ummar Iran masu girma!

en: They rejected it as a radical movement. Imam (r.a.) remained in the arena, relying on the support of the people, and he managed to present the image of a truly decisive and determined spiritual leader to all people and to all history.
ha: Suna fadin cewa, wadannan masu tsaurin ra'ayi ne, yunkurin wani yunkuri ne na wuce gona da iri. Imam, sakamakon goyon bayan al'umma da ya samu, ya ci gaba da wannan yunkuri nasa, sannan kuma ya tabbatar wa duniya da kuma tarihi matsayinsa na wani jagora na addini sannan kuma mai azamar cimma manufar da ya sa a gaba.

en: Well, we support everybody.
ha: To mu dai mun goyi bayan dukkaninsu.

en: Of course some of the goals that had been specified in the fourth development plan were not achieved. Many factors were involved: both domestic and international issues were involved.
ha: Ko da yake ba a cimma wadansu daga cikin manufofin da aka tsara su cikin tsari na shekaru hudun ba, akwai dalilai daban-daban da suka hana cimma hakan; da suka hada da lamurra na cikin gida da kuma wasu na waje.

en: Our nation has now obtained a new capability. During their lifetime, people are tested every step of the way. If we manage to overcome our passions, if we manage to utilize our insight, if we manage to detect the right time, and if we recognize the necessary measures to be taken, we will enter a new stage of life.
ha: Idan har muka sami nasarar yin galaba a kan soyace-soyacen zuciyarmu, mu ka sami nasarar amfani da basirar da muke da ita, mu ka sami nasarar fahimtar yanayi, mu ka fahimci aikin da ya wajaba mu aikata sannan kuma muka aikata hakan, to hakan ya kan samar mana da wani sabon yanayi da wata sabuwar rayuwa ce; hakan wata daukaka da kuma ci gaba ne.

en: Those who think that they can bring the Iranian nation to its knees through sanctions are just wasting their time.
ha: Duk wanda ya ke tunanin cewa zai iya dunkufar da al'ummar Iran ta hanyar sanya mata takunkumi lalle ya kama teku da yasa.

en: For those brutal enemies, Kurds, Persians, Shias, and Sunnis are not different. Their spiteful and evil hearts would even let them cruelly oppress an old clergyman like the innocent martyr, Mamousta Sheikholeslam.
ha: A wajen wannan makiyin, babu wani bambanci tsakanin (‘yan kabilar) Sangdel, Kurdawa da Farisawa ko kuma Shi'a da Sunna. Zuciyarsu da take cike da kiyayya tana jansu zuwa ga aikata ayyukan ta'addanci da rashin imani hatta ga dattijon malami irin shahid Mamousta Sheik al-Islam.

en: What I expect from government officials and from our dear people is that they should listen to these slogans and try to practice them.
