en: Today these obstacles have been removed.
ha: To a yau dai an kawar da wadannan matsaloli.

en: This is the moral and religious responsibility of all of us.
ha: Wannan wani nauyi ne na ‘yan'adamtaka da kuma addini da ke wuyan kowannenmu.

en: This is the case with all historical movements.
ha: Haka dukkanin yunkure-yunkure na tarihi suka kasance.

en: Then, Hazrat says, "If any Muslim dies of grief after all this, he is not to be blamed".
ha: Daga nan sai Imam Ali (a.s) ya ce idan har wani musulmi ya mutu saboda bakin cikin wannan yanayin ba abin zargi ba ne.

en: Their propaganda mouthpieces- from the politicians whose behavior towards the Zionists and the U.S. is a source of disgrace for the world of Islam, to impious and haraam-eating muftis who blatantly issue fatwas against the Book and Sunnah, and to media minions who are not even deterred by codes of professional conduct from spreading and telling lies- are making futile efforts to show that the Islamic Republic is at fault for depriving Iranian pilgrims of this year’s hajj pilgrimage.
ha: Kafafen farfagandarsu - kama daga 'yan siyasarsu wadanda dabi'a da mu'amalarsu da Sahyoniyawa da Amurka abin kunya ne ga duniyar musulmi, zuwa ga malamansu marasa tsoron Allah da cin haramun wadanda a fili suke fitar da fatawowin da suka saba wa Littafin Allah da Sunnar (Ma'aiki) da kuma kafafen watsa labaransu wadanda hatta ka'idojin aikinsu ba su hana su yada karya ba - sun ci gaba da kokarin nuna cewa laifin na Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma zarginta da hana mahajjatan Iran tafiya aikin hajjin bana.

en: Praising Iran’s performance during the nuclear negotiations and the astonishing achievements of the country in recent years, Pahor stated: “Slovenia and Iran have many common experiences and numerous areas for cooperation.”
ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake jinjinawa irin abubuwan da Iran ta aikata yayin tattaunawar nukiliya da kuma irin ci gaba da Iran ta samu cikin shekarun baya-bayan nan, shugaban ya bayyana cewar: Iran da Slovenia suna da fagagen da suka yi tarayya cikinsa da za su iya aiki tare.

en: At this important meeting, which has been attended by a group of religious scholars of the Islamic Ummah from different Islamic countries and denominations, I believe it is appropriate to discuss a few necessary points regarding the issue of Islamic Awakening.
ha: A halin yanzu a wannan taron mai muhimmanci da wasu gungun malaman al'umma daga kasashe da kuma mazhabobi daban-daban da suka taru, ina ganin ya dace in yi bayanin wasu batutuwa na wajibi da suka shafi farkawa ta Musulunci:

en: We will never start a bloody war. The Iranian nation has proven this. But we are a nation that responds to all kinds of attack and even all kinds of threats with full force and determination.
ha: Mu dai ba masu wuce gona da iri (hari) kan wata al'umma ko kuma wata kasa ba ce; mu dai har abada ba za mu taba tsokano fada ba - al'ummar Iran ta tabbatar da hakan - to amma mu din nan wata al'umma ce mai mayar da martani mai tsananin gaske da kuma dukkan karfinta ga duk wani wuce gona da iri, kai hatta ma barazana.

en: She is a role model.
ha: Lalle wannan macen, abar koyi ce.

en: Thanks to God's grace, guidance, and assistance, our nation has managed to make quantum leaps in various fields.
ha: Al'ummar mu bisa yardar Allah, bisa shiryarwa ta Ubangiji, bisa taimakon Ubangiji, sun sami gagarumin ci gaba a fagagen kayayyakin aiki.

en: There are other factors involved. One is the issue of lack of determination.
ha: A nan akwai wadansu lamurra; na farkonsu shi ne batun rashin azama da irada.

en: This is a great movement by the people of Iran which is the result of the Revolution and selfless efforts of Iranian youth and government officials over the past thirty-something years.
ha: Wannan shi ne gagarumin yunkurin al'ummar Iran albarkacin wannan juyi da kuma himmar matasa da jami'anmu. Hakan abubuwa ne da suka faru tsawon wadannan shekaru talatin da wani abu.

en: Here he was arrested for the first time and spent one night in jail. The following the authorities ordered him not to speak at the pulpit again. From that moment he knew that he would be under police surveillance all the time.

Washegari dai sun sake shi amma da sharadin ba zai sake wa’azi ba kuma zai ci gaba da zama karkashin sanya idon jami’an tsaron.

en: For example, through their behavior and actions, the Iranian Muslims - who live under the flag of Islam and the Islamic Republic - should introduce the kind of Islam promoted by the Islamic Republic. They should show how Islamic education has affected them.
ha: Daya daga cikin mafi saukin hanyar da kowa zai iya binta, ita ce cewa Ba'iraniye musulmi wanda yake rayuwa karkashin inuwar jamhuriyar Musulunci, ta hanyar dabi'unsa, yunkurinsa, halayensa zai iya gabatar da kuma bayyanar da Musuluncin Jamhuriyar Musulunci; zai iya bayyanar da kansa, sannan kuma ya nuna irin tasirin tarbiyya ta Musulunci da ya samu.

en: Dear God, by the blessedness of Muhammad (s.w.a.) and his household, make the immaculate souls of our martyrs and the pure soul of our magnanimous Imam satisfied with us. Bestow on us of the grace and blessings that You bestowed on them.
ha: Saboda Muhammadu da Alayen Muhammadu, Ka sanya ruhin shahidai da kuma Imaminmu mai girma su yarda da mu, ka sanya mu cikin inuwar wannan falala da rahama da Ka ba su. Wassalamu alaikum wa rahamatullah wa barakatuhu.

en: I would like to raise another point which is the last one.
ha: Bari in fadi wani batun na daban wanda shi ne na karshe.

en: Successful companies throughout the world have managed to keep their customers satisfied for 100 or 150 years.
ha: Akwai kamfanoni a duniya wadanda tsawon shekaru dari zuwa dari da hamsin suka yi suna kera kayayyaki da kuma sayar da su ga masu saye da kuma ci gaba da samun yardarsu.

en: They must not let those rulers escape responsibility for the crimes they have caused throughout the world of Islam.
ha: Kada su bar wadannan mahukuntan su sha daga irin danyen aikin da suka aikata a duk fadin duniyar musulmi.

en: They themselves know that this is the truth.
ha: Su kansu sun cewa wannan shi ne hakikanin lamarin.

en: They threaten us with a military invasion, but I believe even they themselves know - and if they do not, they should know - that if they make a wrong move, the Islamic Republic will raze Tel Aviv and Haifa to the ground.
ha: A wasu lokuta jami'an haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila su kan yi mana barazana, suna barazanar kawo mana harin soji; to amma a ra'ayina sannan kuma su ma sun sani, idan ma har ba su sani ba, to su sani cewa, matukar dai gigi ya debe su (suka kawo mana hari), to kuwa Jamhuriyar Musulunci za ta rusa "Tel Aviv" da "Haifa" da mai she su turbaya.

en: Regarding political issues, the great event of the year 1392 is the presidential elections, which will in fact determine the executive and political destiny of the country - and in a sense, the general destiny of the country - for the next four years.
ha: A fagen lamurran siyasa, babban aikin da ake da shi a wannan shekarar ta 1392 shi ne zaben shugaban kasa da za a gudanar; wanda a hakikanin gaskiya shi ne zai tsara irin siyasar gudanar da kasar nan cikin shekaru hudu masu zuwa.

en: His Eminence stressed that the Islamic Republic will not establish any relation with the Zionist regime at all.
ha: Yayin da ya koma kan haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila kuwa, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kore yiyuwar kulla kowace irin alaka da gwamnatin sahyoniyawan, kamar yadda dangane da Amurka kuma ya ce: Har zuwa lokacin irin wannan yanayi na kiyayyar da Amurka take nunawa Iran ya ci gaba da sannan kuma jami'an Amurka suka ci gaba da fadin maganganu da nuna kiyayya ga Iran, to kuwa babu wani amfani cikin mu'amala da su.

en: I hope that Allah the Exalted will thoroughly approve of the program that was presented by you dear people including vocalists, presenters and all of you dear people.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya karbi irin wadannan tawassuli da dukkaninku ‘yan'uwa masu girma - mawaka da wadanda suka shirya wannan taron - suka yi.

en: Of course you should note that memorizing the Holy Quran is the first step.
ha: To amma yana da kyau a fahimci cewa haddar Alkur'ani wani mataki ne na farko.

en: You are very popular among the people of Iran and I hope you will remain popular forever.
ha: Ku din nan sanyin idanuwan al'ummar Iran ne, kuma insha allahu za ku ci gaba da zama hakan.

en: A believer is like a firm mountain that cannot be shaken by windstorms. None of these windstorms could shake his steely and firm determination.
ha: Mumini tamkar tsayayyen dutse ne, guguwa ba ta girgiza shi babu guda daga cikin irin wadannan guguwa da iskar da suke girgiza wannan tsayayyiyar irada da kuma azama.

en: These are different inter-connected levels of action. One of these levels, which is a link in the chain, is to thwart the scientific movement in the country by intimidating and eliminating our scientists.
ha: Wadannan wasu abubuwa ne da suke da alaka da junansu; daya daga cikin wadannan silsilar ma - wanda me yiyuwa ne silsila ce da suke hade da junansu - shi ne kawar da yunkuri na ilimi na kasar nan da kawar da masananmu da kuma kashe su.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the clear oppression against the people of Bahrain, Yemen and Libya and stressed: "Impartial analysis of the current regional developments, especially the events happening in these three countries, shows that western powers have oppressed the people and that they are the obvious criminal and culprit."
ha: Yayin da yake magana kan zaluncin da ake yi wa al'ummar Bahrain, Yemen da Libiya kuwa, Ayatullah Khamenei ya bayyana cewar: Alkalanci na hakika kuma na adalci yana nuni da cewa kasashen yammaci suna zaluntar al'ummomin wannan yankin musamman na wadannan kasashe uku, sannan kuma su ne asalin masu laifin da ba za a taba rufe ido kansu ba.

en: Every year the Leader of the Islamic Revolution issues a message to the great hajj congregation during the hajj season, which contains important points for Muslims of the world.
ha: - A kowace shekara a lokacin aikin hajji, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya kan aike da sako ga mahajjata wanda ya kumshi muhimman lamurran da suka shafi al’ummar musulmi na duniya.

en: These actions are the result of the fact that the Muslim world is more aware than ever before and that Muslims are determined to break the chain of two centuries of domination and invasion by the arrogant powers.
ha: Ya samo asali ne sakamakon irin farkawar da al'ummar musulmi suke samu sama da shekarun baya sannan kuma al'ummar musulmin sun yi azamar kawo karshen sarkar mulkin mallaka na karnoni biyu da kuma girman kan ma'abota girman kai.

en: Another example was the presence of the people of North Khorasan in the thick of the sanctions, which was an example that showed the conditions and spirits of the Iranian people and their attitude towards the Islamic system and the officials who are serving them.
ha: Wani misalin kuma shi ne irin fitowar da mutanen lardin Khorasan ta arewa suka yi (don tarbar jagoran a lokacin da ya kai ziyara can) duk kuwa da wannan takunkumin da aka sanya inda suka bayyanar da irin so da kaunar da suke yi wa wannan tsari na Musulunci da kuma jami'an gwamnati da kuma masu yi musu hidima.

en: The blatant opposition of the arrogant powers against the Islamic Republic is a result of the clear opposition of the Islamic Republic against the global arrogance.
ha: Fitowa fili da ma'abota girman kai na duniya suke yi wajen fada da jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran ya samo asali ne sakamakon irin fitowa filin da jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran wajen fada da ma'abota girman kai.

en: The weakness of the Islamic Ummah, our backwardness, our wrong behaviors, our moral deviations - all of these things are the result of having strayed away from the Holy Quran.
ha: Dukkanin raunin da kuma irin koma bayan da mu musulmi muke fuskanta, haka nan da kuma munanan halaye da jirkitacciyar fahimtar lamurra na kyawawan halaye da kuma rayuwa da muke fuskanta, dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne sakamakon nesantar Alkur'ani.

en: Arrogant governments, headed by the USA, conceal their true character with the help of comprehensive and advanced propaganda tools. By claiming that they support human rights and democracy, they deceive public opinion in different countries.
ha: Gwamnatoci ma'abota girman kai karkashin jagorancin Amurka, suna amfani da kafafen watsa labarai da suka ci gaba ainun wajen boye hakikaninsu, sannan kuma ta hanyar fakewa da batun goyon bayan kare hakkokin bil'adama da demokradiyya, suna ci gaba da yaudarar al'ummomin duniya.

en: If Hosni Mubarak had not cooperated with Israel in the case of the siege on Gaza, Israel could not have pressured the people of Gaza like that.
ha: Idan da a ce Hosni Mubarak bai hada kai da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila cikin killacewar da aka yi wa Gaza ba, to da kuwa Isra'ilan ba za ta iya aikata irin wannan cutarwar da ta yi wa mutanen Gazan ba.

en: And as they themselves said, the purpose of the pressure is to cripple the Iranian nation. Of course, much to the dismay of the enemy, the Iranian nation will not be crippled.
ha: Wadannan matsin lamba kuwa, kamar yadda su da kansu suke fadi mai gurguntarwa ga al'ummar Iran. Koda yaushe tabbas ba za su iya gurguntar da al'ummar Iran ba.

en: I would like to take this opportunity to ask our government officials to review the matters related to books, reading books and good and beneficial books. I would like to ask them to start a movement in the country. A new perspective should be adopted by those who make plans, those who produce books, those who are in charge of advertisement and those who read books - including our youth and others.
ha: Ni dai ina so in yi amfani da wannan dama ta wannan taron na yau in sake kira da sake yin wani sabon nazari cikin lamarin littafi da karatu da littafi mai kyau sannan kuma mai amfani; yana da kyau jami'an kasar nan su fara wani yunkuri (a wannan bangaren); kama daga masu tsare-tsare har zuwa ga masu samar da littafi da kuma wadanda suke isar da sako, har zuwa ga wadanda ake magana da su a cikin littafi, matasa da ma wadanda ba matasa ba da suke karanta littafa, su zamanto suna da wani sabon kallo wa littafi.

en: The next point is the issue of imports which was briefly mentioned in this meeting and which I have discussed on many occasions with government officials in charge of imports.
ha: Batu na gaba shi ne batun shigo da kayayyaki; wanda a nan ma an yi ishara da hakan, sannan kuma a lokuta da dama na sha magana da jami'ai kan wannan batu na shigo da kayayyaki.

en: This was what the movements were like. That is to say, due to different reasons, revolutions deviated from the original path at the beginning or later on.
ha: Haka wadannan yunkurin suka kasance. Wato juye-juyen halin da suka bayyana saboda wasu dalilai mabambanta ko dai tun daga ranakun farko-farko suka kauce wa hanya, ko kuma bayan wani lokaci kadan suka kauce wa tafarkin da suke kai.

en: We never wavered in identifying our goals and determining the path to reach them. We never wavered in our faith in the path we had chosen and we are thankful to Allah the Exalted for this.
ha: Babu wani lokacin da muka fuskanci matsalar shakku cikin ayyana manufofinmu da kuma hanyar isa gare su; ba mu yi shakkun hanyar da muke bi ba; lalle muna gode wa Allah.

en: The countries of the Balkans, Caucasus, and western Asia were liberated from the claws of the former Soviet Union after eighty years. Why should the Palestinian people not be able to free themselves from the captivity of the oppressor Zionists after seventy years?

en: Now I would like to give a piece of advice to the honorable candidates. The honorable candidates speak critically in the televised programs. This is their right.
ha: Bari in fadi wasu ‘yan jumloli ga ‘yan takara kuma. A yayin yakin neman zabe ‘yan takara masu girma sun yi suka kan wasu shirye-shirye na gwamnati, wannan hakkinsu ne.

en: And providence belongs to Allah and reliance is on Him.
ha: Dukkanin dacewa tana wajen Allah, sannan kuma a gare shi dukkanin dogaro take.

en: According to the divine promise, this movement will definitely achieve victory.
ha: Kamar yadda Allah ya yi alkawari, wannan yunkuri kuwa ko shakka babu zai yi nasara.

en: Imam Ali ibn Musa ar-Ridha (a.s.) told one of his companions, "May God bestow His grace on those who revive our command."
ha: Imam Ali bn Musa al-Ridha (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare shi) yana gaya wa wani daga cikin sahabbansa cewa: "Allah Ya yi rahama ga bawan da ya raya al'amarinmu".

en: Allah, hasten his re-appearance and place us among his companions, his supporters and his Shia.
ha: Ya Ubangiji ka gaggauta bayyanarsa sannan ka sanya mu daga cikin masu goyon baya da taimaka masa da kuma ‘yan Shi'ansa.

en: The life of nations depends on familiarity with Quranic teachings, acting according to the requirements of these teachings and practicing Quranic ahkaam [Islamic rules extracted from religious texts through Islamic jurisprudence].
ha: Rayuwar al'ummomi tana cikin masaniyar da suke da ita ne da Alkur'ani da kuma aiki da wadannan masaniya da ilmummuka da kuma hukumce-hukumce na Alkur'ani.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will increase the familiarity of our people, especially our youth, with the Holy Quran as much as possible.
ha: Ina rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da ya kara wa al'ummar mu musamman ma matasanmu masaniyar Alkur'ani mai girma.

en: Nouri Maliki expressed hope that his negotiations with Iranian officials will prepare the way for further expansion of ties between Iran and Iraq.

en: Their problem is not the nuclear issue.
ha: Matsalarsu ba batun nukiliya ba ne.

en: As I pointed out yesterday, a government like the Islamic Republic - with such ideals, with such goals, with such great claims - which is opposed to oppression, arrogance and the arrogant greed of the international powers, would naturally face different kinds of challenges. ha: Har ila yau kuma yayin da yake ishara da kisan gillan da tsohuwar gwamnatin Iran ta yi wa daliban makarantun sakandare a ranar 13, Aban 1357 (4/11/1978), Jagoran juyin juya halin Musuluncin cewa ya yi: Bisa la'akari da wadannan abubuwa, 13 ga watan Aban wata alama ce ta kasantuwar matasa a fage da kuma kasantuwarsu a sahun farko-farko.

en: As I said, you are the ambassadors of Iran who represent the Iranian nation's identity and dignity.

en: Creating your own system of governance is your main and seminal task.
ha: Kafa wani tsari na gudanarwa shi ne babban aikinku kuma na asali.

en: 13. Creating a balance between wage increase and improving manpower productivity.
ha: 13- Kula da daidaito tsakanin karin albashi da kuma irin aikin da ake yi.

en: The right logic requires that you understand the nature and essence of what they are frightening you about and want you to keep away from. I don't insist that you accept my reading or any other reading of Islam. What I want to say is: Don't allow this dynamic and effective reality in today's world to be introduced to you through resentments and prejudices.

Ni dai ba ina cewa ne lalle sai kun yarda da fahimta ta ko fahimtar wani kan Musulunci ba, sai dai abin da nake cewa shi ne kada ku bari a kange ku daga wannan hakikar wacce take da tasiri cikin duniyar yau saboda cimma wata bakar manufa.

en: I ask Almighty God to bestow success on you.
ha: Ina roka maka maka taimako Allah Madaukakin Sarki da dacewa cikin wannan aikin.

en: A mother - who has spent about 20 years of her life to raise a child with her motherly love - sends her young child to the battlefield, and she is not even sure whether the body will be returned to her.
ha: Matar da ta mika wani matashinta, wani abin kaunanta, wanda ta yi tarbiyansa na tsawon shekaru sha takwas, ko shekaru ashirin - kasa da haka ko kuma sama da haka - sannan kuma duk da irin wannan so da kauna ta uwa, amma ta mika shi zuwa ga fagen daga ba tare da ta san cewa mai yiyuwa ko ma gawarsa ba za a dawo mata da shi ba.

en: The events that happened in the year 1391 contain a big lesson for us. The lesson is that a vibrant nation will never be brought to its knees as a result of the enemies' threats, pressure and harsh measures.
ha: Akwai darussa masu girma cikin abubuwan da suka faru a shekara ta 1391 a gare mu; wannan darasin kuwa shi ne cewa duk wata al'ummar da take a raye, to barazana da matsin lamba da takuri na makiya ba za su taba dunkufar da ita ba.

en: That is to say, the year in which they were determined to be harsh towards the Iranian nation, our honorable youth and scientists launched the Nahid satellite into space. They launched the Pishgam explorer which was carrying a living creature.
ha: Wato a dai wannan shekarar da suke son kuntata wa al'ummar Iran, amma sai ga shi matasanmu da masananmu masu girma a wannan shekarar suka aika da tauraron dan'adam na Nahid zuwa sararin samaniya; aka aika halitta mai rai zuwa sararin samaniyya da ta hanyar na'urar Peshgam; sannan kuma aka kera jirgin saman yaki na zamani.

en: Although many countries have made an effort to manufacture and amass nuclear weapons - which in itself can be considered a preface to committing crimes and has seriously jeopardized global peace - there is only one government that has committed a nuclear crime so far.

en: Of course Imam Khomeini (r.a.) was kind enough to let some of them - like women - return to America after a short period of time. However, the main elements of the embassy stayed here for a long time.

en: In order to reach this goal, all media outlets, all cultural advisors, all public relations facilities and all media networks that we have at our disposal should try to convey these messages to different parts of the world.

en: Receive knowledge of Islam from its primary and original sources.
ha: Kamata yayi ku fahimci Musulunci daga tushensa na asali.

en: Make the best of this opportunity.
ha: Lalle ku yi kokarin amfanuwa da kyau da wannan damar.

en: In the afternoon of Ashura (June 3, 1963), Imam Khomeini delivered a speech at the Feiziyeh Madreseh seminary in which he drew parallels between Yazid and the Shah and warned the Shah that if he did not change his ways, the day would come when the people would offer up thanks for his departure from the country.
ha: A bangare guda, Shah ya dage sai ya aiwatar da shirinsa na kawo canjin da Amurka ta ke bukata, a bangare guda kuma Imam Khumaini ya dage wajen wayar da kan al'umma wajen tsayawa da fuskantar tsoma bakin Amurka cikin al'amurran cikin gidan Iran da kuma ha'incin Shah.

en: I would like you not to allow the derogatory and offensive image-buildings to create an emotional gulf between you and the reality, taking away the possibility of an impartial judgment from you.

en: Humanity has moved through difficult paths and has cleared various obstacles in order to reach this main road. This main road is the road that will be built after the re-appearance of the Imam of the Age (a.s.). It is the world that will be built after the re-appearance of Imam Mahdi (a.s.).
ha: Tsawon wadannan karnoni masu yawa, dan'adam ya fuskanci matsaloli da hanyoyi masu tsananin wahala da abubuwa masu kawo masa cikas a kan hanya, a kokarin da ya ke yi na isa ga wannan hanya ta asali. Wannan hanya ta asali kuwa ita ce dai wannan hanya ta lokacin bayyanar Imam Mahdi; ita ce wannan duniya ta lokacin bayyanar Mahdi wanda alal hakika yunkurin bil'adama ta wani bangaren daga nan take farowa.

en: The accelerated scientific progress and the conquering of the peaks of knowledge - which has been promoted by the determination of pious, proud and competent youth such as Shahid Ahmadi-Roshan - is independent of individuals. This is a historic movement that is rooted in an unbreakable national will.
ha: Irin gagarumin ci gaba na ilimi (da Iran take samu) albarkacin irin gagarumar himmar matasanmu muminai kuma masu kishi irin su Shahid Mustafa, ba wani lamari ne da ya dogara da mutum guda ba, hakan wani lamari ne da ya samo asali daga wani yunkuri na tarihi da kuma azama ta wata al'umma.

en: A country in which everybody is prepared for battle would never be defeated.

en: Therefore, if we want to have an appropriate evaluation of the country's conditions, we need to see both positive and negative points.

en: Explaining the comprehensiveness of the meaning of Imamate, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution added: "Even in the most secular governments of the world, in spite of all the claims that political centers are separate from religious and spiritual centers, the life of the people both in this world and in the hereafter is in the hands of the rulers, and the positions adopted by the rulers shape the life of the people of those societies in this world and in the hereafter."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya ci gaba da cewa: Hatta a cikin mafi girman hukumar da babu ruwanta da addini, duk kuwa da ikirarin da suke yi dangane da raba addini da siyasa, to amma duniya da lahirar mutane suna hannun masu mulki ne sannan kuma su ne suke tsara wa rayuwar mutane irin yadda za ta kasance.

en: This is the kind of importance that should be attached to the issue of Mahdaviat and we are better qualified to work on this issue.

en: The elder son, Mostafa, was murdered in 1977 while in exile with his father in Najaf, Iraq and SAVAK (the Imperial-era secret police) was accused of his death by Imam Khomeini. Ahmad Khomeini, the younger son, died in 1995. Imam Khomeini's grandson Seyyed Hassan Khomeini, son of the late Seyyed Ahmad Khomeini, is also a cleric and the trustee of Imam Khomeini's shrine.
ha: Taken "Ya Husain" da masu juyayin suke rerawa alhali suna dukan kirji da kawunansu ya mai da yanayin wajen tamkar yanayin Ranar Ashurar da Imam Husaini (a.s) ya yi shahada. Bisa la'akari da cewa al'umma ba za su sake jin sautin Imam Khumaini dake cike da yanayin tunasar da mutum Ubangiji a Husaniyyar Jamaran ba, hakan ya kasance abin tashin hankali ga al'umma.

en: And this is the path that lies ahead of us, and we should tread this path appropriately. We should move forward with self-confidence. We should make use of all our power, our human and intellectual capacities, and the talents that Allah the Exalted has bestowed on the Iranian nation.

ha: Wannan kuwa yana daga cikin siffofin da Musulunci ya kebanta da su ne.

en: Besides all these things, the Occupy Wall Street movement has started in the cities of America.
ha: Baya ga dukkanin wadannan abubuwan, sai kuma ga yunkurin Wall Street da ya kunno kai a cikin Amurkan.

en: Therefore, these problems exist. Today you see that they create internal disputes in Egypt and other places.
ha: A yau ana iya ganin yadda suka haifar da sabani na cikin gida a kasar Masar da sauran wajaje na daban, suna haifar da rikici kuma ko shakka babu ma za su yi kashe-kashe.

en: Discord among us is the biggest blessing for them.
ha: Don kuwa haifar da sabani wata babbar ni'ima ce a gare su.

en: Compared with divine rewards, what is the value of this material compensation?
ha: Shin wani girma wannan kyauta ta duniya take da ita?

en: It is good if people hear these things from individuals in charge of different sectors who are independent of the government. These things would make the people hopeful and happy.
ha: Lalle lamari ne mai kyau mutane su ji hakan daga bakin jami'an bangarori daban-daban wadanda ba na gwamnati ba; hakan lamari ne da zai kara wa mutane karfin gwuiwa da kuma sanya su farin ciki.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei called on the people, the educational system and teachers to appreciate the role and position of teachers and reiterated: "Correct, wise and caring actions of teachers can definitely lay a firm foundation in society in order to solve many of the cultural, ethical and behavioral problems."
ha: A saboda haka Ayatullah ya kirayi dukkanin al'umma, ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya da kuma su kansu malaman da su fahimci irin matsayin da malami yake da shi yana mai cewa: Ko shakka babu ingantaccen aiki, tunani da kuma nuna ya kamatan malamai zai taimaka wajen gina karfafaffen tushe a cikin al'umma wanda za a iya magance mafi yawa daga cikin matsaloli na al'adu da kyawawan halaye da ake fuskanta.

en: He was growing old, but he was young at heart and his soul was vibrant.
ha: Ya tsufa, amma zuciyarsa ta matasa ce, ruhinsa a raye yake.

en: We should be able to increase our products.
ha: Wajibi ne mu kara irin abubuwan da muke samarwa.

en: When you rely on yourselves, your talents flow like an inexhaustible spring and offer their outcomes to you, your organization and your nation.
ha: Idan kuka dogara da kanku, karfin da kuke da shi da kuma irin shirin da kuke da shi zai ci gaba da ba ku abubuwan da kuke bukata tamkar wata mabubbugar ruwa da take da fitar da ruwan ne.

en: There is a lesson in the fact that Teachers' Day was chosen to coincide with the day a great teacher was martyred. That was a symbolic decision. That is to say, the greatness of teaching is so much that this praiseworthy and great job requires a combination of intellectual and scholarly work as well as presence in essential arenas of life - as was evident in Shahid Motahhari's life.
ha: Sanya ranar malamai ta zamanto ta yi daidai da ranar shahadar wani malami mai girma, hakan darasi ne a gare mu; wannan wani yunkuri ne da ke nuni da wani abu; wanda shi ne cewa girman aikin koyarwa da tarbiyya ya kai irin wannan matsayi mai girma inda ya samo asali daga aiki na tunani da ilimi da kasantuwa a fagage na asasi na rayuwa - abin da aka gan shi cikin rayuwar shahid Mutahhari (yardar Allah ta tabbata a gare shi) - hakan shi ne abin da ake son gani cikin wannan aiki mai girma da daukaka.

en: Why are they threatening the world with destruction?
ha: Me ya sa kake barazanar ruguza duniya?

en: The people of Qom played a role in the Revolution.
ha: Mutanen Kum sun gabatar da gagarumar gudummawa ga wannan juyin juya hali.

en: If these things happen, victory will be definite and swift. This is how we should look at basijis and the basiji spirit, and we should try to strengthen this spirit as much as we can.
ha: Da irin wannan mahangar ce ya kamata mu dinga kallon dakarun Basij, da irin wannan mahangar ya kamata mu dinga kallon ruhin Basiji, sannan kuma mu yi kokarin karfafa wannan ruhin gwargwadon iyawarmu.

en: The opportunity to establish a relationship with the world of Islam is another manifestation of this great opportunity.
ha: Wani lamari kuma na daban da za a iya amfanuwa da shi cikin wannan gagarumar dama, shi ne damar haduwa da sauran al'ummar musulmi.

en: Is this something insignificant?
ha: Shin wannan karamin lamari ne?

en: I would like to stress that despite their will and much to their disappointment, in the year 1390 the Iranian nation once again convinced the enemies and the entire world - with its activities, advances and decisions - that it is capable.
ha: Ina son kowa ya fahimci cewa cewar sabanin abin da suke fatan gani al'ummar Iran ta hanyar ci gaba da tafiya a kan tafarkin da suka rika da kuma irin ci gaban da suka samu da kuma tsayin dakansu sun bada musu kasa a ido da kuma tabbatar wa dukkan duniya ciki kuwa har da makiya din cewa 'lalle za mu iya'.

en: The Iranian New Year is a valuable opportunity for all Iranian people and for all Muslims who celebrate Norouz to contribute to the Islamic movement.
ha: Idin Nurouz na Iran ga dukkaninmu mutanen Iran da sauran musulmi na sauran kasashe da suke girmama wannan idi wata dama ce abar girmamawa da kuma amfani da ita a bangare na addini da yunkuri na Musulunci.

en: We have made progress in these areas.
ha: Mun sami ci gaba a wadannan fagage.

en: Discipline is a value. The Commander of the Faithful (a.s.) used to tell his children: "I advise you to fear God and organize your affairs."
ha: Amirul Muminin (a.s) yana wasicci wa 'ya'yansa da cewa: "Ina muku wasicci da tsoron Allah da kuma tsara al'amurranku" (Nahjul Balaga, wasika ta 47).

en: It is 35 years now that they have been making all sorts of efforts. However, by God's permission and grace, they were defeated in all the efforts that they made against the Islamic Republic.
ha: Shekaru 35 kenan suke ta kokari ta hanyoyi daban-daban, amma cikin ikon Allah da yardarsa, sun sha kashi cikin dukkanin wadannan makirce-makirce na su a kan Jamhuriyar Musulunci.

en: Today nobody can say that a particular area does not have electricity or roads and other such things.
ha: A yau babu wani da zai iya cewa waje kaza ba su da wutan lantarki ko kuma a matsayin misali hanyoyi da sauransu.

en: But if this means that we should look down on homemaker, then we have committed a sin. Homemaking is a job.
ha: Amma idan har ya zamanto da ma'anar cewa za mu kaskantar da yanayin kula da gida da mace take yi, to a nan kan ya kan zama laifi.

en: The Zionists try to prevent the messages from being published.
ha: Yahudawan sahyoniya suna kokarin hana yaduwar wannan sakon.

en: [The Holy Quran 6: 112] Divine prophets are surrounded by devils "from among men and jinn". They are attacked by devils from among mankind and jinn.
ha: Kuma da Ubangijinka Ya so, da ba su aikata shi ba, don haka ka bar su da abin da suke kirkirawa" (Suratul An'am 6:112).

en: That is the role the education system should play.
ha: Wannan ita ce gudummawar ma'aikatar ilimi da tarbiyya.

en: Today the enemies of the Iranian nation have grown weaker.
ha: Su kuwa makiyan al'ummar Iran a yau suna fama da rauni sama da shekarun da suka gabata, sun fi zama abin kyama da kuma fuskantar matsaloli.

en: It was not just enthusiastic youth who stepped into the arena. Everybody came.
ha: Lamarin ba wai shi ne kawai matasa masu kishi sun shigo cikin fage ba ne, kowa da kowa ne ya fito.

en: In these areas, groups of people would come together here and there and they would start defending the country after going through a lot of trouble to gather weapons.
ha: A wadancan yankuna, nan da can kungiyoyi na mutane sun taru, cikin wahala suka sama wa kansu makamai da kuma hanyar kare kai.

en: One characteristic of Basij is that it follows a straight path towards the lofty goals of the Islamic Revolution without any deviations.
ha: Ci gaba da tafiya a kan mikakken tafarkin juyin juya halin Musulunci ba tare da wuce gona da iri ko kauce wa hanya ba, hakan daya ne daga cikin kebantattun siffofin Basij.

en: The Leader of the Islamic Revolution described the moral condition of the modern world as extremely bad and reiterated: "It is possible to change this appalling fate of humanity, but the first prerequisite is to make great changes in the country and turn it into a material and spiritual role model."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya bayyana yanayin da duniya take ciki a halin yanzu a bangaren kyawawan dabi'u da cewa yanayi mai munin gaske inda ya kara da cewa: Bil'adama suna iya sauya wannan mummunan yanayi, to sai dai sharadin hakan na farko shi ne samar da gagarumin sauyi a cikin kasa da kuma mai she ta ta zamanto abar koyi na abin duniya da abubuwan da suke karfafa ruhi.

en: The achievement that was made in Iran - all analysts of the world would sit down together for hours and days and nights to discuss it and all of them would reach a unanimous conclusion: that it was impossible.
ha: A Iran an aiwatar da wani abu wanda idan da dukkanin masu sharhi na duniya, za su zauna na tsawon sa'oi dare da rana su ba da lokacin su, babu wani sakamako da za su kai gare shi in ba cewa lalle hakan ba abu ne mai yiyuwa ba.

en: You have gathered here from different countries.
ha: (Ku din nan) mutane ne da kuka fito daga kabilu daban-daban, daga kasashe daban-daban, kuka taru a nan.

en: Today you are moving in the opposite direction.
ha: To ku din nan a yau kuna tafiya ne akasin hakan.

en: The peaks that I told you about belong to you.
ha: Wadannan manufofi da na fadi na ku ne.

en: Our country, which had made no scientific achievements, has achieved this position. There was a time we had to ask foreigners to send their engineers to our country to build dams, roads and factories for us whenever we needed a road, a highway, a dam or a factory.
ha: Mu din nan mun kasance wata kasa ce wacce idan har muna son mu gina hanya, ko babban titi ko madatsar ruwa ko wani kamfani, to wajibi ne mu mika hannuwanmu ga wasu, don injiniyoyi daga waje su zo su gina mana wannan madatsar ruwar, su gina mana hanya da kuma wani kamfani.

en: The enormous talent that our nation enjoys had been buried like a forgotten treasure. Proving one's talent was a matter of chance and it did not really happen.
ha: Irin wannan kwarewa da al'ummar mu take da ita, ta kasance tamkar wata ajiya ce wacce aka mance da ita, tamkar wata ajiya ce wacce aka bisne ta; sai dai kawai a dan wasu lokuta da ake samun wani mutum guda ya bayyanar da kansa.

en: As Mr. Mamduhi rightly pointed out, it is necessary to select certain parts of the books written by the late Mr. Motahhari and the holy book "Al-Mizan" and to present them to our youth based on their needs and questions.
ha: Mai girma Malam Mamduhi ya fadi sannan kuma abin da ya fadin haka yake; wadannan littafa na marigayi Ayatullah Mutahari, littafin Mizan, a sami wani ya zo ya tsara su yadda suka dace da kuma gabatar da su don su magance matsalolin matasa.

en: Sentimental work should be avoided in the case of political issues of the country.
ha: Haka nan dangane da lamurra na siyasa na kasa, ku gudanar da ayyukan da suka dace ba tare da kumaji da rashin lissafi ba.

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on May 1, 2013 by Ayatollah Khamenei, the Leader of the Islamic Revolution, in a meeting with a group of panegyrists on the occasion of the birthday anniversary of Fatima Zahra (s.a.).
ha: Shimfida: Abin da ke biye fassarar jawabin da Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya yi ne a lokacin ganawarsa da mawaka da sauran masu yabon Ahlulbaiti (a.s) a ranar haihuwar Sayyida Fatima al-Zahra (a.s) a ranar 01, Mayu, 2013:

en: On the 22nd of Bahman, the people of Iran gave them a powerful punch in the mouth with their massive presence, with their enthusiasm and with the affection that they expressed for Islam, the Islamic Revolution and the Islamic Republic.
ha: A ranar 22 ga watan Bahman, al'ummar Iran sun bada musu kasa a fuska ta hanyar irin fitowar da suka yi da kuma nuna so da kaunar da suka nunawa wannan tsari na Musulunci da kuma juyin juya halin Musulunci.

en: Many of the people who got cold feet and gave up used to be extremist revolutionaries one day. But you see now that they are standing for exactly the opposite of what they used to stand for and are serving the anti-revolutionaries.
ha: Da dama daga cikin mutanen da suka ja da baya, a baya sun kasance ‘yan a mutun wannan juyi; amma a wata rana ku din nan kun ga yadda suka tsaya da dukkan karfinsu wajen fada da hakan da kuma taimaka wa masu adawa da wannan juyin! Hakan saboda wadannan dalilai ne; son zuciya, son rai, da kutsawa cikin son abin duniya.

en: It is necessary to make good and wholesome books available.
ha: Wajibi ne mu gabatar wa mutane da littafa masu kyau sannan kuma ingantattu.

en: If we accept that the camp of the enemy has prepared long-term plans for our country and our Revolution, then we must prepare long-term plans as well.
ha: Idan har mun yarda da cewa makiya suna da wani dogon shiri wajen cutar da kasar mu da kuma juyin juya halin mu, to don haka mu ma wajibi ne mu zamanto muna da wani shiri na dogon lokaci saboda su.

en: In the agricultural sector we produce outstanding products.
ha: A bangaren aikin gona dai muna da kayayyaki masu kyaun gaske.

en: However, experts believe that at this point in time economic issues are more important and more urgent than all other issues of the country.
ha: To sai dai a ra'ayin masana, a wannan lokacin batun tattalin arziki ya fi komai muhimmanci.

en: Of course this movement, which has gained further momentum on a daily basis, is the result of many years of efforts by our people and government officials. But this movement has gained further momentum with the passage of time.
ha: Ko da yake wannan yunkuri a kowace rana yana kara girma ne wanda hakan ya samo asali ne sakamakon wahala da kuma kokarin jami'ai da al'umma tsawon shekara da shekaru; amma abin farin cikin shi ne cewa gwargwadon yadda wannan yunkuri yake ci gaba, gwargwadon yadda yake kara girma da samun ci gaba.

en: Anybody who has followed the political propaganda of the ill-wishers of the Iranian nation realizes that all the activities, all the economic and political efforts and all the security and military threats are aimed at stopping, disappointing and intimidating the vibrant, living, dynamic, determined and capable Iranian nation, a nation that is standing firm in the middle of the arena in a totally courageous way, a nation that is moving forward.
ha: Duk wanda ya ke bi irin farfagandar da masu bakar aniya kan al'ummar Iran suke yi, a fili zai iya ganin irin wadannan kokari na aiki, kokari na tattalin arziki da kokari na siyasa, barazana ta soji da dai sauransu da suka yi wajen ganin sun dunkufar da tsayayyiyar al'ummar Iran daga fagen ci gaba da gudanar da ayyukanta da kuma samun ci gaba, su sanya ta yanke kauna da kuma razana ta daga irin wannan kasantuwa da take da ita a fage.

en: And this is a great blessing that every year on Norouz I find the opportunity to see the joys and beauties that are inherent to Norouz and at the same time evaluate current issues and conditions of the country among you people, take a look at our past and future and have brief evaluation of our large-scale national conditions. It is necessary for us to evaluate ourselves in the case of our personal matters.
ha: Lalle wannan wata dacewa ce a gare na cewa a kowace shekara, a irin wannan rana ta idin Nourouz, cikin irin wannan farin ciki da annashuwa ta al'umma, in sami damar da kasantuwa a cikinku da kuma tattunawa kan batutuwan da suka shafi kasar nan, yanayin da ake ciki, sannan kuma mu yi dubi zuwa ga abubuwan da suka faru a baya da kuma wadanda za su faru nan gaba. A takaice dai mu yi dubi a yanayi na gaba daya cikin abubuwan da suka faru cikin shekara.

en: Ayatollah Khamenei, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution, met Tuesday morning with Borut Pahor, the President of Slovenia.
ha: Jagora Imam Khamenei Ya Gana Da Shugaban Kasar Slovenia Borut Pahor
(11 ga watan Mayu, 2016)

en: I usually skim through 10, 20 newspapers each day.

en: During the Sacred Defense Era, before he was appointed as an Air Force commander, Shahid Sattari made many valuable efforts without many people knowing. He also rendered a lot of services as a commander.
ha: A lokacin kallafaffen yaki, kafin a ba shi matsayin kwamandan soji, ya gudanar da gagarumin kokari ba kama hannun yaro sannan kuma a lokacin da aka ba shi shugabannin sojoji ma ya gudanar da gagarumar hidima.

en: One camp is after the truth and the opposing camp is after falsehood. If the righteous camp is afraid, it is clear that it will be defeated: it might be righteous, yet it will be defeated.
ha: A kan sami wani lokacin da ya kan tsoratar da bangaren gaskiyar; a irin wannan yanayin ko shakka babu (bangaren gaskiyar) zai sha kashi, na'am ya riki gaskiya amma dai zai sha kashi.

en: Why should someone make such a great mistake?
ha: Me ya sa mutum zai aikata irin wannan gagarumin kuskure?

en: I would also like to congratulate all you dear audience, the dear people of Isfahan, the entire Iranian nation and all Muslims throughout the world on Eid al-Adha.
ha: Haka nan kuma ina taya ku da sauran mutanen garin Isfahan da dukkanin al'ummar Iran da sauran dukkanin al'ummar musulmi na duniya murnar wannan idi na babbar salla.

en: The same thing which has been shouted as a slogan in the Islamic Republic for decades is revealing itself in the context of these countries. These developments have two characteristics: one is the presence of the people, and other is the religious orientation of these movements.
ha: Wannan lamari da shekara da shekaru kenan ake daga takensa a Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, to sai ga shi a yau yana nuna kansa cikin rayuwar kasashe. Akwai wadansu siffofi guda biyu da wadannan lamari ya kebanta da su: na farko shi ne batun kasantuwar mutane, na biyu kuma shi ne riko da addini da kuma komawa gare shi.

en: This year in order to attain that which this noble prayer teaches us and that which is our duty, in order to fulfill the needs and potentials of our nation, we need to multiply our efforts and increase our labor.
ha: A wannan shekarar saboda mu sami damar aikata abin da aka koyar da mu cikin wannan addu'a mai girma da kuma sauke nauyin da ke wuyanmu, saboda mu yunkura gwargwadon irin karfi da bukatar wannan kasar, akwai bukatar mu kara ninninka irin himmar da muke da ita; mu kara nishadi da kumaji cikin ayyukan da muke gudanarwa.

en: The only sound which should be produced by mosques is the sound of adhan [call to prayer] recited in a pleasant voice.
ha: Sautin da ya kamata kawai ya dinga tashi daga masallaci shi ma da sauti mai dadi yadda ya dace shi ne sautin kiran salla.

en: You should stand firm against the enemy, but you should be compassionate among yourselves.
ha: Ku zamanto a tsaye da kafafunku, to amma kuma "masu rahama ne a tsakaninsu".

en: That is the meaning of "intensified labor".
ha: Hakan kuwa abu ne mai yiyuwa.

en: We had certain learned people - both religious and non-religious scholars - who not only failed to make use of their knowledge to benefit themselves and others, but their knowledge also became a burden and a problem.
ha: Muna da wani malami - wanda yake da ilimi na addini da wanda ba na addini ba - wanda ba wai kawai bai amfana da ilimin ba ne, face ma dai ya zamanto bala'i a gare shi.

en: In this regard our magnanimous Imam (r.a.) was similar to the Lord of the Martyrs. I explained this in another meeting and I do not want to go into the details now.
ha: Imamin mu mai girma (Imam Khumaini) ya taba kwatanta irin wannan yanayi da kuma shugaban shahidai wanda a wani lokaci a baya na taba fadin hakan, to a halin yanzu dai ba na son in shiga wannan fagen; don kuwa yana bukatar sharhi.

en: During my last meeting with the esteemed members of the Islamic Revolution's Guards Corps, I raised an important point.
ha: A ganawa ta karshe da na yi da 'yan'uwa dakarun kare juyi masu girma, na fadi wani abu wanda yana da muhimmancin gaske.

en: The important point is that a nation should learn and become determined to move towards perfection.
ha: Abin da ke da muhimmanci shi ne cewa wata al'umma ta koya sannan kuma ta saba da tafiya a kan tafarkin isa ga kamala da daukaka da kuma samun tsayayyiyar azama.

en: We should truly appreciate the opportunity to use the intellectual products by different people and this is what books can give us.
ha: A saboda haka wajibi ne mu yi kokarin amfanuwa da wadannan abubuwa da tunanin mutane daban-daban suka samar da su; wannan shi ne abin da littafi ya ke gabatar mana da shi, ya ke gabatar mana da shi a matsayin kyauta; wannan shi ne kyautar da littafi ya ba mu.

en: In the hope of reaching that day and greetings be upon the one remaining with Allah on earth (may our souls be sacrificed for his sake)
ha: Muna fatan ganin wannan ranar, sannan kuma da sallamar mu zuwa ga mai girma Bakiyatullah (Imam Mahdi) rayukanmu su zamanto fansa a gare shi.

en: All praise is due to Allah, the Lord of the Worlds, and peace and greetings upon our Master and Prophet, Ab-al-Qassem Al-Mustafa Muhammad, and upon his immaculate and infallible household, especially the one remaining with Allah on earth.
ha: Dukkan godiya ta tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin talikai. Tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata ga shugabanmu kuma annabinmu Abul Kasim al-Mustafa Muhammad tare da tsarkakan iyalan gidansa zababbu shiryayyu masu shiryarwa kuma ma'asumai, musamman ma Wanzajjen Allah a bayan kasa.

en: The novel and outstanding work that has been done in this company is very valuable. The company was established and operated by the Iranian workforce in a short period of time.
ha: Ayyukan da alhamdu lillahi aka yi a wannan kamfanin sannan kuma a yau mun gansu abubuwa ne masu kimar gaske; kwararru na cikin gida ne suka tsara da gina shi da kuma kayayyakin da ake amfani da su a wajen.

en: Get to know each other.
ha: Ku yi kokari wajen sanin junanku.

en: It was the Americans who used to tell him to whom he should sell oil and to whom he should not.
ha: Ganga kaza za ku samar na man fetur, ku sayar da kaza; ga wa za ku sayar, sannan kada ku sayar ga wane.

en: Is this an insignificant achievement?
ha: Shin wannan karamin abu ne?

en: Certain efforts were made which are appreciated, but the great task that should be carried out in the arena of economic valor is still ahead of us. We are responsible for achieving this epic.
ha: An gudanar da ayyuka daban-daban, wanda abin godiya ne, amma babban aikin da ya kamata a aikata a fagen tattalin arziki har yanzu yana nan a kasa. Wajibi ne mu aikata hakan.

en: We have been supporting the Palestinian people for 32 years. Which country, which government and which nation has offered support to the Palestinian nation during the past 32 years?
ha: Mu dai shekaru talatin da biyu kenan mu ke goyon bayan al'ummar Palastinu; wata kasa ce, wata gwamnati ce, wata al'umma ce ta ba su irin wannan goyon bayan da Iran ta ba su tsawon shekaru talatin da biyun nan?

en: Following the divine path for the sake of God is the requirement for being considered a martyr and mujahid. That is to say, a martyr should have sincerity.
ha: Sharadin shahada da jihadi a tafarkin Allah shi ne cewa wajibi ne manufar mutum ta zamanto saboda Allah; wato ya zamanto yana da ikhlasi.

en: Surely We have revealed the Reminder, and surely We are its Guardian. [The Holy Quran, 15:9]
ha: Allah Madaukakin Sarki Yana fadin cewa: "Lalle mu ne muka saukar da ambato (Alkur'ani mai girma) kuma lalle mu masu kare shi ne" (Suratul Hijr;9).

en: Reliable statistics have been published which show that if the subsidy law had not been implemented, we would be consuming gas almost twice the amount we currently do.
ha: Kididdigar da aka fitar, kuma kididdiga ce abar yarda, tana nuna mana cewa idan da a ce har ya zuwa yanzu ba a fara aiwatar da wannan shiri ba, to da kuwa irin amfani da mai da ake yi a kasar nan ya ninka irin yadda ake amfani da shi a halin yanzu har sau biyu.

en: At the beginning of the movement, these three beliefs were a source of energy for Imam (r.a.).
ha: A farko farkon wannan gwagwarmayar, wadannan imani guda ukun su ne suka ba wa Imam karfi.

en: During the months following the election, the people demonstrated their presence, determination, resistance, national determination, and insight in a great test and in a great and fateful movement.
ha: Tsawon watannin da suka biyo bayan zaben (shugaban kasar da aka gudanar din) mutane sun kasance cikin jarrabawa mai girma, sannan kuma sun nuna irin gagarumin yunkuri mai ayyana makomarsu, kasantuwarsu a fage, iradarsu, tsayin dakansu, azama ta kasar da suke da ita da kuma basirarsu.

en: There is a great opportunity for you here.
ha: To wannan waje (makarantar hauza ta Kum) wata dama ce mai girma a gare ku.

en: The world of Islam is divided. In spite of the fact that Muslims have access to the Holy Quran and firm religious teachings, they are suffering from backwardness due to various reasons.
ha: Duniyar musulmi, duniya ce da ta rarrabu. Al'ummar musulmi duk kuwa da Alkur'anin da suke da shi, duk da irin wadannan karfafa koyarwa da suke da su, to amma sakamakon wasu abubuwa sun kasance a baya.

en: By Allah's favor, this coincidence will help our people to benefit from the blessings of Fatemi enlightenment, to place themselves in the radius of the teachings of that great personality and to enlighten themselves with the light of divine guidance which has been bestowed upon all the people throughout the world through Fatimah Zahra- Allah's greetings upon her- and the Holy Prophet's (s.a.w.a.s.) household.
ha: Muna fatan insha Allahu, al'ummarmu za su amfana da albarkokin da ke tattare da hasken Fatima da kuma koyi da koyarwarta da sanya su cikin rayuwarsu don su haskaka kansu da hasken shiryarwa ta Ubangiji da aka ba wa dukkanin bil'adama kyautarsu ta hannun Nana Fatima al-Zahra (amincin Allah ya tabbata a gare ta) da Zuriyar Ma'aikin Allah (s.a.w.a).

en: Stating that Iran has completely fulfilled its commitments of the nuclear agreement, the Supreme Leader of the Islamic Revolution criticized the other sides for wriggling out of their commitments.
ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da yake ishara da cewa Iran ta aikata dukkanin nauyin dake wuyanta dangane da yarjejeniyar nukiliya da aka cimma, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci yayi kakkausar suka ga rashin cika alkawurran da daya bangaren yarjejeniya suke yi.

en: Leader Meets with Iraqi Prime Minister - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jagora ya Gana Da Firayi Minista Nuri Maliki Na Iraki

en: All parts of the Islamic Ummah - in the form of different nations and countries - should achieve the civilizational position that has been specified in the Holy Quran.
ha: Wajibi ne al'ummar musulmi da dukkanin bangarorinsu su kai ga irin ci gaba da Alkur'ani yake son su kai gare shi.

en: The following is the full text of the speech delivered on August 10, 2011 by Ayatollah Khamenei the Leader of the Islamic Republic in a meeting with university students in Tehran.
ha: Shimfida: A ranar laraba 10, Augustan 2011 wacce ta yi daidai da ranar 9 ga watan Ramalana mai alfarma ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya gana da dubban daliban da suka fito daga jami'oi daban-daban na kasar Iran da jami'ansu. Abin da ke tafe fassarar jawabin da Jagoran ya yi musu ne:

en: He stepped in as an intellectual soldier.
ha: Ya shiga fagen tunani ne tamkar wani soja.

en: Today the Armed Forces are regarded with respect among the people.
ha: A yau sojoji suna da girma a idon mutane.

en: And this is another point which is very important. I am not saying these things to praise Mr. Qara'ati or exaggerate what he has done.
ha: Hakan kuwa lamari ne mai muhimmanci. Ina fadin wadannan maganganu ne ba wai saboda ina son in jinjina wa wani mutum ko kuma in daukaka wani mutum ba ne.

en: The answer to those people who have tried to throw Islam out of the arena of social and political issues, to confine it to personal and individual affairs and to adopt a secular outlook towards Islam - the hands of the enemies and their propaganda efforts have been promoting this outlook among Muslims for many years - is the issue of Ghadir.
ha: A hakikanin gaskiya lamarin Ghadir ya zamanto martani ne ga mutanen da suke kokarin raba Musulunci da batutuwa na siyasa da zamantakewa ta al'umma, da takaita shi ga lamurran da suka shafi rayuwar daidaikun mutane - wato a hakikanin gaskiya suna wa Musulunci wani irin kallo ne na cewa addini ba shi da wata rawa da zai taka cikin tsarin gudanar da rayuwa ta zamantakewa ta al'umma, wanda hakan wata farfaganda ce da makiya da ‘yan amshin shatansu suka jima suna yadawa tsakanin musulmi.

en: Well, human beings get used to certain sins.
ha: Daya daga cikin ayyukan da ya kamata a aikata a sabuwar shekara shi ne wannan; wato mutum ya duba cewa ta ya ya za a iya rage zunuban da ake da su; wato ya rubuta. A shekarar bara ko bariya ce na ke karanta wani abu dangane da rayuwar shahid Afshordi (Bakiri) - ina zaton tarihin rayuwarsa ne ko kuma daya daga cikin wadannan shahidan - a wajen an rubuta cewa shi din a kowace rana ya kan rubuta kura-kuran da ya yi; kamar yadda ya zo cikin wasu daga cikin wasiyyoyin wasu malaman akhlak da kuma wasu hadisai da makamantan hakan na cewa ku dinga rubuta kura-kuran da kuka yi, a kowane dare sai ku yi hisabi wa kanku.

en: In scientific arenas, in industrial arenas, in social activities, in foreign policy, and in many different areas, government officials have made great achievements.
ha: A fagen ilimi, a fagen masana'antu, a fagen ayyuka na zamantakewa, a fagen siyasar waje, a bangarori daban-daban, jami'an gwamnati sun aikata ayyuka masu girman gaske.

en: Labor and management should make efforts in a truly sincere manner in order to help the country make progress as a result of their work.
ha: A irin wannan lokacin, wajibi ne ma'aikata da kuma masu daukan ma'aikata su gudanar da ayyukansu cikin ikhlasi sannan kuma su yi kokari wajen ganin sakamakon aikinsu ya zamanto ciyar da kasa gaba ne.

en: Over the years that we have held many elections - including parliamentary and presidential elections - our enemies have always tried to decrease voter turnout and make our elections less enthusiastic, and this is because of the significant role that elections play in the affairs of our country.
ha: Tsawon shekarun da muka yi muna gudanar da zabe - shin zaben majalisa ne ko kuma zaben shugaban kasa - a koda yaushe makiyanmu sun yi kokari wajen ganin zaben bai yi armashi ba. Hakan kuwa saboda irin muhimmancin da zabe yake da shi ne a kasar nan.

en: This is a great leap towards establishing social justice.
ha: Hakan wani mataki mai girma ne da aka taka, wajen tabbatar da adalci na zamantakewa.

en: For many years the nations of our region - both in the Persian Gulf and in the Gulf of Oman - were used to obeying the bullying people who entered this region sailing in their warships. The nations of our region had to keep silent and listen to them.
ha: Tsawon shekara da shekaru al'ummomin wannan yankin na mu, shin na Tekun Fasha ne ko kuma a Tekun Oman, sun saba jin sauti da muryar masu tinkaho da karfin da suka hau jiragen ruwan yakin su suka taso daga can nesa suka zo wannan yankin, sannan kuma su ka yi shiru babu wani abin da suka yi.

en: The fitna-promoting rulers who by forming and arming wicked takfiri groups, have plunged the world of Islam into civil wars, murdering and injuring the innocent and shed blood in Yemen, Iraq, the Levant, Libya and other countries- the godless politicians who have extended the hand of friendship towards the Zionist regime, have closed their eyes on the Palestinians’ sufferings and heartrending tragedies and have spread their oppression and betrayal to the cities and villages of Bahrain- the irreligious and unconscionable rulers who gave rise to the great tragedy in Mina and in the name of being servants of the two holy places, sacrificed divine sanctity and God’s guests on the day of Eid in Mina and in Masjid ul-Haraam shortly before that- these same people are now claiming the need to avoid politicizing hajj and are accusing others of the great sins that they themselves have committed and caused.
ha: Wadannan mahukunta masu kirkiro fitina, wadanda ta hanyar kirkira da kuma ba da makamai wa kungiyoyi ('yan ta'adda) masu kafirta musulmi, sun sanya kasashen musulmi cikin yakin basasa, kisa da zubar da jinin wadanda ba su ci ba su sha ba da kuma zubar da jinin mutane a kasashen Yemen, Iraki, Sham (Siriya), Libiya da sauran kasashe. A daidai lokacin da wadannan 'yan siyasa marasa tsoron Allah suke mika hannayen abokantaka ga haramtacciyar kasar sahyoniyawa 'yan mamaya, a daidai lokacin da kuma suka rufe idanuwansu daga wahalhalu masu tsanani da Palastinawa suke ciki sannan kuma suna baza zalunci da cin amanarsu a kan garuruwa da kauyukan kasar Bahrain. Su kuwa wadannan shugabanni marasa addini da lamiri, wadanda suka haifar da abin da ya faru a Mina sannan kuma ta hanyar fakewa da sunan masu hidima wa haramai biyu suna keta hurumin haramin Allah da kashe bakin Allah Mai Rahama a ranar Babbar Salla a Mina, sannan kuma kafin hakan a Masjid al-Haram, su din ne a halin yanzu suke maganar bai kamata a siyasantar da lamarin hajji ba sannan kuma suna zargin wasu da aikata babban sabon da su da kansu ne suka aikata da kuma yin sanadiyyar faruwarsa.

en: We Muslims have drifted away from one another to a great extent.
ha: Mu musulmi mun nesanci junanmu sosai.

en: The solution is to awaken the people and prominent figures - scientific and political figures and empathetic government officials who care about the destiny of their country. They should be vigilant.
ha: Maganin hakan shi ne wannan farkawa ta al'umma, farkawa ta masana; kwararru a fagen ilimi, a fagen siyasa da kuma jami'ai masu kishi da suka damu da makomar al'umma.

en: Leader's Message of Condolence on the Demise of Ayatollah Montazeri - Khamenei.ir
ha: Sakon Jagora Sakamakon Rasuwar Ayatullah Muntazeri 20/12/2009

en: Lebanon is not our neighbor, and its people are not all Muslims. The population is a mixture of Muslims and Christians, and the Muslim population consists of Shia and Sunni Muslims.
ha: A samu wata al'umma wacce ma ba ta makwabtaka da mu, sannan kuma ba dukkansu ne ma musulmi ba; hadin gambiza ne na musulmi da kiristoci, su ma musulmin sun hada da Sunna da Shi'a; a samu irin wannan al'umma da ta kumshi bangarori daban-daban su fito kwansu da kwarkwatansu don yin maraba da shugaban kasar Iran, su bayyanar da kaunarsu, lalle wannan wani lamari ne maras tamka; babu wata kasa da hakan ta taba faruwa da ita.

en: If humanity considered the issue in a fair way, it would acknowledge that human beings' salvation and their movement towards perfection will be possible only through Islam.
ha: Idan har bil'adama suka yi tunani, sannan kuma suka kalli lamurra da mahanga ta adalci, to kuwa za su gaskata cewa lalle za a iya ‘yantar da bil'adama da kuma kai shi ga kamala ne ta hanyar riko da Musulunci.

en: The answer is that we are not concerned about whether or not you have intentions of overthrowing the Islamic Republic although you constantly insist that you do not have such intentions.
ha: Amsarmu ita ce cewa mu dai ba mu damu ko kuna da nufin kifar da tsarin Musulunci ko kuma a'a ba, ballantana ma ku dinga fadi a halin yanzu cewa ku ba ku da niyyar sauya wannan tsari na Musulunci.

en: But then they start finding fault with other nations and complain that they have failed to conform to a particular part of the treaties.
ha: To amma kuma sai ga shi suna bude bakunansu suna magana kan wasu kasashe, suna cewa kasa kaza ba ta yi aiki da bangare kaza na wannan yarjejeniya ba.

en: These things result from the revolutionary spirit which we call the basiji spirit and the spirit of youth, innovation, pioneering action and self-confidence.
ha: Dukkanin wadannan abubuwa sun samo asali ne daga wannan ruhi na juyi wanda muke kiransa da ruhin basiji, ruhin samartaka da sabuntawa da kuma ci gaba tare da dogaro da kai.

en: Today the number of university graduates is tens of times larger than that.
ha: Amma a halin yanzu wadanda ake da su sun rubanya hakan sau goma mai yiyuwa ne ma sau gomomi.

en: Certain people are used to reading books, but books that do not require thinking. Nothing is wrong with this.
ha: Wasu daga cikin kwakwala (mutane) ma'abota littafi ne; sai dai kuma littafan da suke da sauki, littafan da ba sa bukatar yin wani tunani sosai.

en: These are the events that the 13th of Aban represents.
ha: Wadannan su ne lamurran da suka faru a ranar sha uku ga watan Aban.

en: We did not announce this: it was they themselves who announced and insisted that if it had not been for the presence of the Islamic Republic and its show of power, Palestinian combatants could not have even put up a resistance against Israel, let alone bring Israel to its knees.
ha: Su ne dai suka fadi- ba wai mu ne muka fadi ba - cewa idan da ba don kasantuwar Jamhuriyar Musulunci da kuma karfinta ba, to da ‘yan gwagwarmayar Palastinawa ba su iya yin tsayin daka a gaban (haramtacciyar kasar) Isra'ila ba, ballantana ma a yi maganar durkusar da ita ba.

en: Recognize differences as legitimate and manage them.
ha: Ku yarda da irin bambancin da ake da su sannan kuma ku tafiyar da su yadda ya dace.

en: Formation of the Board for Arbitration and Coordination - Khamenei.ir Ayatollah Khamenei- Leader of the Islamic Revolution- in order to assess and advise in matters concerning arbitration and coordination of relations between the three branches of government, according to Article 110, Section 7 of the Constitution, establishes the Board for Arbitration and Coordination of Relations Between the Three Branches of Government and appoints Ayatollah Hashemi Shahrudi as its chairman.
ha: Don yin nazari da kuma gabatar da shawara kan hanyoyin da za a magance sabanin da ka iya kunno kai tsakanin bangarori uku na gwamnati (majalisar ministoci, majalisar dokoki da kuma ma'aikatar shari'a) da kuma kyautata alakar da ke tsakaninsu, sannan kuma bisa bangare na 7 na doka ta 110 na kundin tsarin mulkin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran, a ranar litinin (25-7-2011) ne Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci Ayatullah Sayyid Ali Khamenei ya kafa kwamitin koli na magance sabani da kuma kulla alaka mai kyau tsakanin bangarori uku na gwamnati karkashin jagorancin Ayatullah Mahmud Hashemi Shahrudi.

en: When even bodies stay together, it has such a reflection.
ha: Wannan shi ne abin da zai faru a lokacin da ko da jikkuna ne kawai suka hadu waje guda.

en: Try to influence the people around you.
ha: Ku yi kokari wajen ganin kun yi tasiri a inda kuke.

en: Later on, the same secretary of state - who had said in front of the camera and in front of the eyes of all the world that they do not want Iran to cooperate with them - requested Dr. Zarif that Iran cooperate with them on this issue, but Dr. Zarif turned this down.
ha: Daga baya kuma shi kansa wannan ministan harkokin waje na Amurka (John Kerry), wanda ya fito gaban duniya yana fadin cewa: "Ba za mu gayyaci Iran ba", shi da kansa ya bukaci Dakta Zarif (ministan harkokin wajen Iran) da cewa ku zo mu hada kai cikin wannan lamarin; Dakta Zarif ya yi watsi da maganar.

en: Greetings be upon Seddiqah at-Tahirah Fatima, the daughter of the Messenger of Allah.
ha: Amincin Allah ya tabbata ga Siddikatut Tahira Fatima 'yar Manzon Allah, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gare ta da Mahaifinta da Mijinta da 'ya'yanta.

en: I hope Allah the Exalted will make all of us successful in this regard.
ha: Ina fatan Allah Madaukakin Sarki zai ba wa dukkaninmu, dukkanin al'ummar Iran dacewa cikin wannan aikin.

en: But due to the reign of taghut and different other factors, we fell behind. If we are determined to compensate for this backwardness, we must pay attention to knowledge and production. We want to make up for the backwardness, and our nation has started its movement and has made considerable progress already.
ha: Idan har muna son mu cike gurbin (irin wannan koma bayan da aka samu) - wanda kuma muna son hakan, sannan kuma al'ummarmu ma sun yunkura kuma ya zuwa wani haddi sun sami ci gaba - wajibi ne mu ba da muhimmanci ga ilimi da samar da abubuwan da ake bukata; wajibi ne a bi wannan lamari a cibiyoyi na ilimi da kuma na bincike.

en: I have nothing against religious discussions. If they want to have scholarly religious discussions among scholars and experts, they may sit down together and have such discussions.
ha: Ni dai na yi imani da bahasi na mazhaba, idan har suna son su yi bahasi na ilimi da mazhaba tsakanin malamai da masana, su zauna su gudanar da hakan, babu matsala cikin haka, to sai dai ba wai a idon jama'a ba face dai a zama na ilimi.

en: The youth are a source of innovation and creativity.
ha: Matasa kuma tushe ne na haske da samar da sabbin abubuwa.

en: Just consider what will happen if the government succeeds in reforming the methods of irrigation and reduces this amount by only 10 percent.
ha: Ku duba ku ga abin da zai faru idan har cikin yardar Allah gwamnati ta sami damar gyara hanyar ban ruwa, idan har aka rage kashi goma cikin dari na wannan kashi casa'in cikin dari din.

en: We will not allow the Americans to re-establish their infernal hegemony over our country through such means.
ha: Mu dai ba za mu taba bari Amurkawa ta hanyar wadannan abubuwa su sake dawo da bakin mulkinsu a wannan kasar ba; lalle al'ummar Iran ba za su taba barin haka ta faru ba.

en: [The Holy Quran, 90: 10] Allah the Exalted presents us with choices.
ha: (Suratul Balad 90:10), ya nuna mana hanyoyi guda biyu wadanda za mu zabi (guda).

en: Therefore, in his messages the Leader of the Islamic Revolution says that the arrogant powers are an enemy of oppressed people and human rights, a supporter of terrorism and a promoter of hegemony and hypocrisy in the world of Islam. Of course disclosing the role of the mercenary regimes in the region is another important theme. These regimes try to fulfill the goals of colonialism and take away the essence of hajj: these things have also been mentioned in the messages.
ha: A saboda haka a cikin sakonnin Jagoran akan bayyana girman kan duniya a matsayin makiyan raunanan mutane, masu take hakkokin bil'adama kana kuma masu goyon bayan ta'addanci da yada munafunci da mulkin mallaka a kasashen musulmi. Tabbas daya daga cikin batutuwa masu muhimmanci shi ne tona asirin irin rawar da gwamnatoci 'yan amshin shata na yankin nan suke takawa wadanda suke kokari wajen ganin sun tabbatar da manufar 'yan mulkin mallaka haka nan kuma da kawar da aikin hajji daga asalin manufarsa ta kololuwa.

en: The materialistic view is the exact opposite of this. According to the materialistic view, there is no purpose behind the existence of man. A materialist has no idea why he came into being.
ha: Sabanin hakan shi ne mahanga ta abin duniya. Da farko dai mahanga ta abin duniya ba ta ganin akwai wata manufa cikin samuwar dan'adam da kuma wannan duniya; alal hakika ba su san saboda me ya zo duniya ba.

en: It is necessary to look first, and then one will be able to see.
ha: Wajibi ne mutum ya kalli lamurra; a lokacin da ya kalla, to kuwa a wannan lokacin ne zai gani.

en: They have repeatedly used silly and idiotic methods to promote Iranophobia and Islamophobia and the futility of these methods have been proven, but desperate western politicians continue using these methods.
ha: Sun yi amfani da hanyoyi daban-daban na wauta da rashin hankali wajen yada tsoron Iran da kuma tsoron Musulunci sannan kuma rashin hankalinsu ya tabbata, a hain yanzu ma suna ci gaba da sake maimaita hakan.

en: I asked him to write a hadith on a piece of paper so that I could put it up on the wall: "He who considers himself the leader of people should educate himself before educating others." We must not forget the responsibility to educate ourselves.
ha: Ni na bukace shi da ya rubuta min wannan hadisin da ke cewa: "Duk wanda ya nada kansa shugaba ga al'umma, to (wajibi ne) ya fara karantar da kansa kafin ya karantar da waninsa" don in sanya shi a gaban teburina; don kada mu mance da batun karantar da kanmu.

en: We were never opposed to the supervision and regulations of the International Atomic Energy Agency.
ha: Su amince da hakkin da Iran take da shi na tace sinadarin urnium, sannan kuma don kawar da wannan damuwar, suna iya aiwatar da dokokin hukumar kula da makamashin nukiliya ta duniya.

en: There is a unified front that is opposed to the Islamic Revolution, which is a spiritual, religious, cultural and ideological Revolution.
ha: Akwai hadin gwuiwa a tsakaninsu wajen fada da juyin juya halin Musulunci, wanda wani juyi ne na addini da al'adu da kuma akida.

en: Wherever lazy people fail to take risks and play a role in the arena, they accuse pious combatants of extremism. They said that the movement was an extremist movement.
ha: A duk lokacin da masu neman sauki da jin dadi suka gagara sama wa kansu waje a cikin gwagwarmayar da ake yi, nan take za su zargi muminan mutane masu gwagwarmaya da tsaurin ra'ayi da wuce gona da iri.

en: He also presented a report on the latest conditions of Gaza and the West Bank, further adding: "Resistance is a strategic decision which has been made by Hamas, the resistance forces, and the Palestinian people.
ha: Khalid Mash'al ya bayyana cewar: Gwagwarmaya wata siyasa ce da kungiyar Hamas, sauran kungiyoyin gwagwarmaya da al'ummar Palastinu suka zaba, sannan kuma ko da wasa ba za su taba mika wuya ga matsin lamba na siyasa da soji na makiya ba.

en: Dear people, everybody should know that piety in our society and among our youth will help our nation in worldly matters as well.
ha: Wajibi ne kowa da kowa ya san wannan; sanya kishin addini cikin kasa da kuma cikin matasa, hakan zai taimaka wa al'umma cikin lamurran da suka shafi duniyar su.

en: This is an opportunity for us to become familiar with the lofty goals of Islam.
ha: Mu sanar da kanmu manyan manufofi na Musulunci.

en: We can never say that the event will not happen in a few years and we can never say that the event will happen in the near future. We should always wait for it.
ha: Ba za a iya cewa a halin yanzu dai akwai shekaru masu yawa da suka rage kafin hakan ta faru, haka nan kuma ba za a iya cewa yanzu-yanzu ne lamarin zai faru ba. Wajibi a ko da yaushe a zamanto cikin shiri, wajibi a ko da yaushe mu zamanto cikin jiran dako.

en: You should know that I am in contact with the people: they do not know about these advances.
ha: Ina son in sanar da ku cewa; ni dai ina da alaka da mutane; mutane ba su da labara kan irin wadannan ci gaban da aka samu.

en: The atmosphere of insult and disrespect in society is one of the things that Islam is opposed to. We must not let this happen.
ha: Yanayin cin mutumci da keta hurumi cikin al'umma, daya ne daga cikin abubuwan da Musulunci ya hana su; a saboda haka bai kamata a bar hakan ta faru ba.

en: They were asking themselves, "Who did they learn these things from?"
ha: To a wajen wa suka koyi wannan?

en: Elsewhere in his statements, His Eminence stressed that translation is not a one-way road and added: "The government should prepare the way for translating the good books that are published in the country - especially in the area of religious studies, history, literature and sciences - and for presenting them to the world."
ha: Haka nan kuma yayin da ya ke magana kan muhimmancin tarjama littafa da ake yi, Jagoran cewa ya yi: Wajibi ne gwamnatin ta share fagen samar da littafa masu kyau a fagage daban-daban da suka hada da na addini, tarihi, adabi da sauran ilmummuka da kuma tarjama su zuwa yarurruka daban-daban da gabatar da su ga duniya.

en: That is to say, they get the opportunity to say, "Well, I had these flaws in the year that went by, so I will start eliminating these flaws in the new year."
ha: Wannan sabon yanayi yana da wata fa'ida ta cewa mutum zai sami damar yin tunani cikin ayyukan da ya gudanar da kuma wadanda zai gabatar nan gaba; wato mutum zai ce: "to da kyau, a shekarar da ta gabata dai ina da wadannan nakasin; don haka bari in fara kokarin gyara tun daga wannan shekarar, in gyara wadannan abubuwa.

en: And after we realize what the purpose is, we start making efforts in order to achieve that purpose.
ha: Bayan da muka samo wannan manufar, muka fahimci mece ce manufar, to kuwa daga nan za mu fara kokari wajen cimma wannan manufar.

en: Opposition to capitulation During November of 1964, Imam Khomeini made a denunciation of both the Shah and the United States, this time in response to the "capitulations" or diplomatic immunity granted to American military personnel in Iran by the Shah.
ha: A wannan rana (ta 4 ga Aban), Imam Khumaini ya fitar da wata sanarwa inda yake cewa: "Ya kamata al'ummar duniya ta san cewa dukkan wata wahala da matsalolin da al'ummar Iran da na musulmi suke ciki daga Amurka ne, daga baki 'yan kasashen waje ne.

en: In our Armed Forces, there is no imposition. There is no pressure.
ha: A nan babu wata magana ta tilastci da tursasawa; abin da ake gani a wannan wajen shi ne kumaji da ke tattare da su.

en: If the soldier is aware of this, he will never get tired or bored, and nothing will undermine the hope in his heart.
ha: Matukar wannan soja ya fahimci hakan, ko da wasa ba zai gaji ba; ba zai ji gajiyawa ba; babu komai kashin yanke kauna da zai shigo cikin zuciyarsa.

en: This is while the young consultant is a young student, a young MA or Ph.D. student or a young man who has graduated recently.
