ha: A lokacin da wata al'umma ta zamanto mai imani, za ta ji cewa babu wani aiki na ta da yake a matsayin hasara.

en: At the end of his statements, Ayatollah Khamenei referred to the issue of Iraq, reiterating: "By Allah's favor, when the new prime minister is elected, the problems will be solved and the government will be formed so that it can teach a good lesson to those who have decided to instigate fitna in Iraq."
ha: Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya rufe jawabin nasa ne da batun kasar Iraki inda ya yi fatan cewa za a magance matsalolin da suka kunno kai a kasar sakamakon ayyana sabon firayi minista da kuma kawo karshen wutar fitina da wasu suka kunna a kasar. Daga karshe dai Jagoran yayi fatan alheri ga jami'an diplomasiyyar da samun nasarori cikin ayyukansu.

en: The Islamic Republic that has been the biggest and the most reliable supporter of oppressed Muslims in Gaza, Palestine, Afghanistan, Kashmir and other Muslim areas is now the target of this evil plot hatched by the espionage organizations of America, the Zionist regime and England which wrongly believe they will involve Iran in religious fitna and Shia-Sunni confrontation.
ha: Jamhuriyar Musulunci wacce a cikin tsawon shekaru goma ta ke a matsayin mai bada kariya mafi girma ga al'ummar musulmin Gaza da Palasdinu da ake zalunta da kuma Afghanistan da Kashmir da sauran wuraren musulmi, haka ta kasance kuma haka ta ke a wannan lokacin. A wannan lokacin kungiyoyin leken asirin Amerika da haramtacciyar kasar Isra'ila da Ingila sun nuste cikin shirya mata makirce-makirce saboda a tunaninsu ta za fada cikin fitinar mazhaba da rikici tsakanin shi'a da sunni.

en: This was why Imam Khomeini (r.a.) said that when there are 20 million people in a country who are prepared to put up an armed resistance, no power in the world will think of conquering that country.
ha: Da wannan manufar ce Imam ya fadi cewa idan aka sami wasu dakaru miliyan ashirin na mutane da suke cikin shirin fada a cikin wata al'umma, to kuwa babu wani karfi a duniyar nan da zai yi tunanin wuce gona da iri a kansu, don kuwa sun san irin abin da zai biyo baya a duk lokacin da suka kai wa wannan al'ummar hari.

en: Imam (r.a.) believed that our nation enjoys deep religious faith and is intelligent and courageous, a nation that has the capacity to shine like the sun in different areas only if it has competent leaders.
ha: Imam ya yi amanna da cewa wannan al'ummar, al'umma ce ma'abociyar imani, mai hankali da kuma jaruntaka; wacce matukar ta sami wani jagora wanda ya dace, to kuwa za ta iya bayyanar da kanta a dukkanin fagage tamkar hasken rana.

en: Leader’s Speech to Librarians and Library Officials - Khamenei.ir
ha: Jawabin Jagora Yayin Ganawa Da Jami'an Dakunan Karatu Na Iran

en: How can we cooperate on this issue with those whose hands and intentions are dirty?"
ha: Saboda hannayensu dumu-dumu suke (cikin wannan lamarin), ta ya ya za mu zo mu hada kai da mutumin da hannunsa a gurbace yake, sannan niyyarsu ma gurbatacciya ce?

en: I hope God will reward you all and make the holy souls of our dear martyrs happy with us, the esteemed martyrs who prepared the ground for our nation to deal with these important matters.
ha: Muna rokon Allah Madaukakin Sarki da Ya ba ku lada sannan kuma ruhi mai tsarki na shahidanmu masu girma wadanda su ne suka samar da wannan yanayi ga al'umma za su kasance tare da ku wajen samun damar aiwatar da wannan aiki mai girma.

en: At the end of this spiritual ceremony, evening prayers were led by Ayatollah Khamenei.
ha: A karshen wannan taro dai da ya dauki sa'oi hudu ana gudanar da shi, Jagoran juyin juya halin Musulunci ya jagoranci mahalarta taron sallar magariba da lisha sannan kuma suka sha ruwa tare.

en: As long as the flag of an army keeps flying during a battle, it means the army is has not been defeated and the battle is supposed to continue.
ha: A lokacin yaki, a duk lokacin da tuta ta zamanto a dage, hakan yana nufin sojoji suna nan da ransu kuma ana ci gaba da yaki.

en: The first point is that what is most important is massive presence of the people in the elections.
ha: A matakin farko, batu na farko a babin zabe shi ne cewa fitowar jama'a kwansu da kwarkwatansu a lokacin zaben lamari ne mai muhimmancin gaske.

en: The fourth point is that everybody should accept the rule of law, be it elections or anything else.
ha: Batu na hudu shi ne cewa cikin lamurran da suka shafi zabe da wadanda ba na zabe ba, wajibi ne kowa ya mika kai ga doka; a girmama doka.

en: Why?
ha: Don me?

en: Of course unaware people should be awakened.
ha: Ko da yake wajibi ne shi ma wanda ya gafalan ya farka.

en: The following year, Ayatollah Haeri-Yazdi transferred the Islamic seminary to the holy city of Qom, and invited his students to follow. Imam Khomeini accepted the invitation, moved, and took up residence at the Dar al-Shafa school in Qom before being exiled to the holy city of Najaf in Iraq.
ha: A wannan lokaci, bisa gayyatar da malaman Kum suka yi masa, Ayatullah Hajj Shaikh Abdulkarim Ha'iri ya yi hijira daga garin Arak zuwa Kum. Bayan wani lokaci kuma sai Imam Khumaini, sakamakon irin kokarin da yake da shi da kuma gama karatunsa na share fage a garuruwan Arak da Khumain, yayi hijira zuwa birnin Kum don ba da tasa gudummawar wajen karfafa sabuwar makarantar Hawzar garin.

en: From the beginning of last year, our enemies started their hostile movement against the Iranian nation on the economic front.
ha: Makiyanmu tun daga farko-farkon shekarar suka fara nuna bakar aniyarsu da kiyayyarsu ga al'ummar Iran a fagen tattalin arziki (ta hanyar sanya takunkumin tattalin arziki); to amma al'ummar Iran, jami'an kasar nan, mutane da kuma cibiyoyin gwamnati daban-daban, cikin hikima da nuna sanin ya kamata sun sami nasarar tinkarar dukkanin wadannan takunkumin da aka sanya mana, sannan kuma ya zuwa wani haddi mai yawa sun sami nasarar dushe kaifinsa da kuma dakatar da wannan kiyayya ta makiya.

en: By Allah's favor, when you grow up, you will see these peaks and you will be a source of pride for your nation.
ha: A lokacin da kuka kai shekarun kamala, da yardar Allah za ku ga wadannan manufofi sannan kuma za ku samar wa al'ummar ku da abin alfahari.

en: These statistics are great. They are important statistics. Houses were built in rural areas.
ha: Wannan dai wani adadi ne mai girman gaske da muhimmanci. An gina gidaje a kauyuka, an gina tituna da manyan hanyoyi.

en: And the way to counter these dangers is to fulfill our obligations and fight our illegitimate passions.
ha: Hanyar kawar da wannan hatsarin ita ce kula da nauyin da ke wuya da kuma fada da soyace-soyacen zuciya.

en: The spread of the wave of Islamic Awakening in today’s world is a fact that promises a good future for the Islamic Ummah.
ha: A yau irin farkawar da ake samu a duniyar musulmi wani lamari ne na hakika wanda yake bushara da makoma mai kyau ga al’ummar musulmin.

en: Islam believes in justice.
ha: Musulunci yayi amanna da yin adalci.

en: Anybody who studies this arena carefully and appropriately will praise the Iranian nation, just as we hear perceptive people throughout the world praising our nation today.
ha: Duk wanda ya kalli wannan fagen da kyau da kuma bincikensa da kyau, to kuwa zai jinjina wa al'ummar Iran, kamar yadda a halin yanzu muke jin sautin irin wannan jinjinawar daga al'ummomin duniya ciki kuwa har da daga wadannan kasashen da suke adawa da kuma kulla sharri ga al'ummar Iran.

en: What next? What I want to say is that from now on the responsibility of our young generation - who are mostly students - is to pursue this path with the same orientation and to move towards further development.
ha: Abin da na ke son fadi shi ne dai wannan jumla guda: daga yanzu zuwa nan gaba wannan shi ne nauyin da ke wuyan matasan yau wadanda mafi yawansu daliban jami'a ne su ci gaba da riko da wannan tafarkin da kuma kai shi zuwa ga kamala.

en: A number of them showed their sympathy and kindness by writing to me or by delivering messages through electronic media.
ha: Dukkaninsu suka nuna min so da kauna, ko suka rubuto ko kuma aka watsa a kafafen watsa labarai na internet.

en: The Constitution of the Islamic Republic embodies the values of the Revolution.
ha: Riko da juyin juya halin Musulunci yana cikin kundin tsarin Jamhuriyar Musulunci.
